GingerDozer\'s candy cane, broken in half. Hurry and rescue GingerDozer!
An essential item for entering the auction. It\'s so shiny! Don\'t ask why, but it also tastes very sweet!
GingerBrave donned this uniform while temporarily aiding the staff of the Grand Cabinet Hotel. Not a single speck of dust could be found after GingerBrave helped with cleaning!
GingerBright donned this uniform while temporarily aiding the staff of the Grand Cabinet Hotel. A bright smile to greet the guests is always a sign of great service!
Cleanliness is key when cooking! Not a single hair or speck of dust is allowed! This chef\'s toque is both practical and very fashionable.
Strawberry Cookie donned this uniform while temporarily aiding the staff of the Grand Cabinet Hotel.
A golden key that was retrieved from bandits. It\'s so shiny!
Top quality olive oil. Its aroma is so strong that it penetrates the cap.
This powder is softer and finer than snow. But watch out! If you drop the bottle, it\'ll get everywhere! The hotel staff uses this after waxing the floors.
A sturdy rope that can tie anything. A twist here, a pull there, and BAM! Mission accomplished.
A compass said to have been left behind by an explorer who reached the end of the world. Legend has it that this compass will guide you to your heart\'s true desires without fail.

This magical compass is no longer working. Luckily, the needle pointed towards GingerDozer\'s location just before it malfunctioned. Broken compass or not, nothing will stop the Cookies from rescuing their friend.

Such a clever mouse, and a good friend!
Such a brave mouse, and a good friend!
Always tired and sleepy, but never lazy!
Always seems to know many secrets, but never gossips!
A blazing hot, but friendly, Ember. No one knows where it came from...
A scorching hot, but friendly, Ember. Will you be their new best friend?
A flaming hot, but friendly, Ember. It seems they\'ve been here a long time.
A moldy Cheese on the run. No one knows how long they\'ve been running.
A ripe Cheese on the run. Will you be their new partner in crime?
A disguised Cheese on the run. No one knows where they came from...
A cute Black Sesame Fuzzball. Will you be their new best friend?
An adorable Cheese Fuzzball. It seems they\'ve been here a long time.
A cuddly Tabby Fuzzball. No one knows where they came from...

Blue cheese is notoriously difficult to make and store, but not at Cheesehaven! It\'s been a favorite dish of the tavern for years on end. You absolutely must try this rare and distinguished delicacy!\" -Interview Excerpt from \"Micedom Fromagers Society

You can never go wrong with a classic cheddar cheese. But Cheesehaven has found a way to make it more scrumptious and savory than anywhere else! It\'s been a favorite dish of the tavern for years on end. Of course, rare delicacies are welcome, but there\'s something comforting about a sharp and sweet cheddar!\" -Interview Excerpt from \"Micedom Fromagers Society

If your palate desires something refined and creamy, look no further! Cheesehaven\'s selection of brie is smooth and rich as can be. It\'s been a favorite dish of the tavern for years on end and will definitely bring a smile to your face.\" -Interview Excerpt from \"Micedom Fromagers Society

If you visit an establishment with 3 Squeakchelin Stars, you\'re guaranteed to experience an amazing night of fine dining, and maybe run into this particular Squeakchelin Inspector. Renown for writing both scathing critique and poetic praise, this critic seeks only the epitome of exquisite cuisine. Traveling via the halls and chambers may be dangerous, but that doesn\'t stop this eccentric, and somewhat nervous, fellow from discovering all sorts of flavors and aromas at renowned restaurants throughout the castle.
A brand-new staff member of the Grand Cabinet Hotel. So friendly!
A proud staff member of the Grand Cabinet Hotel. Will you be their new best friend?
A veteran staff member of the Grand Cabinet Hotel. It seems they\'ve been here a long time.
A bellhop who dreams of becoming a manager. So friendly!
A bellhop who strives to be the kindest member of the staff. So caring!
A bellhop who hopes to become Employee of the Year. So punctual!
Detective Gumdrop, currently investigating undercover. The disguise could use a little work.
A burglar trying to keep a low profile. The disguise is rather genius, actually.
A spy performing some field work. The disguise kind of sticks out.
While caring for his wife\'s quills, he accidentally pricked himself. Luckily, the injury doesn\'t seem too bad.
While caring for his wife\'s quills, he accidentally pricked himself. Luckily, it seems there are more bandages than needed.
While caring for his wife\'s quills, he accidentally pricked himself. Luckily, it seems that first-aid care was delivered swiftly and... very-thoroughly.
Done with a perfect quill perm and ready for a brand-new day! What sort of fun awaits us today, darling?
Well-rested and ready for a new brand-new day! What sort of fun awaits us today, darling?
Refreshed, relaxed, and ready for a new brand-new day! What sort of fun awaits us today, darling?
The first son of the proud Stag family. What a gentleman!
The second son of the proud Stag family. So down-to-earth!
The youngest son of the proud Stag family. So friendly!
A perfectionist chef of great tenacity. Everything must be perfect, from ingredients, to measurements, and exact timing!
A precisionist chef of great skill. Everything must be precise, from savoriness, to sweetness, and tinges of acidity!
A maximalist chef of great vision. Everything must be considered for maximal flavor, from oil temperature, to stirring, and hefty plating!
The backbone of the Apricot Jam Syndicate, Walnut. Will you be their new best friend?
A captain of the Apricot Jam Syndicate, Walnut. They seem familiar...
The fashionista of the Apricot Jam Syndicate, Walnut. No one knows where they came from...
The frontrunner of the Apricot Jam Syndicate. Will you be their new best friend?
The cackling jokester of the Apricot Jam Syndicate. It seems they\'ve been here a long time.
The head ruffian of the Apricot Jam Syndicate, who really doesn\'t like the color purple... Will you be their new best friend?
The cutester of the Apricot Jam Syndicate, Cashew. Will you be their new best friend?
The amateur mage of the Apricot Jam Syndicate. It seems they\'ve been here a long time.
The greatest trendsetter of the Apricot Jam Syndicate, who really loves the color purple. No one knows how long they\'ve been here.

Have you met the greatest, reputable, and very talkative host in the witch\'s castle? Everyone who has met this silver-tongued parrot claims that his comments and persuasive tones can auction off the priciest of jewels to the grubbiest of dishrags! In recognition of his skills, an endless number of events and establishments are asking for his presence. He\'s always wearing his sunglasses though, but no one knows exactly why.

\"The Grand Cabinet Hotel has been in this family for three generations, and it shall not be the last!\" This esteemed hotelier manages the Grand Cabinet Hotel as strictly as he grooms his mustache, prioritizing cleanliness, precision, and perfection. And there\'s nothing wrong with looking amazingly sharp while doing so! Under his strict management, the hotel has not received any formal complaints, none whatsoever! But at the cost of some whining from the staff, of course... Regardless, nary a soul doubts the managerial skills of Hotelier Rabbit III, whose grandfather first managed this majestic hotel.
Nothing like a hot bowl of stew to warm yourself up! This stew has a long history of providing sustenance and comfort to many Cookies of ages past, when song and laughter filled these halls.
A cauldron that\'s been sitting here for quite a while. Let\'s put it to good use!
A wood-burning stove for roasting Jellies. Just looking at it makes you feel like you are home.
A boiling kettle atop a cozy fire. It serves its purpose.
An aromatic bundle of herbs. Let\'s put it to good use.
A cut of ham that\'s been cured, smoked, and aged. Looks scrumptious!
Sandstone bricks with a hazel hue. Try decorating the walls with these.
Sandstone tiles with a hazel hue. Try decorating the floor with these.
An old-fashioned lantern that provides both light and warmth. It will definitely help ward off the cold!
An old-fashioned lantern that provides both light and warmth. It will definitely help light up any room!
An antique candlestick. What a lucky find!
A simple, but hearty meal of stew and roasted Jellies. Looks scrumptious!
An old-fashioned candelabrum. What a lucky find!
An ingenious method of roasting some food with a simple candle! Hungry yet?
A haphazardly crafted canopy made with a fork. It serves its purpose.
It\'s not much to look at, but it serves its purpose! It\'s a start to making a lovely home!
Simple panels that are perfect for any room or home. Try decorating the wall with these.
Simple panels that are perfect for any room or home. Try decorating the floor with these.
This curious plant always seems to hungry. But hungry for what? Water? Better soil? Sunlight? No... Hungry for Cookies! Who would plant such a ferocious thing and leave it in the castle?!
A dusty jar filled with old, stale Cookies. Looks like someone was practicing their baking skills...
A jar of syrup for creating... some interesting looking candy. It\'ll probably look good somewhere...
A tiny Cookievorous plant. It might seem homely to certain folks...
An old, purple candle. It serves its purpose.
One of the hardest candies in existence. It\'s rather ironic that it\'s shaped like a tooth too...
A simple window adorned with vines. It serves its purpose.
A string of onions set out to dry. These will look great wherever you decide to put them.
A cut of cured ham that\'s still being aged. Looks scrumptious... maybe...
A pile of old, stained parchments. These will look great wherever you decide to place them... maybe.
Damp stone bricks that are a bit slippery. Try decorating the wall with these.
Damp stone tiles that are a bit slippery. Try decorating the floor with these.
An ancient grimoire that contains an entire chapter devoted to the study and creation of Life Potions. The recipe can only be understood by those astute in the magical arts.
A telescope used to observe the stars. What a lucky find!
A stool made from juniper wood. It serves its purpose.
An hourglass that was filled with sand measured with pinpoint accuracy, added grain by grain. It\'ll look good where you decide to put it.
An inkwell filled to the brim with Life Potion! Let\'s definitely put this to good use!
A delicately crafted mooncatcher. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
A hanging planter. Just looking at it makes you feel like you are home.
A window frame adorned with a crescent moon. Everyone will love it!
A round window with a star shape within. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
A blue valence adorned with a star. Everyone will love it!
A lovely shade of purple wallpaper. Try decorating the wall with these.
Plain and simple stone tiles. Try decorating the floor with these.
Some poorly wrapped cheese. Let\'s place it somewhere.
Perfectly aged blue cheese that seems to radiate with a golden glow. Its strong flavor loved by Cheesehaven\'s regulars.
Perfectly aged blue cheese that seems to shine with a shade of ivory. Procuring this cheese from the witch\'s cupboard took a particularly daring and roguish adventure.
A wooden pantry. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
Two wheels of cheese. These will look great wherever you decide to put them.
A pair of oak barrels for all your juice storage needs. What a lucky find!
A hand trolley to move cheese more efficiently. Let\'s put this to good use.
Excess humidity can ruin cheese. Let\'s put this to good use.
Sausage Jellies linked together. Looks scrumptious!
Homely earthen walls. Try decorating the wall with these.
Sturdy hardwood tiles. Try decorating the floor with these.
A few blades of grass with fresh drops of dew. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
Have you ever seen such a snug and plushy bed? Everyone will love it!
It\'s a rocking chair. It serves its purpose.
A cozy, decorative lamp. Everyone will love it!

Only you can prevent castle fires! But not to worry, these lost matches were used to light a safe and cozy campfire. So come and take a seat! Gaze into the flickering flames and listen to it crackle... So relaxing.
Someone\'s preparing a campfire with some crooked matchsticks. Be careful!
A pair of spotted mushrooms. Are they edible...?
A trio of inkcap mushrooms. They don\'t seem edible...

Though it may look a bit shabby on the outside, it\'s a warm and cozy shelter. Inside, the aroma of fresh bread still permeates the air. Many a weary traveler has made camp in this shelter, shielded from the horrors of the castle.
A stalk of giant broccoli. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
Seems like this fan hasn\'t been used for a long time. Let\'s put this to good use... if it still works, that is.
The bulbs on these ivies are glowing! These will look great wherever you decide to put them.
An ivy leaf with fresh drops of dew. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
A spider\'s web that\'s been sitting here for ages. Everyone will love it... maybe...
Wooden boards that are illuminated by the moon. Try decorating the wall with these.
Floor tiles that are illuminated by the moon. Try decorating the floor with these.
Panels of lovely redwood. Try decorating the wall with these.
An adorable carpet featuring strawberries and flowers. Try decorating the floor with these.
A sleeper sofa made from a pristine strawberry sandwich. Just looking at it makes you feel like you are home.
A sleeper sofa made from a pristine strawberry sandwich. WITH UPGRADES: an armrest, better shade, and a basket of snacks! Your cozy and peaceful gaming session with the Pocket Strawberry begins now!
A sleeper sofa made from a pristine strawberry sandwich, alongside an armrest, fancy shade, and a basket of snacks. Your cozy and relaxing weekend filled with naps begins now!
A toolbox for all sorts of magical devices. What a lucky find!
A jar full of strawberry jam. Everyone loves strawberries!
A jar full of raspberry syrup. Everyone loves raspberries!
A blob of jam. Should it really be stored outside...?
A poster featuring a tasty, ripe strawberry. Just looking at it makes you feel like you are home.
A set of stickers featuring strawberries and jam. Let\'s put them to good use.
These light bulbs give off a warm, radiating glow. Just looking at them makes you feel like you are home.
This badge has been polished beyond your typical mirror shine. This dazzling and glistening prize of honor is the reason why Sheriff Whiskerton keeps a zealous watch over the kitchen.
A deep investigation of a crime network? Or an attempt to untangle a conspiracy? Anyhow, let\'s hang it up somewhere.
Disturbance of the peace? Vandalism of castle property? Not in this sheriff\'s kitchen...! If you break the law, then you\'ll be confined right here with a rickety stool and broken TV.
A refined and perfect scratch sofa. It\'ll look good wherever you decide to put it.
It\'s a mini stool. It serves its purpose.
Ooh, catnip! It must be meow lucky day!
An old pile of \"Best Kitty\" badges. What a collection!
A mini stack table for all your snacking needs. Just looking at it makes you feel like you are home.
A perfect rug for scratching. Everyone will love it!
Sturdy and solid stone tiles. Try decorating the wall with these.
Sturdy and solid stone tiles. Try decorating the floor with these.
Hm, what\'s that? You think this apparatus is someone\'s tea, brewing away? Nonsense! Close your eyes and relax. The burbling sound of water is so relaxing, don\'t you think?
These Jellies seem to glisten just like the stars in the night sky. Rumor has it that this globe will tell you when your tea is perfect and ready for consumption.
A table with high-quality, well-trimmed herbs. What a lucky find!
A stool made from rosewood. It serves its purpose.
A jar that used to store some aged juice. It\'ll look good wherever you decide to put it!
A basket for storing herbs. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
The sun has set and twilight is upon us. Just looking at it makes you feel like you are home.
The sun has set and twilight is upon us. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
A complicated set of instructions for creating a potion of some sort. What a lucky find!
These stone bricks have an earthy and herbal aroma. Try decorating the wall with these.
These stone tiles have an earthy and herbal aroma. Try decorating the floor with these.
Did We Just Become Best Friends?
GingerBrave was the first Cookie to escape from the Witch\'s oven. It is unknown how this Cookie came to life, but rumor has it that the Witch accidentally used magic powder instead of ginger powder.

Shyness can be quite advantageous. Why? Strawberry Cookie contains no real strawberries, only the flavoring. Were she as active and energetic as other Cookies, her artificial strawberry fragrance would have worn off in no time! Strawberry Cookie feels so ashamed of her main ingredient, she\'d never want the truth to come out. If only she understood that this yummy strawberry scent is one of the many reasons other Cookies love her!

Maybe the Witch thought GingerBrave seemed lonely all by himself, because she baked GingerBright with the leftover dough from making GingerBrave. Sweet and bubbly GingerBright is full of life. But this smart Cookie clearly knows that it would be a bad idea to offer her lollipop to GingerBrave.

Angel Cookie is trying to master the art of flying but can\'t rise higher than a teeny tiny bit above the ground just yet! Angel Cookie\'s favorite animals are penguins, ostriches, and baby chicks. Can you guess why? The Cookie\'s shiny golden curls are truly special. Not only do they grant their owner healing powers, they are remarkably lovely to look at!

Zombie Cookie was thoroughly underbaked and slopped carelessly with strawberry jam and melted chocolate. But you see, the key ingredient for Zombie Cookie is a pinch of zombie cells to the dough. And no need to worry about getting your own zombie cells! They can be easily acquired at the local cemetery. This Cookie refuses to die, but it sure likes to just lie there...

Devil Cookie is mysterious in many ways. This Cookie might look hot and spicy but tastes like fizzy cola. According to a trustworthy source, they are made of bat extract and a few drops of carbonated beverage. Devil Cookie\'s ultrasonic powers allow them to see flying Spectral Jellies invisible to the others. Catching those Jellies unleashes the feared Super Devil.

Wizard Cookie came to possess the Witch\'s Candy Wand by accident (or not?). Within it, he discovered unique magical powers. His popping candy ice cream cone hat is the finishing touch to his wizard look. Frequently used spells include the festive Hocus-Party-Pocus and Abra-Cookie-Cadabra, which brings unexpected luck and fun.

Behind her endearing smile and adorable looks, Cherry Cookie hides a destructive nature. A real troublemaker decorated with bright red cherry syrup, she enjoys pulling destructive pranks. She especially enjoys throwing her Cherry Bombs, which explode like fireworks. Believe it or not, the sweet, invigorating smell of cherry black powder in the air can blow any stress away!

Made of snow, sugar, and an unknown secret ingredient, this Cookie was once very lonely, wandering through a vast snowy field. Then one day, Snow Sugar Cookie found a magic wand that could summon snow creatures and wouldn\'t melt even in the oven. The Cookie quickly learned to summon friends like the Sea Snow Cone and the Great Snow King and was never lonely again.

Made from the freshest of grapes, the fruit of the gods, this smart Cookie cares only about one thing: Research! She is always doing wild calculations, trying to figure out how to transform the elements. And she knows that being lazy or sitting idly by will achieve nothing. In order to acquire something of value, one must give something of value in returnthat\'s Alchemist Cookie\'s theory, at least.

The Witch, busy baking several Cookies at once, had forgotten to use her favorite high-quality grapes. Instead, she stored them in oak barrels and let age for a long, long time. And with that special grape juice, she made Vampire Cookie. Naturally, it was difficult for Vampire Cookie to wake up at firstafter all, his dough contained more than 10% of strong grape juice! Unlike the other Cookies, Vampire Cookie prefers to do nothing but enjoy life. He wasn\'t even bothered by the heat of the oven and only escaped because his sister Alchemist Cookie dragged him outside. With his pale face and smug posture, he likes to relax with a nice glass of grape juice and ponder the meaning of life.

This flavorful Cookie is made out of an entire cheesecake. Since she has never known a life without Coins, she likes to throw luxurious parties and set off Coin Fireworks for her friends. She\'s always stylish, using only the finest cheese, as she casually trots along. It\'s hard to resist the temptation to devour this deliciously decadent Cookie.

For a long time, there have been only rumors of Adventurer Cookie\'s travels far and wide beyond the Witch\'s island, but now he\'s back and ready to guide the other Cookies into uncharted territories of a new exciting world. Adventurer Cookie has got quite a lot of stories to tell: about legendary dragons, kingdoms in ruins, but... So little time! His thirst for the unknown is unquenchable, and he will continue to roam the wide world as long as possible.

Blackberry Cookie always wears a reserved look, but it would be hard to find a more caring and devoted Cookie. She has been working at one prestigious household for a long time, and is praised for her miraculous ability to do a multitude of tasks in virtually no time! Despite Blackberry\'s tightest schedule, she always finds the time to save the life of her venturesome employer. Perhaps, this is her main duty these days.

Together with a great amount of pepper, a wolf hair had fallen into the cookie dough by accident. Now, whenever Werewolf Cookie feels scared or threatened, his wolf instincts kick in to transform him into a feral beast. A long time ago, when a friend was in great peril, Werewolf Cookie managed to save them by transforming, at a cost. With his true nature revealed to the whole town, he was cast away out of fear and has been living alone in the forests since. With so much pain inside, this Cookie tastes bitter and salty (of tears). Don\'t ask about his scar or try to get close, as he will only push you away...

Even if her dough is 80% cocoa, she\'s always sipping hot cocoa, even during the summer. Her marshmallow hat is so deliciously sweet, she needs to resist the temptation of taking a chunk out of it and dipping it into her cup. Her plump smooth cheeks just add to her charm! When she indulges in a freshly prepared cup of cocoa, all her worries melt away.

His exquisite performance and dashing looks make him a favorite among the Cookies. His Mint Candy Violin gives off a sweet enchanting candy aroma while he plays. Though often called a genius, he refuses to let all this attention go to his head and never forgets his long years as a humble street performer.

Your eyes will start to water if you get too close to this onion-based Cookie! And once she starts crying, she cannot stop. Mainly because her tears consist of onion juice that makes her cry even more. Poor thing, she is terrified of ghosts and weeps when scared. Perhaps one day, she\'ll realize why her surroundings sometimes become ghostly, and clocks suddenly start ticking backwards.

Warm like the sunshine and fresh like the scent of rain, Herb Cookie will ease your mind when you\'re feeling down. Made of fresh green herbs, this Cookie may not be to everyone\'s taste. On rainy days, Herb Cookie loves to listen to the sound of falling raindrops under his trusty leaf umbrella. On warm days, he enjoys the sunshine together with his favorite plant. This Cookie treats all living things and every moment as precious. He believes that the little things that make you laugh or cry are to be cherished, just like a ray of sunshine after the rain.

This is the day! You have received an invitation to the famous Sparkling Party. Sparkling Cookie greets you personally with a dazzling smile and offers a glass of Sparkling Juice. All the guests are fascinated with his impeccable manners and looks: his boyish rolled up sleeves and bouncy bubble hair. It is going to be the best holiday party ever!

Gather some avocados (the more, the better!) ripened under the hot sun (the more ripe, the better!), then mash, mash, MASH! That\'s how you make a healthy and nutritious Avocado Cookie! But you know what terribly lacked nutrients growing up? Her sense of humor! And you will soon know why. Avocado Cookie is a famous master smith. She spends days and nights at the smithy making this and that. It is said that Avocado Cookie can create just about anything! Except for a decent joke, ahem.

A desolate amusement park lies in darkness. Lights flicker on one by one. A merry-go-round begins to rotate slow and steady to a bygone song of the past. The park magically returns to life as a lone pony, embraced by the purest of rainbows, opens their eyes. The silky mane and creamy tail turn into elegant locks of hair. Decorations spring to life as fluttering sugar butterflies. Cream Unicorn Cookie flies around the park with the sugar butterflies in tow. After floating among the attractions, a graceful landing on top of the Ferris wheel concludes the course. A whisper escapes while gazing upon the entirety of the park. \"In the end, all that shines are memories and stars.\" A flashback of the glee and joy of young Cookies running towards the merry-go-round plays before wistful eyes. If only it could turn for eternity... A dream to be a part of the happiness and laughter of children has manifested as a unicorn. The dream never stops, regardless of night or day.

The castle\'s kitchen can become unnaturally chilly. After being exposed to such temperatures for a prolonged period, the highest quality milk separated itself to form a rich and flavorful cream. First Cream Cookie\'s dough contains a large portion of this special and elegant cream, but beyond her cultivated grace lies a cold and frigid glare. It\'s said that First Cream Cookie\'s demeanor became especially frigid after she lost something close to her heart. This Cookie has her own agenda, but no one has ever uncovered what it might be.

Layers upon layers, 128 to be precise, of elegant and crispy dough were meticulously stacked together to create this Cookie. Marble Danish Cookie\'s family once called an entire cabinet of the witch as their domain. In the past, the House of Danish\'s wealth overflowed with the purest of honey, the softest of butter, and even a vault chock-full of Life Potions. As the heir apparent, Marble Danish Cookie always has the family\'s Saber of Honor by his side. Despite having been passed down from generation to generation, this slender blade has never been corroded by rust and remains as pristine and sharp as the day it was first forged. Many have noticed a tinge of bitterness to this Cookie\'s demeanor. Is it because of the cacao within his dough? Or is it due to his once proud family\'s downfall? Regardless, when wielding his blade, there is no sign of bitterness or emotion, only skillful precision and firm conviction.

It\'s no secret that the infamous Apricot Jam Syndicate is despicably good at their craft. The bandits pick their targets clean, not even leaving a speck of dust behind! Keep this on the down-low, but ever heard of the brains of the operation, Sachertorte Cookie? Folks say she lost her home, and had to run all alone \'til the Syndicate took her under their wing. They\'ve grown to be thicker than any thieves, and I tell ya, she\'s one charismatic and deviously smart Cookie. A single whisper and wave of her hand is all it takes for the Syndicate to make their move... And all that chocolate in her dough? Sachertorte Cookie is bitter about something... and she\'s looking for revenge.

Looking for Radish Cookie? Walk past the rows of magicberry bushes, then take a left once you hear the chatty bell peppers! Radish Cookie is always happy to hone her tinkering skills to help maintain the garden. Day in and day out, her enthusiasm for checking the utilities and keeping them in tip-top shape is commendable! But... it can also lead to the occasional clumsy accident. Her nemesis, the syrup pump, always seems to leak and leave a sticky mess all over the garden. But it\'s the heart that counts, right? It\'s alright to be a bit clumsy! Prop yourself up and try again, Radish Cookie!

Rosemary Cookie loves and cares for a well-kempt, extraordinary garden that many a witch would covet! It\'s as if Rosemary Cookie possesses a magical green-thumb. Her aroma and aura is all that\'s needed to calm down the wailing mandrakes and help the stubbornly shy brussels sprouts to peer out and bask in the sun. The garden holds a precious place in her heart, especially since it\'s where Rosemary Cookie and her best friend grew up together. Everyone knows that Rosemary Cookie pours her heart and soul into the garden, which is probably why many Cookies see her as a reliable and a trustworthy friend.

According to the fables of old, only witches could cultivate and handle witchberries. A handful of these berries were added to this Cookie\'s dough... with an unintended stowaway: a single strand of hair from the witch\'s cat. Perhaps this is the reason why Witchberry Cookie is always on the prowl to sate her curiosity! Witchberry Cookie yearns for the ages past, when the Witch\'s Castle welcomed its visitors with freshly-baked cookies. Now that the oven has magically fired up once more, she hopes that its flames will continue burning evermore.
I\'m the life of the party!
May luck be on your side...
Will you hold this for a minute?
No Cookie can resist my charm!
Everyone has fun at my parties!
The road goes ever on and on!
I am merely doing my job.

You have to savor each sip!
One hot cup before we go?
I hope you have a pleasant time!
Why is it so dark here...?
If it isn\'t my favorite customer!
I\'ve got just the drink for you!
I have truly missed this place.
I may be a guest now,
I don\'t look back at the past.
Ain\'t nothin that\'ll stop me, haha!
If I turn it there... and there...?
Nothin like a mug of syrup
The season of bloom will return.
Do I look like a witch?
If I can make it outside...

Irf yu culd hert urp thert roo,
AH! So you want me to heat up that room!
Okay, I\'ll do whatever it takes to help you!
Time to heat this place up!

OH! The heroes who saved our hotel!
Are... you perhaps looking for something?
We\'re gonna dust ourselves with it so that we can catch the bandits!
It pains me to even consider using such a precious and important element of cooking for such a purpose...
Hm, I\'ve no clue as to what sort of plan you\'ve got cooking up in your heads...
But if it is oil you seek, we recently received a shipment of the finest olive oil.
Do not mention it, my friend. Once you\'re done with the Syndicate, how about I treat you all to a full-course, gourmet dinner?
But we can\'t stay! We need to keep moving right after we\'ve caught the bandits.
We\'re currently searching for our lost friend, GingerDozer.
Then let\'s make a deal. Once you\'ve found your friend, make your way back here for a proper meal!
Now THAT sounds like a deal!
Do you have baby powder? Because we need some baby powder. We\'re gonna use it to capture the Syndicate!
Well- the manager uses baby powder to trim and shape his mustache... I can\'t just, you know, give it away, like, what if I get fired or...
This Cookie and her friends saved the hotel and the manager might get mad if we don\'t help these heroes... Who, you know, saved the hotel.
What do you mean, \"maybe\"? The manager gave the Golden Key as a gift! Do you know what that means?!
HERE! Take the baby powder! This is all the baby powder we have stored here! Take it for your good cause...!
Hooray! Thank you so very much!
Awww, how nice and sweet, hehe!
We have returned in search of a rope or some form of cordage to apprehend the Syndicate. But it is not an easy thing to find in such an establishment.
Perhaps I can be of some assistance!
I may not look it, but I am quite strong and my pincers were just manicured! If I cut that barrier, perhaps it can provide some length of rope?
I am glad I was able to help. After all, I should be the one thanking you!
Now go get those nasty bandits!
Thank you, and yes, I promise...!
Is something the matter, Marble Danish Cookie?
Well... It\'s just... It feels good to see someone grateful and appreciative of my deeds. It has been a long, long time since I\'ve felt this way.
Okiedokie, time to use this oil!
I\'m quite confident that Sachertorte Cookie\'s rope won\'t be able to bind any of us anymore.
Is something on your mind, GingerBrave?
I just started thinking... Why are Marble Danish Cookie and Sachertorte Cookie fighting in the first place?
They used to be good friends, right? Sharing candy, keeping each other\'s secrets...
There\'s just something I can\'t wrap my head around...
I... Well, I don\'t understand how such good friends can end up fighting like this... It makes me feel sad.
Maybe if we knew the reason, the two of you could just talk and be friends again?
But I do remember one thing, very clearly.
The manor was empty. Only I remained, as I was feeling ill.
That day, a band of thieves entered my family\'s vault.
I tried to fend them off with a sword...
And thus, here we are today.
Grrr... We need to teach them a lesson!
We should hurry and finish this!
Fascinating... Even I did not notice her absence.
I get the feeling we\'ll bump into her again down the road. For now, we\'ve got some bandits to apprehend!
Excellent. They\'re all in one place.
Sachertorte Cookie! Make a run for it! We\'ll buy you some time.
You should have fled when you had the chance.
And leave my colleagues behind? Unlike you, we look out for each other.
Thick as thieves... The saying must be true then.
Is it not natural to never abandon your friends and colleagues?
Ah, you wouldn\'t know, would you? You would rather accuse and blame instead of choosing the virtuous path.
Aww, poor thing. You don\'t remember, do you?
It matters not. All you need to remember is...
I am always one step ahead!
But we can\'t give up now!
That olive oil really helped, eh?
Still, it was a good idea.
Despite having a plan... the Syndicate has managed to wriggle free from our grasp once more.
Sachertorte Cookie is really smart... and tough.
I beg to differ. I think Marble Danish Cookie is much more skilled and tougher.
Things could\'ve ended up a lot worse if you didn\'t cover us when the smoke hit, Marble Danish Cookie.
Marble Danish Cookie would\'ve won all by himself, even without us here!
Without you, I would not have made it this far.
friends must have each other\'s backs, no?
You know, I\'ll be honest... At first, I thought you were nothing but a strangely stubborn, snobbish Cookie.
But you\'re not so bad, are ya, you big softy.
Shall we continue our pursuit and finally put an end to this?
We\'re with you, Marble Danish Cookie!
I bet the rope that Witchberry Cookie told us to pack can get us out here.
But the ceiling\'s really high up there...
If you\'re curious as to the whereabouts of my colleagues... I sent them off to pack up our valuables and belongings.
I believe it is finally time to put an end to this little game of cat and mouse now.
Here\'s how things will proceed, listen closely, little ones.
I will make you stop this incessant pursuit. Then, I shall return to my friends. As simple as one, two, three.
I\'m guessing that the compass is part of your so-called \"belongings\"?
It might be a better idea for us to just ignore her and go straight for the compass.
Speak up; it\'s not manners to mumble.
Do you truly believe you can stop me, all by yourself?
In the end? Maybe I can, maybe I cannot.
I won\'t give you the satisfaction.
As much as I am lividly enjoying this conversation...
I must point out that everything you wished for is right here.
And since we have everything we need, and all parties are present... Let us enjoy this night, slowly.
Let\'s put an end to this!
There was once a young master,
Please keep it a secret until then.
Can you guess how the story goes?
What fate fell upon the Treasure Keeper when the boy\'s parents found out?
What happened to the Treasure Keeper after that?
You still don\'t see the error of your ways?
Haha! I knew you had it in you!
Still avoiding the truth, are we?
My parents... They told me you faced a difficult burden.
That you had no choice but to leave far, far away.
In my search for you, with tears in my eyes, they told me this tale. To not be concerned with your whereabouts. I remember it clearly...
Had you managed to confess the truth, my opinion of them may have remained unchanged.
I trusted you. I trusted you... and waited for you. I waited until the day I was banished.
No... Even after my shameful banishment, I kept waiting, every day and night.
He\'ll come around and explain the truth to everyone! He\'ll make things right and apologize. The young master will say he\'s sorry.
Ah, the yesteryears of living in na?vet? and ignorance.
And you? You buried every memory and lived life without a single worry or regret.
The Syndicate took me under their wing, became my new family. And you, oh good heir and young master of the family...
I am not through with you yet.
You\'re a fool if you think
You heard correct. I am sorry.
My immaturity as a youth has caused you much pain.
The fact that I had no recollection of such events has only magnified your pain.
To make matters worse, I resented you without recognizing my own mistakes.
And for that... I am truly, deeply sorry.
Hm. Time has passed far too long for your apology to hold any merit.
I am not asking for your forgiveness. Nor am I asking for you to forgive my family.
I wished to convey, no... I needed to say it. I needed to say it a long, long time ago.
You are entitled to reject it, but... My apology has been long overdue.
You never were the punctual sort.
Look! Sacher... Sach...torte Cookie left the compass behind!
Or maybe... she forgot to take it.
Or maybeee! Maybe she finally forgave Marble Danish Cookie...?
She has such a weird way of showing forgiveness!
It doesn\'t matter. We found the compass!
I\'m pretty sure we can find GingerDozer on our own.
I don\'t know why... but I just feel like we can and will!
Besides, this compass means a lot to you and your family!
But why? It belongs to your family! Without it, House Danish is-
House Danish has sullied its name by clinging onto relics and treasures, while hurting those close to the family. I will not let history repeat itself.
Even without treasures and riches, I, as a member of House Danish, can still offer aid and assistance to those in need.
Which is the path I am taking now.
You helped me through my turbulent quest.
Is that... THE GOLDEN KEY?! Where did you find it?
Well, I must say, that it\'s quite a conundrum!
The Syndicate has left a hefty sum of Coins with a note saying, \"Fees and expenditures for an exquisite and entertaining stay\".
Hooray! So everything\'s worked out in the end!
So we can... finally use the compass?
But er... how does this thing work?
Hold the compass tight and imagine where you wish to go.
Then, with a heart full of hope, ask the compass to show you the path.
There are dangers lurking around every corner near the garden.
I know not what creatures you will meet...
But the tales of that place... They send shivers down my spine.
Are you sure you will venture towards such danger?
No matter how scary or dangerous, our friend needs us!
... You are, indeed, a rather odd Cookie.
Do not hesitate to ask for help.
Welp. I guess this is it!
May your dough remain crispy and fresh.

This kitchen is always ready to welcome guests! And something smells delicious! Just a whiff of the aromas from this kitchen is enough to warm the heart. Today\'s menu? A steaming hot bowl of mushroom soup with a side of fire-grilled Jellies.
This toasty shelter ensures that chilly Cookies that have stayed in the cool kitchen for too long will regain their freshness and sweet, fragrant aroma after a good night\'s rest.
This storeroom doesn\'t contain the typical sort of things you\'d see in storage. Who left these strange and eerie things in here?
Cookies need Life Potions in order to stay crispy and fresh. This laboratory seems to have been made for researching methods to create Life Potions.
The fragrant strawberry scent makes it easy to figure out which room the Cookie stayed in!

The diligent but sometimes zealous Sheriff Whiskerton\'s office. The sheriff is determined to maintain order in the kitchen. Judging from the pile of badges and commendations, the sheriff has been very, very busy.

The secret behind the exquisite cheese dishes of Cheesehaven lies within this very cellar! All types of cheeses are well-preserved in this homely storeroom. Sometimes, it seems like small pieces of cheese magically come to life and make a break for it.

Though humble and a bit untidy, this cozy guestroom is enough to provide comfort and relaxation for the weary traveler. The creaky floorboards are an extra bonus, for they\'re noisy enough to drown out the pesky meowing from outside.

It\'s best not to linger too long in the sauna... especially this one.  This particular sauna features a root of ginseng in a hot water bath that looks eerily similar to a teapot. It looks happy to be in the sauna though, right?

This office is decorated with the prestigious Golden Key that is awarded to only the best hotels. But rumor has it that the one in the office is a fake, and the real one is hidden away somewhere for security reasons... could it be true?

Boasting round-the-clock, impenetrable security, the Treasure Vault stores precious items, costly gems, and rare artifacts of all sorts. Some say the Vault contains more treasures than the auction can handle.
A guest wearing a mysterious chocolate mask stayed in this room. The guest refused to let the employees help with his strange bag, that leaked apricot jam onto the floor and made it sticky.
A lively yet elegant guest stayed in this room. As for room service, they often requested Scarab Jellies.
The Grand Cabinet Hotel contains many luxurious rooms, but the Deluxe Room really takes the cake. It\'s so comfortable that guests are unable to settle for just a single visit.

A bustling kitchen with chefs tirelessly igniting their passion and stoves. Chop with efficiency! Sear with zeal! Bark orders loud and clear! Not a single gram of passion is to be spared when preparing meals for the esteemed guests!

If your icing has become messy and unkempt after a long journey, why not pay a visit to Butter & Icing Parlor? This proud establishment uses only the finest of cream shampoos followed by professional drying and styling that\'s hotter than any oven. A single visit here will have you looking, and feeling, like a freshly baked Cookie!

A fine-dining restaurant established in homage to the chef\'s hometown. This place has everything! From enchanting music to a mystifying ambiance, and to top it all off, a plethora of mindblowing dishes for every palate. No visit to the Grand Cabinet Hotel is complete without dining at Le Maquereau Bleu!
Do you want to toughen up your dough? Come to Cabinet Fitness! Using their wide array of exercise equipment, anyone can become a tough Cookie!

This room hasn\'t been open to guests for a long time, and now a thick layer of dust has gathered on every surface. However, it\'s full of objects from the time when The Grand Cabinet Hotel served as the residence for a very powerful family.

A room that has been locked away from guests for years and years. It might be old and dilapidated, but it\'s filled with all kinds of treasures. Sometimes the manager stops by and opens the door of the old wardrobe inside... what could be hidden in there?

A juice bar where you can taste a variety of aged fruit juice, from sweet to tangy, to extremely inventive. Come on in and take a seat! Listen to the mellow music and soak in the atmosphere as your week-long exhaustion melts away.
Head Chef\'s Pride, Marlin Copper Plate

A moonlit window bathes the kitchen with a pale, blue glow.
Deep within the oven, it feels as if the flames and heat

Wizard Cookie vowed to never give up his research into replicating Life Potions. But every once in a while, a few essential ingredients went missing, as if someone was deliberately hiding them... A ghost, perhaps?
Wizard Cookie succeeded in conjuring a cauldron full of Life Potions! His calculations may have been a tad off since he created a bit too much to handle, but nonetheless, a job well done!
Four Cookies on an epic quest! Let\'s march forward
GingerDozer has been detained by Sheriff Whiskerton!
Unlike most Cookies, GingerDozer seems happy to hear about the witch? Are you still sleepy...???
Cheesehaven is an incredibly busy place and the Cookies have learned first-hand just how busy it can be. But seeing the customers enjoying the evening did bring a smile to everyone\'s faces.
GingerDozer has been captured by Sheriff Whiskerton once more. Don\'t worry, GingerDozer! We\'re coming for you!
The Cookies are off to rescue GingerDozer! Rescuing a friend is more important than escaping from the castle!
Our tale begins deep within the spooky, eerie witch\'s castle...
GingerBrave is awakened by a cheery voice: \"Oh! There\'s an exhausted, crumbly Cookie here! Wakey-wakey!\
GingerDozer is still being detained by, a now very angry, Sheriff Whiskerton! Time is of the essence!
Sachertorte Cookie has booked the best seat in the Grand Cabinet Hotel\'s auction house. And she\'s not willing to give it up.
The auction house is abuzz with whispers and murmurs. The marvelous and regal Marble Danish Cookie is attending tonight\'s auction!
When a prideful Cookie realized the error of his ways, he extended a heartfelt apology with a deep bow, another Cookie\'s cold heart began to thaw.

A long time ago, a famous explorer decided to retire and enter the hotel business. While traveling the world, the manager claims to have befriended a small giant, who later gave the manager a wristwatch as a farewell gift. No one has verified if this tale is true... And no one has been able to verify if the time is showing 3:38 or 12:23 either.
Remove the item from the parcel.
Clean up the piles of paper.
Now where, oh where, are you...
I\'m sure it\'s here somewhere in this... mess.
Myaha, of course. You probably knew it and came here anyway! There\'s lots and lots of fun stuff to find here!
But, erm... Oh, but before I give you a grand tour, I should probably clean up the place first.
And if you see anything that looks important, let me know and I\'ll take care of it!
Myahaha! It\'s a stash of witchberries!
(They just opened the box! Like, just, opened it! What if a Jelly Worm jumped out from there? Are they brave? Or just... careless?)
You know what witchberries are, right? They\'re not your ordinary berries!
Only witches can grow these! They\'re as dark as the night and sweet as pure magic!
A single witchberry is so sweet, it\'ll give you inspiring ideas and bursts of energy!
Now ya see how valuable witchberries can be, myah?
It\'s only natural that I resemble the witch!
Eh? You\'re curious about the witches of the past?
They left behind a lot of things, like recipes and old spells.
AAAH! You found my teaspoon! I\'ve been looking for it for AGES!
When I was a freshly baked Cookie, there were witches who wanted to bake more Cookies who could fly on teaspoons.
But I\'m the only one!!! The only Cookie who can fly on a teaspoon! Everyone else failed because MY teaspoon is special!
Myeh... Maybe one day, there\'ll be another teaspoon flying Cookie. But for now, its just me!
What happened to the failed Cookies? What usually happens to Cookies, of course. The witch\'s minions had them for snacks!
You\'ve never heard of the witch\'s minions? Wow, you really are full of questions, aren\'t you... Where\'ve you been all this time... Under a rock?
They\'re all close friends of the witch. And many of them are strange and magical creatures of all shapes and sizes.
There was this one creature who gets really spiky and sharp when angered...
There\'s also a couple of nocturnal foragers who are really good at finding fruits and flowers, but WOW are they NOISY!
Then there\'s the one with wings who can fly really far and flap to create gusts of wind.
All the minions are super scary too!
It\'s an extra special, super secret ingredient too! Guess what it was!
With glossy, creamy fur and eyes that glisten like pure peppermint candy... That\'s right! My dough contains a single cat hair!
And not just any cat! This cat is like royalty! The boss of bosses! The head honcho! And that\'s why I\'m not scared of the witch\'s minions.
Hey... What\'s that suspicious look in your eye? You don\'t believe me, do you?!
You found a ball of fur back there? Psssh... Balls of fur don\'t just appear out of nowhere-
That pesky, no good, annoying...! I\'m outta here! And I suggest you do the same!
Tap repeatedly to scare the cat!

You won\'t get away with this!

A plushie in the shape of Choco Drop. It looks so huggable! And look at its adorable smile!
It\'s said that an extra layer of icing can make anyone feel better!
A spare skull-shaped button kept in pristine condition. It\'s just in case a button goes missing!
A plushie in the shape of Cheese Drop. It looks so cuddly! And look at those adorable eyes!
Do you know how many swings it takes to break a lollipop? Regardless, it\'s always a good idea to keep a spare lollipop around! Many, many spares...!
It appears that a lollipop has been shattered into many pieces. Some say that Cookievorous Plants love these things.
A piece of strawberry jelly that has become a solid chunk. It looks like it might\'ve been a part of Strawberry Cookie\'s bag at one point.
A portable gaming device that has all the latest games, now with increased resolution, graphics, and storage! Say goodbye to boredom!

A vial of Life Potion that failed because, well, there\'s no Life in it. Strawberry Cookie couldn\'t bear to throw away Wizard Cookie\'s first experiment. After all, failures can also serve as precious memories.

Wizard Cookie always wears this scarf so that others can\'t see him practicing spells in silence. Many mistake this scarf as a beard, but it\'s still unknown if Wizard Cookie wants it to be seen as a beard.
This particular candy is said to give you a shocking bolt of inspiration once you pop it into your mouth! The side effects of eating too many of these are unknown, so proceed with caution!
Wizard Cookie has learned so many spells that it\'s a bit difficult to keep track of all of them. He secretly began writing them down to prevent forgetting about them.
The parasol known only as Clemens was separated from its fellow umbrellas. Scared and alone, Clemens was rescued by Sachertorte Cookie. The two are now an inseparable pair.

This seemingly innocent shard of ceramic used to be a reminder and symbol of revenge for Sachertorte Cookie. After hearing Marble Danish Cookie\'s heartfelt apology, Sachertorte Cookie no longer feels anger when looking upon this fragment.
A brooch crafted when the Apricot Jam Syndicate was first formed. Sachertorte Cookie only wears this on extremely special occasions.
Feathers that seem to have an angelic nature to them. Just looking at them fills you with a serene calm.
Perhaps the witch who baked Angel Cookie also enjoyed painting eggs. It looks like the eggs grew wings of their own, but just like Angel Cookie, they can only float a tiny bit above the ground.
Want to grow up to become an archangel? Then you should never neglect trumpet practice! Keep practicing and learn to play it like... well, an angel!
This sticky bottle cap is one of Devil Cookie\'s favorite items. Why? Because it smells like cola, of course!
This particular Jelly will open your eyes to a new world of extreme flavors! A fizzy start to a syrupy cola finish, it\'s everyone\'s favorite.
Spectral Jellies seem to follow Devil Cookie everywhere. Some say that Devil Cookie transforms into a monstrous Super Devil after munching on a handful of these... How terrifying!
Always remember... SAFETY FIRST! A pair of industrial-grade protective goggles like these will protect your eyes from the forge\'s light and heat!
Oil extracted from the ripest of avocados. This rich and aromatic oil is said to help keep weapons from rusting and corroding.

Avocado Cookie has crafted an entire arsenal\'s worth of blades, but this one takes the cake! This sword boasts the sharpest of edges with a perfectly balanced weight, extremely useful for getting rid of pathblocking obstacles!
Gloves are a must for keeping the syrup garden in tip-top shape! No more ouches and owies from stinging thorns or pesky vines!
Residents and visitors run to Rosemary Cookie when they wish to file an official complaint. As a responsible gardenkeeper, Rosemary Cookie files each and every complaint in an orderly fashion.
Rosemary Cookie strived to be the greatest gardener since her early childhood. She keeps this pair of tiny scissors as a reminder of her past ambitions and memories.
Witchberry Cookie\'s favorite toy. The berry at the end of its tail fills the room with a fruity and sweet aroma.
You can\'t call yourself a witch without a pointy hat! It\'s like rule number one on how to be a witch! Witchberry Cookie always keeps a spare at home, just in case something happens.
A pendant that can hold a small, miniscule item within. Witchberry Cookie seems to sneak a few peeks at whatever\'s inside from time to time, but no one has ever found out what\'s inside.
Sheet music from Mint Choco Cookie\'s very first performance on stage. These pages are filled with memories of excitement and nervousness, which he will cherish for years to come.
Mint Choco Cookie never leaves home without this polishing cloth. A few wipes with this cloth always leaves his violin looking better than new!
A mug given to Mint Choco Cookie as a gift by a certain fan. On cold days, he enjoys a cup of hot cocoa with extra marshmallows. And he always remembers to use this mug every time!
Any Cookie devoted to swordsmanship knows the importance of keeping a high-quality cotton cloth close by at all times. After training, you must never forget to polish your blade!
Cuffs delicately engraved with the family crest of House Danish. Marble Danish Cookie wears these as a way to remember his family\'s proud and honorable past.

A certain Cookie who once deeply cared for the young Marble Danish Cookie would share these lovely candies with him, and they\'d never fail to make him smile from ear to ear. A long time has passed... and these candies are the only solace for a certain lone and somber Cookie.

Not a drop of syrup in sight...
Almost as dry as the oven...
I\'m goin\' back to the hotel!
Built it all myself from scraps!
These skills of mine are needed
And now, here I am, all alone.
So I can\'t just give it to ya.
I know just the spot to visit!
This is the best news ever!
Feast your eyes on a magical engineering marvel!
This faucet supplies the garden with fresh syrup!
That\'s exactly why we\'re here! We can fix it! After all, I am a skilled engineer and tinkerer!
Oh ho! Syrup, here we come!
Hm... You mentioned the Churro Golem before. Did the golem break this?
Correctomundo! We\'ve been repeating history forever...!
I fix it, the Churro Golem breaks it, again and again.
That lunk of dough and sugar is really strong! And a quick runner too!
There are so many broken faucets around the garden... And I\'m just one engineer...
If you\'re willing to help, I\'m 100% sure we can fix up this faucet in a jiffy!
And once it\'s fixed, y\'all can have a proper drink to quench that thirst!
Yes, just like that, it seems.
Hooray! Let\'s hurry up and start fixing things!
So... what do we need to do?
Fixin\' something this big calls for bigger tools!
The witch should\'ve left behind a bunch of things nearby.
Oh, there\'s a big winding, handle thingy!
Yup, and looks like it\'ll be perfect for the faucet!
It\'ll be perfect for sealing a leak!
This is awesome! I haven\'t felt this excited in a long time!
If you can bring me the stuff, I\'ll be able to fix the faucet in no time!
Alrighty! Let\'s work together to fix that faucet!
Those are two of my most favorite words!!!
This is all thanks to you, friends!
So this is what the garden
It\'s been a while, hasn\'t it?
These new friends of mine helped!
Let\'s save the hello\'s for later!
We need to help the others!
Everyone\'s awake! Thanks for helpin out once more!
Hehe... We\'re glad to be of help...!
Erm, excuse me...? Why was everyone sleeping in the ground?
Ya heard about how the garden dried up once the faucets broke?
Well, we can\'t live in such a dry spot. So we decided to hide underground, where the dirt was still kinda wet.
It\'s all because of that Churro Golem...
I\'d bet a whole bushel of crops that the other residents are deep underground too. But thanks to y\'all, we\'re back on top!
Hehe, it was all Radish Cookie. We just helped a bit is all!
There\'s an ole sayin\' in these here parts.
If ya receive a helpin\' hand, ya gotta pay back with BOTH hands.
If it\'s okay with ya, I\'d like to repay ya somehow!
We appreciate it, but it\'s quite unnecessary.
Ya sure? Shucks, I should at least treat ya to a lil snack at least, but if you insis-
-Well, if you insist!!! We are extremely grateful to accept!
There should be some preserved snacks stored in the mill.
Wooow! Do y\'all know what this means?
The farmers don\'t just let anyone into the mill!
It took me years to get invited to the mill! This means y\'all\'re already friends, haha!
Off we go! Off we go!
Wow, y\'all must\'ve been really parched!
Here, try some candy powder as well!
This here candy powder is the signature crop of the Syrup Garden!
It\'s made from the sweetest candies that grow deep in the syrup-soaked soil! Go ahead, try some!
Yummy! Is this what snow tastes like???
If you don\'t mind my askin\', how\'d y\'all end up here?
I dunno how long it\'s been since we\'ve had outsiders come to these here parts.
He was... taken by the witch.
Our friend\'s name is GingerDozer. He\'s always sleepy and sorta cries a lot...
We think he was taken somewhere along this way.
Ain\'t seen anything either. After all, we been sleepin\' in the ground for who knows how long.
Hey, I\'ve got an idea. Why don\'t y\'all ask Rosemary Cookie for help?
She knows the Syrup Garden\'s in\'s and out\'s!
Oh boy, where do I begin with Rosemary Cookie?
Welp... She\'s the gardener of this place, a real trustworthy and hardworkin\' Cookie.
Rosemary Cookie leads the garden and our community, smart and wise that one.
So that\'s why you know so much about this garden! Because you know the gardener!
Where can we find Rosemary Cookie? Can you show us the way?
We can ask her if she knows anything about GingerDozer!
Well.... That\'s the thing. You can\'t really meet her right now.
When the Churro Golem made the garden dry up, Rosemary Cookie also dried up a bit too...
So... if the garden isn\'t dry anymore, we could meet Rosemary Cookie?!
And Rosemary Cookie is why you were so determined to fix the faucets, right, Radish Cookie?
Exactamundo. I\'m gonna do whatever it takes to bring this garden back to life!
And I\'m gonna see Rosemary Cookie again, no matter what!
Huh? We literally just fixed it!
Don\'t worry! I\'m sure Radish Cookie\'ll be able to fix it up again!
The repairin\' wasn\'t faulty or anything...
You\'re around here somewhere, ain\'t ya, Churro Golem?
You fixed that in a jiffy!
It\'s cuz we fixed the faucet!
You won\'t scare us that easily!
We won\'t let you hurt anyone!
Why are you trying to ruin it?!
Why did I ever learn magic...
This is really all thanks to you!
You woke up the residents, you fixed the faucet, you even taught the Churro Golem a lesson!
I never imagined getting so much done in such a short time was possible!
Haha, we make a pretty good team, don\'t we? Nothing beats teamwork!
You mentioned that you were looking for a friend of yours, right? GingerDozer?
Rosemary Cookie knows everything. She\'ll know where GingerDozer is!
I\'ll take you to meet Rosemary Cookie!
But, I\'ll need your help once more. We need to wake her up first!
How do we wake her up?
It\'s a magic thingamabob apparatus in the middle of the garden that\'s been enchanted to create syrup.
A conjuration spell? Or perhaps evocation? Regardless, it\'s one of the most advanced forms of magic!
Before the Sweet Heart malfunctioned, there was enough syrup to keep the garden in tip-top shape with no hassle!
Rosemary Cookie and I kept an eye on it at all times to maintain peak efficiency.
If we can get the Sweet Heart fired up, the entire garden might be able to return to its former glory!
And Rosemary Cookie will be restored to her cheerful self!
And then she\'ll help us find out where GingerDozer is?
Alright, Radish Cookie! We\'ll help you fix the Sweet Heart!
For Rosemary Cookie and the Syrup Garden! Woohoo!
Hey look! There\'s some syrup on that broken pipe!
The Churro Golem should apologize for breaking that faucet!
This place is still sorta dry...
The Syrup Garden won\'t come back with just a single faucet.
Only the Sweet Heart is powerful enough to revitalize the entire garden, right?
Correctamundo. But we can\'t just leave this pipe broken like this.
There\'s gotta be a broken faucet nearby. Let\'s handle that before we move on!
Sounds like a plan! Just tell us what to do!
