Angel Cookie\'s Peaceful Room of Holiness
Devil Cookie\'s Room of Carbonated Evil
Snow Sugar Cookie\'s Warm Winter Room
Towards the Unknown! Adventurer Cookie\'s Room
Cocoa Cookie\'s Sweet and Warm Room
Mint Choco Cookie\'s Room of Sweet Melodies
The Almighty Blacksmith Avocado Cookie\'s Room
Cream Unicorn\'s Room of Dreams and Sweets
Marble Danish Cookie\'s Room, Past to Present

A small kitten was snooping around a kitchen full of fragrant teas and delicious desserts when it stumbled across a block of crumbly cheese. By looking at its face and body covered in powdered cheese, one can tell that this curious feline is quite the messy eater. It\'s difficult to tell whether this friendly critter is a cat or a cheese ball. Either way, LOOK AT THAT SMILE! So adorbs.

Neither the fearsome Sheriff or the daunting difficulties that come with developing an all new assortment of gourmet cheese platters can stand in the way of the Cheesemaster\'s passion! This master bartender and chef is always working hard to provide new and delicious dishes to the customers of his Squeakchelin star tavern, the Cheesehaven!
A simple room decorated by GingerBrave after he escaped from the oven. It may not be fancy, but it\'s filled with the lovely scent of freshly baked Cookies.

Are you worried about Strawberry Cookie never leaving her room? You may think it\'s because of her timid nature, but once you see her cool game room full of all her favorite items, you\'ll change your mind!
This room is full of GingerBright\'s favorite candies. Want to pay her a visit? A smile from GingerBright and a piece of delectable candy is sure to brighten up your day!
If you want to know what heaven looks like, pay Angel Cookie a visit! Cozy feather beds, heavenly light from above, and the sweet sound of trumpets... Ah, what a blessing!
Did you hear the floor creak just now? Urgh... Did you hear that strange groan? Don\'t be scared! It\'s just the sound of Zombie Cookie waking up from its nap.

Suspicious cackling can be heard from Devil Cookie\'s room every night. If you take a peek inside, you\'ll see Devil Cookie scribbling on a certain Cookie\'s poster... apparently this is how the Cookie maintains its characteristic fizz.
Potion recipes, a new magic circle, and a shocking magic enhancement formula. This room, full of books and documents on complex and mysterious magical formulas, must be a paradise to Wizard Cookie!

If you\'re tired of your boring day-to-day life, try visiting Cherry Cookie\'s Room! This Cookie definitely knows how to have fun. I mean, once you find a little cherry bomb hidden in the corner of this adorable room... you won\'t be bored anymore, right?
A room full of snow, sugar, and ice that looks super chilly but somehow comfortable. Perhaps it\'s thanks to their wonderful friends that Snow Sugar Cookie doesn\'t feel cold at all anymore!

Alchemist Cookie\'s room is where she has the freedom to experiment with combining substances according to her own formulas. But be careful, even a slight mistake can lead to drastically different results!

The moment you enter this room, you\'ll be greeted with the rich aroma of grape juice! The fragrant scent and Vampire Cookie telling you to just take it easy will have you feeling sleepy in no time, so watch out.

Cheesecake Cookie\'s room is not just a room, but a PARTY! This place is full of flashing lights, upbeat music, and even sparkles! Just look at the countless, colorful party supplies; this party never stops!

Judging from all the exploration memorabilia around the room, it\'s clear to see this room belongs to Adventurer Cookie. But it\'ll be tough to actually meet him, since he\'s always running off on a new journey!

Blackberry Cookie usually manages everything in the mansion, but when she rests in her own room, her mysterious energy somehow becomes even stronger?! Every item in the room seems to put itself back into place... mysterious indeed.

Werewolf Cookie fears nothing more than unintentionally hurting someone, which is why he chose a room in such a secluded place. Even if you try to visit the pepper-scented room, all you\'ll see is a furry little thing scurrying away to hide, yet wagging his tail.

If you follow that sweet, mellow scent, you\'ll soon find yourself in Cocoa Cookie\'s room! She always has a mug of hot cocoa topped with marshmallows ready, so you can have one whenever you\'d like. Cocoa is just the best!

Perhaps it\'s because he spent so many years off the stage, but despite being hailed as a musical genius, Mint Choco Cookie still deeply cherishes the stage. He never misses a day of violin practice, so wonderful music can always be heard from his room.

An adorable room that seems to be decorated with smaller Cookies in mind. As you approach Onion Cookie who\'s playing alone with her toys, tears start streaming down her face. Could it be the onion juice? Or maybe it\'s because she can\'t leave this room...
There\'s been more than a few Cookies that have fallen for Sparkling Cookie\'s deadly charm! He always offers a drink with a polite smile. Maybe that\'s why his cocktail bar is full again today!

Don\'t be surprised if you feel the heat from this room before you even enter! In Avocado Cookie\'s room, there are always new weapons and ideas coming to life. The fire in this room won\'t go out today, tomorrow, or... well, ever!
Cream Unicorn Cookie\'s Room is graced by a beautiful rainbow both day and night. This room sparkles like an everlasting dream, evoking good memories for everyone who visits.
Marble Danish Cookie\'s room is where all the family treasures are kept. Look inside to get a glimpse of the once majestic Danish family!

Carefully selected sparkling jewelry, well-made furniture, and luxurious desserts... Sachertorte Cookie\'s room really has everything. But wait! Isn\'t that the jewelry piece that was lost a some mansion part not long ago?

Anything that\'s broken is fixed in a jiffy! Tightening screws, polishing, and re-connecting broken wires... it\'s no wonder Radish Cookie\'s room is always so messy and noisy! This room is overflowing with passion!

A room full of Rosemary Cookie\'s favorite things. A beautiful flower planter, a gardening guide, a fragrant bouquet garni, and a chair gifted to her by a certain Cookie! Even the usually poker-faced Rosemary Cookie can\'t hide her smile when she enters this room.
The culmination of countless hours of research and intricate calculations! This concoction is made using fresh grapes, said to be the fruit of the gods, but what could its purpose be?
Curious about the secrets of alchemy? Give this journal a read! It is filled with meticulous records for each experiment, successful or not, Alchemist Cookie carried out so far.
Explosions are a common occurrence in the alchemical laboratory. That\'s why glasses made to withstand spontaneous exothermic reactions are a must!
This cupcake is sure to burst with sweetness in your mouth! You can count on Cherry Cookie to bring it when going to picnics with a certain Cookie.
A cute ribbon dyed with sweet and sour cherry syrup. It is attached to Cherry Cookie\'s cloak at all times.
Don\'t underestimate these just because they\'re smaller than cherry bombs! This bundle of adorable firecrackers is easy to carry around for when you want to have a blast.
Adventurer Cookie\'s trusty old friend. No matter how risk-filled the adventurewith this rope at hand the Cookie has nothing to fear!
A compass is essential when going to explore lands far and wide! As a veteran among veterans, Adventurer Cookie always keeps this at his side.

A treasure map so old that it might just crumble by a careless touch. What could the missing part of the map have shown? Adventurer Cookie\'s eyes sparkle with excitement as he plans his next excursion.
A large bone carried by Zombie Cookie. Maybe it\'s best not to ask why it\'s covered in strawberry jam...
A flower decorating Zombie Cookie\'s bedside. It has a ribbon tied to it, but who could have put it there?
This patched-up plushie has been through a lot. The colors have faded, and it might not look like it once used to, but maybe it just wants to resemble a dear friend!
A glass dome containing sparkling memories. Although the memories inside may have been forgotten by their original owner, Cream Unicorn Cookie will always remember.
A unicorn doll that\'s sure to bring back happy memories. It was left behind by a young Cookie after playing with Cream Unicorn Cookie, but even that has become a precious memory.
A music box, from which beautiful melodies of never-ending dreams can be heard. If you stay a while and listen, you will be reminded of old memories, gleaming like jewels.
A beautifully designed invitation to a concert. Just opening it up makes you hear beautiful melodies in your head. Cocoa Cookie was overjoyed when she received this.
Knitting with yarn in colors that would suit a certain Cookie well makes Cocoa Cookie\'s heart feel warmer just as much as a steaming cup of cocoa on a snowy winter night.
A cup of hot cocoa, that Cocoa Cookie always seems to be carrying around using both hands. Nothing quite makes a cold winter day like your favorite hot cocoa in your favorite cup!
A watering can, filled to the brim of energy from a warm summer day\'s sunlight. Use this on any soil, and sprouts will start popping up in no time!
The essentials of gardening! Add these hand-made nutrients to your soil and healthy, green sprouts will grow in no time!
The secret to making barren soil fertile in a second! How it\'s made, you ask? Well... You\'ll have to ask Herb Cookie himself!
This set of glasses is reserved for Sparkling Cookie\'s finest guests. Their long, round shape is said to truly bring out the refreshing aroma of any drink poured in them.

A fine bottle given to Sparkling Cookie by a Cookie who loves to party. Filled with fresh and delicious sparkling juice, this bottle is only brought out by Sparkling Cookie on very special occasions for a sip or two.
The cork belonging to the very first bottle opened at the bar. It holds a great amount of sentimental value to Sparkling Cookie.
A must-have for dealing with tangled fur after a long night\'s sleep. This quality brush tidies up even the nastiest tangles with ease!
A necklace given by a certain someone to Werewolf Cookie, as he left his village. It is filled with a desire to grow stronger.

A leather choker with spikes, made for someone who wishes to highlight their fierce nature. Werewolf Cookie often considers using it to keep others away but always ends up putting it back down. Maybe deep down,  he wants someone to come close.
The juice inside this glass gives off a captivating aroma. How about a sip? It is said to greatly improve your mood.
Grape juice extracted from nothing but the freshest, sweetest, and tastiest of grapes. Even Vampire Cookie saves this vintage for very special occasions.

With this, you can make grape juice in your own room! This all-purpose extractor takes care of everything from the ripening to juice extraction, as long as you put the grapes inside first. You don\'t need to askof course Vampire Cookie has one of these.
Late at night, Blackberry Cookie walks down the long, dark corridors, holding this candle to light up the surroundings.
A notebook with every page filled from edge to edge with minuscule memos of things to do. Most appear to have been completed, except one of the oldest entries that still seems to be unfinished.
What good is a notebook without a quill and ink to write things in it! Blackberry Cookie uses these to jot down tomorrow\'s tasks before going to bed.
Onion Cookie\'s favorite doll. Hugging it makes you feel cozy and warm inside.

Doors open on their own, clocks turn backwards, and strange noises echo throughout the hallways. Onion Cookie buries her face in the pillow, hoping for it all to stop. Even going close to this soaked pillow is enough to make any Cookie tear up themselves.
Onion Cookie tried hard to fold her pajamas neatly. Although the result is a bit disheveled, we all know she did her best, and that\'s more than enough!
An opulent, decadent cheesecake-scented perfume. It is the fragrance of choice for Cheesecake Cookie when she goes to parties.
A cheesecake-shaped jewelry box. This is where Cheesecake Cookie keeps her most cherished necklace.
A purse belonging to Cheesecake Cookie, for whom lack of Coins has never been a problem. It feels like the purse itself might be worth more than the Coins it is made to contain.
These cute earmuffs are warmer than they seem, and they make you feel better when you\'re lonely. Snow Sugar Cookie always wears a pair.

One flick of the magic wand, and a myriad of beautiful snowflakes fill the air! This never-melting snowflake is said to be one of Snow Sugar Cookie\'s personal keepsakes. Just looking at it makes you feel at ease.
A snow globe with a tiny Snow King inside. There are few things more precious than a tiny copy of your dearest friend!
A band used to keep Radish Cookie\'s unruly hair in place. It makes sure that no hair gets in the way while doing repairs.
Potpourri, given to Radish Cookie by a special Cookie. The aroma makes everyone nearby relaxed and comfortable.
A pack filled with Radish Cookie\'s most well-used tools. The marks left on some of them show how much effort the Cookie puts into her work.

This chandelier is made from the purest, brilliant jewel ring, that reflects light around the auction house in the most beautiful pattern. It might just be even more valuable than any other items in the auction house...
This stage kind of looks like a box.
Wait up! That pattern we saw earlier
It\'s too damaged to see the face.
A cozy resting spot with soft pillows. It seems like Sachertorte Cookie was here, reading a book as she waited for someone.
It\'s a piece of sheet music
This black tea... is still warm...

There\'s a small warning sign that says no entry except for Rosemary Cookie and Radish Cookie. Seeing how shiny the screw handle is from use, you can imagine how often the two Cookies have been in and out of this room.
All the Witch\'s stuff is so huge!
What\'s Up With the Fruit Residents?
A cheerful Choco Mushroom Farmer. They are a great friend to have around.
A hearty Grape Mushroom Farmer. Hopefully you\'ll get along!
A down-to-earth Strawberry Mushroom Farmer. They seem familiar somehow...
Bookworm Tomato. He\'s a great friend to have around.
Freshy Tomato. It seems he\'s been here for a long time.
Crunchy Tomato. No one knows where he came from...
Sweet Pea Fan Club. They seem familiar somehow...
Red Bean Fan Club. No one knows where they came from...
Corn Kernel Fan Club. It seems they\'ve been here for a long time.
The rock star himself, B. Rock\'n 51. Hopefully you\'ll get along!
The disco star himself, Disco Legend B. R. Olli. He seems familiar somehow...
The folksinging legend himself, Folksinger Brock \"Ole\" Lay. He\'s a great friend to have around.
The Twin Cherry Ladies, Scarlet & Rose. It seems they\'ve been here for a long time.
The Twin Berry Ladies, Berry & Cherry. Hopefully you\'ll get along!
The Soda Cherry Ladies, Carmine & Vermillion. These two are great friends to have around.

This tiny, cheery tomato firmly believes she is actually a cherry. Yes, a cherry... the fruit. But also, she\'s a cherry who wears a cherry atop her head. Fancy that! Anyone who objects will have to sit through one of her patented \"tomato fruitology\" lectures! But when no one else is around, Cheery Cherry Tomato wonders why there\'s an air of tart aromas in her vicinity, when they should be sweet and fruity.

Though it may look like this tomato would taste perfectly sweet and sour, this grumpy resident is actually super bitter! Ever since she was a small, green tomato who had yet to ripen, she hated being mistaken for a grape. Perhaps this is why she developed a habit of introducing herself as a vegetable as soon as she learned to talk. If you don\'t want to offend this little friend, you better be careful not to call her the wrong name!

This fussy tomato grew up in the far corner of the garden, bathed in the warmth of the afternoon sun. The abundant sunlight turned the tomato a healthy yellowish-orange hue, so she started to believe she was actually an orange. This adorable friend has been showing up to the Fruit Community Meetings ever since, but none of the other members have the heart to tell her the truth.

Frightened by the huge Churro Golem\'s roaring howl? If so, you\'ve completely misunderstood this gentle giant! If you\'re curious and want to see the Churro Golem\'s true form, try approaching it slowly with a handful of Sugar Powder. Watch its eyes widen as it peeps out a cute squeal!
A fireplace created by stacking well-baked biscuits. Light it, and the room will be filled with a pleasant, sweet fragrance.
An armchair sofa made out of slices of soft bread and sweet jam. It\'s hard to sit in this without feeling sleepy.
A bag filled with sweets, packed by GingerBrave to share with all his Cookie friends one day!
A crispy biscuit table. A great choice for decorating any room.
A round stall for storing umbrellas. It seems quite handy to keep around.
A seat made with a combination of chocolate and jam. It probably goes well anywhere you place it.
A lamp made out of conch-shaped bread. What a lucky find!
Shelves made out of roll cake. Who wouldn\'t want them in their room?
A pretzel-themed window. Give your view on the world a twist with this decor!
Every thrilling adventure GingerBrave heads out on starts by opening this!
A square rug made out of a handkerchief. Any room would look cozier with it!
A round linen rug. Try decorating a room with it!
A laced curtain. Try it out and see where it fits the best!
Thanks to the floor having faded due to frequent use, it has a somewhat cozy feeling to it!
Bricks made out of hardened bread. It looks delicious, but you probably shouldn\'t eat it.
A lollipop-style hot air balloon with a muffin basket. Just a bit more hot air and it could probably take off to the skies!
A table filled with snacks prepared by GingerBright! Look at all those jelly beans!
A swing installed on a branch of a hardcandy tree. Anyone riding this would end up smiling brightly!
A puffy muffin chair. Sitting on this is bound to let you completely relax.
Fluffy cotton candy bushes. Let\'s give a room a softer vibe with these!
A bush made from cotton candy with sprinkles in it. It\'s so fluffy!
A candy snail with a spiral pattern on its shell. Let\'s give it a place to live comfortably.
This little bear is always invited to GingerBright\'s snack time. After all, a tasty treat is better enjoyed together with friends!
A pi?ata in the shape of a candy. Who wouldn\'t like to have this?!
A chandelier in the shape of a lollipop. It will surely suit any room.
A cloud with a rainbow to decorate rooms with. Where should we place this?
A miniature hot air balloon! While a bit too small to ride, it\'d make for a nice decoration piece in one of the rooms.
A pretty carpet with edges of soft cream and tiny lollipop decorations on top.
This wallpaper is sure to brighten anyone\'s mood as they enter the room. You feel energized just looking at it.
Lovely pink grass grows on this carpet. Now you can jump around without hurting your feet!
A book of notes kept by Wizard Cookie. It contains details on countless experiments studying potions... but it is way too difficult to comprehend.
A pile of books and scrolls containing research on powerful magicks. However, they need to be deciphered, as the texts are written in the wizards\' language.

A mystical tome. The runes inscribed within are foreign to you, yet somehow you feel like you can understand what they say. Flipping through the pages, you feel like you learn new things about potionbrewing.
An inkwell imbued with a handy enchantment, causing it to never run out of ink!
A magical candy, used as an arcane focus for Wizard Cookie\'s wand.
A suncatcher shaped like a star. Hang this in a room to give it a more magical feel!
A ceiling lamp shaped like a planet. If you look closer, you can make out surprisingly intricate details!
Protection spells have been engraved onto this bookcase, most likely to guard ancient secrets from nosy onlookers.
A window with a view of falling stars on a night sky. Looking out through this is one of Wizard Cookie\'s methods of choice to relax after a long day spent studying.
Traces of thaumaturgical research. Putting these on your wall is sure to impress other Cookies with your superior intellect!
A hat belonging to Wizard Cookie. If you ask nicely, maybe you get to try it on!
Magic circles, drawn on the floor with chalk. They draw magical energy from nearby leylines, allowing for the practice and studying of more powerful spells.
A star-filled piece of decoration that might once have adorned a witch\'s wrist. For a Cookie, though, it works perfect as a garland!
A wallpaper featuring the Milky Way. Enchanted with astrological magic, the constellations match those seen in the night sky above where it is located.
A magical flooring with a star pattern.
A bed that\'s fluffy, soft, and even perfect for hiding from the outside world! I could stay in this forever!
While a bit too large to carry around like a regular Game Berry console, the large screen makes it easier to play together with a friend.
A fridge colored like strawberry milk. Better keep one around to keep your favorite drinks refrigerated.
A strawberry lollipop, repurposed into a floor lamp. Perfect for when you want to give a room a sweeter atmosphere.
A cute strawberry sofa, perfect for resting in any room you place it in.
A small chair. Simple, yet does exactly what it\'s supposed to.
A large keyboard, with keys so large it takes some effort to push the keys down!
A large strawberry-themed mouse, that now functions as a decorative piece.
A window with a great view of the lush strawberry vines outside. Strawberry Cookie likes to leave the curtains open at all times.
An old diskette, filled with all the classics! This one has been decorated with stickers and put in a place where everyone can see.
A cute shelf to display all your favorite things!
A garland with spring flowers. Who wouldn\'t like this hanging on their wall?!
This carpet feels like walking on clouds!
A wallpaper with small strawberries painted on it. The sweet spring scent is positively mouth-watering!
Walk on this sunkissed floor, and you will feel the grass tickle your toes!
An imposing office desk that has been passed down through generations. It now belongs to Marble Danish Cookie, who uses it for work.
An aviary companion that has accompanied Marble Danish Cookie since a young age. Just how old could it be...?
A white chocolate chess piece designed in traditional House Danish style. This one can move across the board by jumping over other pieces.
A dark chocolate chess piece designed in traditional House Danish style. This one can move across the board in an L-shape.
Armor belonging to a valorous knight. What a lucky find!
A flag bearing the insignia of House Danish.
This one is bound to contain treasure! ... If only we had a key to open it with.
A decorative piece, containing a shield bearing the House Danish family crest. The shield\'s condition is pristine, as it has never actually been worn in combat.
A display of various swords commissioned by a master blacksmith. You can tell by their gleam that someone is taking good care of them.
A medal symbolizing service to House Danish. Hang it up with pride!
Round picture frames containing portraits of Cookies. Let\'s hang them up somewhere.
A beautiful picture frame. It probably looks great no matter where you place it.
A carpet with the insignia of House Danish embroidered onto it.
A floor giving a visual definition of \"elegance.\" This can give any room a dignified feel.
A wallpaper with a subtle gold leaf pattern. It feels like it would suit the mansion of an old-fashioned aristocratic family.
An enchanting canopy bed. A very cherished piece of furniture for Sachertorte Cookie, it\'s hard not to look fancy lying down in this.
A spiral staircase with elegant curves. Make sure to watch your step as you use it!
A luxuriously decorated chocolate table. With this at the party, it might just become the center of attention!
A floor lamp that looks like a muffin impaled on a golden fork. Everyone would like to have one of these!
An expensive-looking umbrella stand. This will make any guest impressed!
An atmospheric lamp. Let\'s put it to good use!
A chair shaped like an upside-down muffin cup. What a find!
A vase containing beautiful flowers. This will look great wherever you put it.
A place to put your finest shoes. Now everyone can admire your fashion even when you\'re not wearing them!
A chandelier smelling faintly of apricot jam. The soft light gives any room a sophisticated atmosphere.
A well-hidden safe. Rumors say that Sachertorte Cookie is storing something very valuable inside.
A place used to \"store\" golden daggers. It serves its purpose.
A soft fur carpet. It feels amazing to walk on!
A beautiful red floor. It\'s easy to lose track of time staring at the intricate pattern.
A wall with red flowers embroidered onto it. If you get closer, you can smell a faint scent of apricot jam.
A bed within an intricately designed egg. After a good night\'s sleep on top of the feathers inside, you\'ll feel like you\'ve been baked again!
This statue is calmly waiting for something. I wonder what that something could be!
These gates, surprisingly not made out of candy pearls, are said to open up to any Cookie with a pure and kind heart.
A statue of an angel tooting a horn. With this around, any Cookie would feel welcome!
A statue of an angel holding a star. With this around, any Cookie would feel blessed!
A pillar with a burning flame on top. It brings both comfortable warmth and pleasant light!
Feathers of an angel. These are said to bring great luck to anyone holding them.
A portal that only can be entered by Cookies who have opened the gates of heaven. If you look closely, you can see blessed light shining in the distance.
There\'s no better place to rest and absorb sunlight than on top of the clouds.
The soft, fluffy clouds make the long wait for the next game of fetch bearable.
A winged Bear Jelly. It both watches over you and judges your deeds, so you better not do anything naughty!
A ceiling light designed to look like a cloud. You could position it so that the sun rays give emphasis to your favorite belongings!
A circular carpet with a star in the middle. Let\'s find a place for it!
A wallpaper with feathers floating in the wind. Maybe one of them belongs to Angel Cookie!
Angel Cookie prepared a special kind of floor, to let you find out how it feels to literally walk on a cloud!
Devil Cookie\'s carefully constructed bottle rocket. It\'s decorated with the Cookie\'s favorite stickers!
A magnificent chair, worthy of an archdevil. How could Devil Cookie settle for anything less?
An imp statue featuring a large dice. Let the dies be cast!
An imp statue featuring dessert sculptures. It makes you feel a bit peckish.
A pi?ata with its contents spilled out. Seems like you missed out on all the fun!
A fallen-over candle. Just make sure the fire doesn\'t spread!
A candle with an ever-burning flame. Perfect for long nights spent reading books in the dark.
Crayons and paper to draw on, for when you want an outlet for your sudden bursts of inspiration.
A dartboard made out of a large bottle cap. It makes a satisfying sound when you hit the mark.
A poster featuring Angel Cookie, with some... \"creative touch-ups\" by Devil Cookie.
A chandelier modeled after Devil Cookie\'s devil form. The crimson flames seem to never go out!
A bass guitar able to produce cool, dark tunes. Is someone practicing to perform in a band...?
A carpet that is specially made to go with burning decors.
Being surrounded by flames is a must to make a devil feel at home! This wallpaper has a zigzag pattern to accommodate such desires.
While it looks extremely hot, the floor isn\'t actually lava!
A beautiful flower tree, growing out of a teapot filled with sweet syrup. It was lovingly grown from a weak sapling by Rosemary Cookie.
If you try to watch all the different mystical species of plants in the garden, you\'ll end up losing track of time.
A table used by Rosemary Cookie to trim messy leaves from the garden plants. This one looks very pleased with the result!
A chair that was given as a gift by a certain Cookie. Let\'s find a fitting place for it.
A slightly overgrown bookshelf, filled with plants and books filled with information on said plants.
This watering can has a sprout growing out of it. If that isn\'t a sign of effectiveness, I\'m not sure what is.
A book detailing various interesting botany facts. I can\'t wait to start reading this!
A ceiling light with leaf-shaped crystals. It makes you feel like sunlight is shining down through tree crowns above.
A garland with dried flowers hanging from it. Let\'s hang it up somewhere nice!
A large window that opens to a beautiful view of the Syrup Garden, giving you peace of mind.
Shears used for trimming plants and greenery. Maybe someone will put these to good use.
Shelves decorated with seedlings. Let\'s put this up someplace nice!
A round rug made out of rattan. Let\'s put this to good use.
The unprocessed stones used as floor tiles gives the room a more natural look.
A wood wall painted in the color of fresh spring grass. It makes you feel like you\'re in the middle of a tranquil garden.
A telescope that has been modified and altered multiple times. It is now used to watch over every corner of the Syrup Garden.
A workbench used by Radish Cookie to draw blueprints and make plans. Does that Cookie ever rest?!
A large tea cup decorated with a rosemary pattern.
Why have a toolbox when a can does the trick just as well?
A seamless blend of balance, style, and performance. Climbing this feels like ascending into the clouds.
A chair made out of half a radish. Anyone would love to have one of these!
A hanger that makes a funny noise when you adjust the angle.
This giant belt was discovered by Radish Cookie during a daily walk through the garden.
A window giving easy access to view the garden outside. With this, nothing will go unnoticed!
Multiple notes filled with possibilities. So much to do, but so little time!
A set of differently-sized wrenches. Let\'s put these somewhere they come to good use.
A ceiling light made from half of a radish. It is perfect for making a room feel closer to nature.
A miniature garden with plants from the Syrup Garden. It is maintained by an automatic system giving the plants nutritious syrup at regular intervals.
This wall is perfect for hanging things on. The slight amount of rust does not seem to have affected its sturdiness.
A floor that can take heavy tools being dropped on it. Because of that, I recommend placing it in the room of a hard-working Cookie!
A movable stage, custom-made for Mint Choco Cookie. It even has soundproofing included!
A table with a portrait of Cocoa Cookie on it. Just looking at it gives a warm feeling inside, not quite unlike a warm cup of cocoa.
A violin case with a letter from a fan inside. What a lucky find!
A table with two cups. It seems someone was invited for some warm drinks.
A beautiful music stand. Anyone would like this!
A small cupcake-shaped stool. It serves its purpose.
Gorgeous curtains, seemingly transported from a concert hall. With these, even practice sessions feel like the real thing!
A cabinet containing some of Mint Choco Cookie\'s happiest memories. Let\'s help make some more.
A window with a view of beautiful melodies. But Mint Choco Cookie\'s music outshines even the brightest stars in the sky.
A box seat from a concert hall. What a lucky find!
The bow of a violin. Let\'s hang it somewhere as decoration.
A carpet created with soft down. Who wouldn\'t like this in their room?
Curtains frequently used as stage decoration. But now, you can place them wherever you want!
Floor with a sprinkle pattern. The mint fragrance coming from it feels fresh as you breathe in!
A wallpaper with stripes resembling musical staves and notes. What happens if we play those notes?
A forge used for creating weapons. The blazing flames melt down any materials put inside, creating incredible weaponry.
An anvil that can be used to shape steel. This has been used by Avocado Cookie to make equipment for countless Cookies.
A tank used to cool down hot metals. It is coated with a special oil and is resistant to extreme heat.
A display of crafted equipment. One day, these may come to good use in the hands of a brave adventurer!
A wooden barrel used to store crafted weapons. If you want one, just pull it out without breaking the barrel.
A simple chair to rest on. Let\'s put it to good use!
A pile of roll cake logs. They have been kept dry, so they are easy to use as fuel for any fire.
Heavy iron chains. What a find!
A hook, hanging from the ceiling by a chain.
Too heavy for most Cookies to even lift. I wonder what happens if worn by someone strong enough to even snap their fingers?
A window lit up with the light of forge fires. It seems someone is hard at work.
A simple torch. Put it on a wall to light up the dark.
A sturdy carpet made out of avocado skin. The material is so durable that it\'s sometimes used for reinforcing armor.
A wall that has been exposed to the heat of a furnace for a long time. Be careful, touching it might result in burns!
This floor has turned yellow by the heat of the forge. Watch out for sudden sparks flying around!
Your mouth will explode with sweetness with just a single bite! ... Hopefully not in that way though.
Turn the handle on the side and receive a startling surprise! I hope you aren\'t disappointed it didn\'t explode.
If you fled seeing the lit fuse, you are a victim of Cherry Cookie\'s prank! It\'s just for show!
A drawer with a cherry bomb on top. Is it purely decorative, or is it a very effective morning alarm? Only one way to find out!
A pile of firecrackers. Putting them in a room is sure to make it a bit more festive! Just keep it away from open flames.
Confetti from firecrackers. Throw these into the air over and over again, and the party never stops!
Solid fences made out of candy. Suited for keeping things out (or in).
This used to be a bouquet of balloons, but most seem to have popped.
A bouquet of balloons, tied to a star candy so that they don\'t fly away.
A broken window. Maybe all those cherry firecrackers warrant using sturdier glass.
A picture frame with broken glass. Let\'s be a bit careful when tossing bombs around indoors!
Pictures capturing some of Cherry Cookie\'s fondest memories. Let\'s hang these up somewhere they can easily be seen!
A decorative ribbon. All Cookies would like to have this hanging in their room!
A cute wallpaper made to resemble cherry firecrackers exploding!
A cute, pink floor with a star pattern.
With this table, you don\'t need to worry about friends suddenly showing up. It comes prepared with delicious cocktails and finger food for everyone!
A bucket that keeps your bottles at the optimal temperature. You just need to fill it with ice!
An award given only to the best of the best in the bartending industry.
A neat table reserved for fine guests. Now all that\'s left is someone to invite!
A nice chair with a footrest. What a nice find!
A green jelly chair. It serves its purpose.
A lamp shaped like a glass of lime juice. It can bring any room refreshing light!
A lamp shaped like a glass of lemon juice. It can bring any room refreshing light!
A stylish pot. What a lucky find!
A high-class chandelier. What a lucky find!
A yellow neon sign. Just looking at it makes your mouth tingle.
A large shelf with fancy bottles containing a wide assortment of beverages. With all these to choose from, there\'s no doubt you can get your favorite cocktail made!
A bright yellow window. If you look closely, you can see bubbles slowly moving to the top.
To no one\'s surprise, Sparkling Cookie went for simplicity when selecting wallpaper. After all, your focus should be on the glass in front of you, and especially the drink within it!
This floor carpet is so soft you\'ll feel less tired with each step you take. With this, you will definitely be able to have a great time.
A bed made out of a candlestick once used by the witches. It is now where Blackberry Cookie sleeps.
While very old, this closet does not show any signs of wear or tear. Inside are multiples of the same outfit.
A neat table, perfect for tea time.
A purple chair with laces as decoration. It looks neat, yet comfortable at the same time.
Blackberry Cookie\'s preferred means of avoiding direct sunlight.
A mood light giving off a comfortable amount of light when turned on. Any Cookie would like to have this in their room.
A lantern containing a blue flame. Let\'s place it somewhere fitting!
A candle-filled chandelier with soft blue flames. It doesn\'t seem to be ordinary fire.
The silver moonlight shines through this window, making it a perfect spot to wonder about the whereabouts of a certain Cookie.
A photograph capturing an old memory. If only...
A picture of a young Cookie. How time has passed...
Small portraits placed on top of a shelf. Let\'s put this somewhere it can be seen!
A beautiful lace-trimmed carpet. Simply putting it in a room makes it look more elegant.
A wall that probably could make the messiest room look orderly. *Ahem* N-not that I would know anything about that.
A floor with an antique pattern giving the room an impression of being neat and organized.
A bed with Onion Rabbit quietly sleeping in it. Here even Cookies afraid of the dark can rest at night without worries.
How strange... This kind of wardrobe isn\'t supposed to have automatic doors. But why are the doors open again every morning...?
An in-progress book about a timid Cookie. Onion Cookie says it\'s her favorite story.
A drawer with a teddy bear and an onion lamp. This lamp stays lit at night, just in case.
Blocks to play with. Anyone would like this!
A secret dairy. Let\'s keep it in its owner\'s room.
Fairy tale books that seem to have been read many times.
A small chair, shaped like a macaron. What a nice find!
Cute toys hanging from the ceiling. What a lucky find!
An old and worn portrait. The tear makes it unclear whom it depicts, but the remaining fragments bear some resemblance to a certain Cookie.
A window decorated with transparent curtains. Let\'s find a room to put this in!
Star-shaped stickers that glow in the dark. Put them on the wall or in the ceiling and watch them when you go to bed!
A round carpet. Let\'s put this to good use.
A purple wallpaper with a teardrop pattern. It sounds like Onion Cookie is sobbing nearby, maybe we should go console her.
This pattern was popular for flooring a very long time ago... but how did it end up in Onion Cookie\'s room?
What was once a merry-go-round, bringing joy to children, is now a comfy bed to sleep in after a long day of playing.
A pretty unicorn in pastel colors. When you ride it, you feel like you\'re soaring through the sky.
A cute teddy bear holding balloons. Maybe it wants to give them to friends!
A carefully painted panel that looks like something you might have seen at the amusement park as a child.
A pointy street light. It goes well wherever you place it, even indoors!
A star-shaped rainbow seat. If you scooch hard enough, you might fit five Cookies at once!
A decorative mobile with a cloud, moons and stars. Looking at it makes you feel a bit drowsy.
Sugar butterfly decorations, hanging from the ceiling on strings. Where should we put these?
A pretty pastel curtain. What a lucky find!
A comet with a rainbow tail. Let\'s make a wish!
A rainbow with a double arc, somewhat resembling a heart. Maybe the pot of gold is behind the star!
A decorative purple cloud. Who wouldn\'t want a cloud in their room?
A floor with clouds, and stars gleaming in between. Looking at it somehow makes you think back to distant memories.
A wall depicting the night sky and all its stars. Happy and bright memories come to mind, making you stare at the wallpaper as you get carried away by nostalgia.
A pot full of warm cocoa and fluffy marshmallows bobbing inside. Amazing!
A fireside filled with memories together with a certain Cookie. Every single one brings a smile to Cocoa Cookie\'s face.
A chair made out of a marshmallow. It is perfect for lengthy knitting sessions.
A set with yarn and knitting needles. With this you can create anything, especially if that something is a sweater.
A tree as white as snow. Anyone would like this... at least until they have to clean up all the needles falling on the floor.
A roll cake with a winter holiday theme. What a lucky find!
A boiling teapot. Let\'s put it to good use, but be careful it doesn\'t burn anyone!
A stool shaped like a sugar cube. It serves its purpose.
A simple wreath with snowflakes. What a lucky find!
Some winter landscapes have a warm feeling. Just like watching the snow fall outside while sipping on some hot cocoa.
A reindeer with a glowing nose. It shines bright enough to light up a dark winter night!
A hanger with a scarf and a Snow Rabbit resting on top. What a lucky find!
A cute bell with a ribbon. What a lucky find!
A floor decorated with vivid colors and a snowflake pattern. It gives off a very warm feeling.
A wall made out of dark wood logs. They completely block out the winter winds!
A playground slide made to resemble the Snow King. It takes some effort to climb up, but the joy of sliding down makes the climb worth it.
An igloo with what seems like a half-melted Snow Cone on top. Surely it\'s not the real thing...?!
A snowman made to look like Snow Sugar Cookie. You can tell someone put in a lot of effort into making it, but who could it be?
A sprinkle meringue tree. Place this somewhere for a more wintery mood!
A snowman made out triple-stacked ice cream scoops. They are sure to lighten the mood in any room they are placed in.
A large blue snowflake, stuck inside a pile of snow. What could have caused this one to grow so large?
A small stool covered in snow. Sitting on this will quickly wake you up, no matter how sleepy you were.
A barricade made out of fluffy meringue. Since you can easily walk between them, it\'s mostly for decoration.
A snowflake attached to a piece of string. It doesn\'t seem to melt, so it is safe to hang up as an indoor decoration.
A heap of cozily piled-up snow. It doesn\'t seem to melt, so no need to worry about walking through puddles of water if you place it in a room!
When the fierce blizzard subsides, and the surroundings quiet down, the skies fill with a mesmerizing aurora. Maybe it is a gift to those who endured?
A path through a winter landscape. Where could it lead?
A pile of snow with small footprints on it. What kind of adorable creature could have left those?
Snowy floor with a path plowed through the middle. Thanks to someone clearing the snow, everyone can walk through without worrying about slipping and falling.
A wallpaper giving your room permanent snowfall. The snowflakes drawn on it are incredibly realistic, making you almost feel the cold winter breeze.
A magical portal that only activates once the riddle is solved. Where could it lead, I wonder?
A mysterious coffin that no one could open before Adventurer Cookie found a way. How much gold could have been kept inside?
A structure from mysterious ruins. Adventurer Cookie will definitely be able to find out what secrets they hide!
A pillar with a depiction of a cheesebird. This would fit well in a ruin-themed room!
A low pillar with gold-tipped arrows lodged in it. Try as you like to pull them out, they won\'t budge.
A rock with various symbols etched onto it. We should probably ask Adventurer Cookie about what they mean.
Leaf hammocks with a pair of cheesebirds resting inside. What a lucky find!
Purely decorative, this medieval-style contraption has had its sharp blades dulled down to prevent accidents.
Swing from these like you rule the jungle!
Pull the lever. Not that lever!
An entrance to hidden ruins. These stairs don\'t show up in any of our maps, so keep an eye out for traps!
This will show your way through the dark, abandoned ruins. If you are lucky, it might also be the key to a locked-away treasure!
Ground filled with bushes, vines, and traps. Watch your step!
A wall designed after actual ruins somewhere in the world. There are no secrets behind the cracks, so don\'t get any ideas!
A sofa adorned with giant feathers. Rumor has it the feathers were part of a fan belonging to a witch who loved to party.
A gramophone shaped like a flower. It prefers to play springtime tunes!
A crescent-shaped chair with a disco ball attached. The cheese it is made of does not actually come from the moon.
A perfume bottle with feathers attached as decoration. The pleasant fragrance is sure to attract the attention of nearby Cookies.
Pendants repurposed into a coat hanger. But even without coats, it makes for a beautiful decor in any room!
Fluffy Cheese Cat\'s favorite sofa. If you decide to use it, be ready to get up to give Fluffy Cheese Cat its favorite spot by the armrest.
A fancy drink mixer. With this, any sparkling cocktail you could imagine is just a shake and a stir away!
A soft stool made from a slice of cheesecake. Let\'s put it somewhere right away!
A soft stool made from a slice of basque cheesecake. Let\'s put it somewhere right away!
The highlight of the partywatching the coin fireworks from the terrace! It never fails to amaze!
A golden curtain. It can be pulled down to give the guests an easier time to focus on the party in front of them.
A chandelier made out of slices of high-quality emmental cheese. When lit, it fills the room with a cheesy aroma.
A yellow carpet. Let\'s place it somewhere!
A wallpaper with a design created by a world-renowned artist.
These floors are so polished they double as mirrors!
While most Cookies would be unable to sleep here, Zombie Cookie looks surprisingly comfortable in this bed.
An old tree, vaguely resembling a witch\'s crooked hand. Try to resist the temptation of grabbing one of the jellies dangling from the spider web.
A truly spooky atmosphere needs some thick mist! Just make sure to turn it off after a while, or you\'ll end up all soggy!
A carefully decorated grave for someone\'s best friend.
A table made out of a stone slab. It looks quite heavy, but hopefully some Cookie can help out with bringing it to the room you want to decorate with it.
A chair created out of gravestones. It seems quite old, judging by the amount of moss growing on it.
A stairway leading somewhere. The only Cookie who returned after entering is Zombie Cookie.
A diagram showing the basic anatomy of a Cookie. I wonder who this belonged to!
A crack in the wall. You can feel a breeze of cool air coming out of it.
Spider web picked from a cemetery. You can\'t see the spider that made it, but surely it\'s somewhere nearby!
A lantern often found near graves. It gives off an eerie light.
A small graveyard lantern. Hang this in a room to give it a spookier vibe.
A soaked carpet. It makes squishy noises when you walk on it.
The horrible colors and patterns of this wallpaper makes it an unpopular choice among Cookies. Zombie Cookie, however, seems to enjoy it greatly.
The hard-packed earth and pebbles makes it rough to walk on, but Zombie Cookie seems to enjoy it.
A bed made of furs and leather, designed to completely block out the cold. It gives a very wild vibe.
Meat Jelly filled with delicious nutrients and protein. Cooked over an open fire, and herbs sprinkled on top for enhanced flavor.
The lair of a dangerous (but small and fluffy) beast. Only the bravest adventurers dare venture close, even fewer still try taking the yarn ball placed next to the bed.
A table containing the essence of the wild. No table manners are required when you dine by this.
A bucket filled with a bunch of treats for a well-behaved companion.
A coat hanger made out of a suitably shaped stick.
A window where you can often find Werewolf Cookie looking out into the distance.
A fur ornament where flowers have started to grow. Let\'s hang it up somewhere!
A banner with marks, kept around to never forget.
A huge collar once worn by a ferocious beast. It is sturdy enough to withstand someone sleeping on it.
These snacks have been tied up with a rope as storage. Their size make them entire meals for ordinary Cookies, though.
A light wrapped in rough cloth. It efficiently lights up any room it is installed in.
A rough carpet. Not the most comfortable to walk on, but it does what it\'s supposed to.
A cold stone wall. You can feel cold air seeping through the gaps.
This stone floor can feel rough at first, but stays cool even during hot summers.
Round vials filled with simmering liquids of various colors. It will likely result in a strong potion, only for the strongest of adventurers.
A quietly boiling pot of a newly invented substance! It seems even the cauldron itself is looking forward to seeing the results.
An accurate set of scales is invaluable to an alchemist, to whom the craft revolves around the law of equivalent exchange.
A chalkboard filled with complex formulae. In the corner someone has written \"DO NOT ERASE\" in large letters, so we better let it be.
Various materials for studying. With this, you have everything needed for absorbing knowledge!
A step stool used to assist Cookies administering reagents during scientific research.
A pestle filled with medicine. While slightly bitter, it will likely make you feel better in no time!
This bad boy can get you across the laboratory in 2.5 seconds!
A note written in a hurry. Someone must be busy!
An old and extremely fragile source of information on alchemy. Make sure a certain juice-loving Cookie doesn\'t get too close.
A pair of test tubes and litmus paper: the very basics (or acidics, depending on the results) of chemical tests.
A light bulb with a less-than-stable source of electricity. It should still work for most illumination-based purposes.
A carpet decorated with a distinct symbol. Whomor whatit belongs to, remains a mystery.
A wall filled with shelves containing various medicinal herbs. It is said every great alchemist owns a wall like this.
Flooring designed by a geometry aficionado. The pattern is quite complicated, but the symmetry makes it nice to look at.
A glass of juice made out of only the ripest grapes. Just the aroma is enough to make you slightly drowsy.
Vampire Cookie\'s favorite lounge chair for relaxing. It has a bottle of grape juice within arm\'s reach.
A coffin that will dispel any prejudice about coffins being uncomfortable. Close the lid, and enjoy deep sleep, safe from any sunlight!
Boxes of grape juice perfect for on the go. It is one of the few ways to convince Vampire Cookie to go somewhere.
A cut gemstone with a grape-like purple hue. It looks very valuable!
A place to store multiple bottles of grape juice in a way that make them great conversation pieces at the same time.
Why bother hanging it up when you\'re going to wear it later anyway?
A view of bats flying in a star-filled night sky. The landscape outside the window contains everything Vampire Cookie could ever ask for... aside from a glass of grape juice, of course.
A window showing the starry night sky outside. Looking out through it puts your mind at ease.
A furled curtain. Pull it down to bring an aura of mystery to what might hide behind it.
A curtain tied with a neat knot. Basic, yet sophisticated.
A ceiling-mounted hanger for juice cups. Now you can store more juice in your cupboards!
A carpet with a fang-shaped pattern.
A grape-colored wall. Taking a closer look, it seems like there are fangs too...?
A floor giving off a distinct smell of grapes. Was it intended, or did someone spill a cup...?
Turn this mood light on, and you will instantly feel like you\'re floating among the stars.
A witchberry mousetrap. Let\'s avoid placing this in a cheese-loving Cookie\'s room, just in case!
A stick with a long feather at the end. Who could resist doing everything they can to catch the feather? Not Witchberry Cookie, that\'s for sure!
A long window showing the night sky outside. Who wouldn\'t like an amazing view like that from their room?
Stained glass in the shape of a cat\'s paw. Who wouldn\'t love to have this in their room?
A table with a bowl of crispy snacks. What a lucky find!
A cauldron of freshly brewed snacks. Let\'s hope we get to taste test soon!
A hat filled with stars and moons. I wonder what they can be used for!
A set of windows showing the night sky outside. Who wouldn\'t like an amazing view like that from their room?
A cute black cat doll. Some Cookies claim to have seen its tail move, but that can\'t be true... right?
Stained glass, depicting a cat sitting quietly underneath the moonlight.
The stars hanging from this look so real they might as well have been picked straight from the night sky!
A curtain swaying in the wind, not quite unlike that of a playful cat. This is perfect for hiding items in a corner!
A wallpaper showing constellations of the night sky. It is said this wallpaper changes with the seasons.
Brick flooring that resembles the paved pathways of the City of Wizards. Just walking on this makes your magic grow stronger!

A surveillance monitor made out of discarded cans, a phone made using yarn and rubber bands! This guard station, built from scratch by Radish Cookie, really shows the Cookie\'s desire to reunite with someone very special.
A mill that finely grinds syrupy candy into sweet candy powder. Spend an entire day working here, and you will have to spend ages to wipe candy powder off your clothes!

A place for green residents to let loose to a healthy groove! Take a sip of sweet syrup and feel your body get carried away by the pleasant rhythm until the morning sunlight starts shining through the canopy above.

Twin windows! Twin sofas! Even the teapots come as a pair! This luxuriously furnished room was tailored to the taste of the Twin Cherry Ladies. Just make sure you bring someone with you, otherwise it\'s easy to get lonely.
An overgrown room with a faucet. All the syrup nourishing the garden comes from here! Let\'s fix it quickly and wake the garden up!
A ghastly feline that has been around for a very, very long time.
Perhaps this adorably spooky cat is looking for new friends?

An owl who has watched over the witches from the old wooden beams of the Witch\'s Castle. Confident in most schools of magicall learned by watching the witches at workthis owl might even have surpassed their teachers in proficiency over time.

This owl, whose wing flaps leave a sweet caramel scent in the air, has spent ages studying all kinds of dessert creatures born in the Witch\'s Castle. Although confident there are no more creatures that have yet to be studied, it is not a rare occurrence that this owl melts with excitement when they learn of a new discovery!

An owl who prefers the ingenuity of mechanical gadgets over the witches\' magic, perhaps because of being so coolheaded due to a strong affinity with mint. Flying across the entirety of Earthbread is nothing if there is new piece of technology waiting to be studied. Are the rumors of a place, where magic disappeared and technology rules, true?
Witchberry Cookie\'s Room of Magical Mysteries

Witchberry Cookie\'s room is filled with sparkling starlight and all kinds of mysterious tools. At first glance, the room looks like a witch\'s abode, with enchanted brooms and bubbling pots... but after a closer look it seems they are just cat toys? Let\'s pretend we didn\'t notice.
You cannot use spaces or special characters.
Your name cannot contain spaces, special characters,

A room where you can truly enjoy the star-class service that the Grand Cabinet Hotel is known for. Comfortable sleep, exquisite interiors, and 24-hour room service! What more could one wish for when looking for proper rest and relaxation?
A hidden room that hasn\'t seen visitors for a very long time. It is filled with traces of a family lineage... What other secrets might this room hold?
A broom, decorated with a ribbon. Anyone would like this!
I\'m gonna need some Life Potions! You need Life Potions to wake up sleepy Cookies.
Hmm, I wonder where this Cookie came from... What could their name be?
Ooh, I just feel like something fun is going to happen! I\'m sure of it!
So tired... My feet hurt... I don\'t feel cute at all right now.
STOP! I\'ve had it up to HERE with all the weaksauce griping!
But... All that hard work has gone to waste!
And lookee here! I swiped a pearl egg too!
Since we\'re being honest and all... I managed to get my hands on a lovely ring.
Oh, so we\'re being honest then? I, erm... brought a jewelled mirror, hehe.
As per usual, our Apricot Jam Syndicate has succeeded once more.
Shall we celebrate our latest success? After all, our hard work has truly paid off.
Then let\'s clean up the place first! Can\'t have a celebration if there\'s a mess!
Now that the cleaning\'s done... It\'s time to roll up my sleeves and put my culinary skills to work!
Perhaps, our dear Cashew wouldn\'t mind help setting the table. You\'re, erm... finesse is needed for such an occasion.
Erm, yeah. The boss has a point!
OW! No need to push and shove! I\'m supposed to cook today, and the gift needs to be wrapped too and...
Anyway, at least we don\'t have to experience Cashew\'s signature Choco Cucumber Pizza once more!
Yes, Cashew\'s cooking is certainly... unique.
I often reminisce on the time I was lost and hungry... You were the only souls who offered me a warm meal.
Back then, we were still calling ourselves the Looting Legumes... A ragtag band of failed misfits, always hungry, always miserable...
Even so, we couldn\'t leave someone like us to wander about and starve!
The soup you offered that night was the most horrendous thing I\'ve ever tasted... But it truly warmed my heart.
I am done dwelling on the past for tonight. Perhaps I shall check up on the others.
It needs to be perfect... and pretty... and cute... like me.
It\'s still missing something... Something as grand as our gift...
Ah, I see. How about placing our syndicate\'s emblem somewhere well-seen?
Much better. I remember when we first designed our emblem together.
An unforgettable day...! The day the Looting Legumes were reborn as the Apricot Jam Syndicate...
When you, Sachertorte Cookie, became our boss...!
Walnut wasn\'t so bad as the leader, but... Poor cute me... So much nagging...
I shall continue on my way then. I trust that you can manage the decorations on your own?
The party\'s ready to get started but... Where\'s Sachertorte Cookie?
Nonsense! The boss is at least a hundred times stronger than all of us combined!
Hmph! You\'re just a big bully, Walnut... You know that? And you\'re a windbag of yappity yap yap yaps!
A nagger who doesn\'t... acknowledge just how... adorable I really am...
Ah, forgive me, friends. I needed to procure something for the party. Shall we begin?
But it\'s a thing of your past! History, gone, bye-bye, toodeloo!
This gift... we hope it helps you move forward...
Ya see, boss? We care about you just as much as you care about us.
This party doesn\'t feel complete without my cooking... But it\'s going pretty well!
It is quite the party already. But I\'ve just the thing to add a little... festivity.
Oh... I bet Walnut forgot to bring something...
Not at all, my friend. The party is wonderful. But... What sort of party is it without cake?
A cake?! And not just any cake...!
It\'s so pretty... It\'s like looking in a mirror...
I am glad to see that all of you are pleased. Shall we continue with our merry celebration?
And, I know in my heart, that this party will be a memory most cherished.
Let the fun begin and last all night! WOOHOO!
The Age of Magic remains but a tale of old.
Soggy and bland desserts lay dormant, lifeless and cold.
But a young witch, touched by shadow, has entered the halls.
In her hands, a secret, magical recipe no one recalls.
The scent of fresh cream, once forgotten and vanished.
And from slumber awoken, the old oven is famished.
Perhaps the oven remembered its past.
Of baking Cookies for witches, countless, en masse.
Of an age where Cookies shared the tales of their lives,
an age of delectable freedom, where magic once thrived.
Oh, sweet little Cookies. Sometime soon, might perhaps may,
you\'ll learn why the witches baked throughout night and day.
But now is not the time for this truth to debut.
You should probably run... I am coming for you.
Your Lives are at max! Let\'s play a couple of rounds in Witch\'s Castle!
You still have much to learn.
Beat puzzles to fill your <color=#FDE800>Piggy Bank</color>

The Witch of Light loved the world and all living things in it. She added all the ingredients necessary for life as she baked the First Batch. GingerDozer, one among the Cookies of the First Batch, was filled with peaceful, sweet sleepiness. The Cookie\'s simple appearance is a testament to the fact that even the Witches had to learn to bake by practice... But even so, this Cookie was created with just as much love as all the others.

Solid, shiny coins made of gold. They perfectly resemble those carried by the witches.
Mysterious blue Crystals. It feels like they open many possibilities.
Steel your mind before heading into a challenge! These hearts will take care of the rest by letting you attempt puzzles.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of GingerBrave\'s soul. It fills you with boundless bravery.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Strawberry Cookie\'s soul. Holding it in your hands, you feel a bit more timid than before.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of GingerBright\'s soul. Holding it makes you want to burst into cheerful laughter.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Angel Cookie\'s soul. Its light fills you with confidence in your abilities.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Zombie Cookie\'s soul. It fills you with the endurance to just keep going, no matter how tough things get!
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Devil Cookie\'s soul. Suddenly you feel an urge to play a prank on someone.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Wizard Cookie\'s soul. It radiates with a dim arcane light.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Cherry Cookie\'s soul. Be careful, it looks like it\'s about to explode!
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Snow Sugar Cookie\'s soul. It looks cold as snow, but is quite warm to the touch.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Alchemist Cookie\'s soul.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Vampire Cookie\'s soul. It has a rather relaxed aura.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Cheesecake Cookie\'s soul. Maybe it\'s time to plan an amazing party?
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Adventurer Cookie\'s soul.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Blackberry Cookie\'s soul. It fills you with the desire to respect order and loathe mess.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Werewolf Cookie\'s soul. Holding it in your hands, you can hear a lone wolf\'s howl.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Cocoa Cookie\'s soul. The pleasantly rich aroma of cocoa makes you want to get a hot cup yourself!
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Mint Choco Cookie\'s soul. It hums with pure passion for music.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Onion Cookie\'s soul. It looks like it doesn\'t want to remain alone.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Herb Cookie\'s soul. When warmed under direct sunlight, it smells like fields of grass.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Sparkling Cookie\'s soul. You can make out exquisite golden bubbles rising inside.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Avocado Cookie\'s soul. Holding it in your hands, you start getting great ideas for funny jokes.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Cream Unicorn Cookie\'s soul. It resonates with a quiet melody from a merry-go-roundendearing, yet for some reason forgotten.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of First Cream Cookie\'s soul. You can feel a cold, yet sweet aura emanating from it.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Marble Danish Cookie\'s soul. It radiates with pride, no matter the circumstances.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Sachertorte Cookie\'s soul. You can feel the prying eyes of the Syndicate watching from the shadows.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Radish Cookie\'s soul. You can hear cheerful laughter coming from within.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Rosemary Cookie\'s soul. It gives off a fragrance that soothes your mind.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Witchberry Cookie\'s soul. Myahaha! I might help, if you say purr-ty please!

A mysterious potion able to wake stale Cookies. One of these restores 1 Energy to a Cookie of choice.
A Star Jelly that shines with a wonderful light. You\'ll need these to see special stories!
A gleaming reward given to those who complete puzzle challenges.
These trophies are given to those striving to reach the top in the league.
A ticket that lets you add 5 more moves during a puzzle. Perfect for when you want to just keep going!
A pickaxe that can be used to destroy walls blocking the way. Just make sure to swing it away from other Cookies!
Proof that you have been hard at work adventuring inside the Witch\'s Castle. You can tell how much more beautiful the castle has become!
Points earned by collecting cards within the Witch\'s Castle. If you get loads of them, good things happen!
Purple Coins resembling the witchberry fruits cultivated by the witches. These can only be obtained during the Witchberry Season!

This adorable truck travels alongside the first light of dawn to quickly deliver groceries that the Cookies have ordered. Few have seen this swift truck as it only travels while everyone is asleep.
A box that is ready to go on a journey to its destined recipient. Who receives it? That\'s up to you!
This fruit box is fresh and sweet, almost as fresh as the fruit picked from the Syrup Garden!

No need to worry about the menu when you\'ve got Kurly around! The menu goes into great detail to let you know about all the ingredients, their flavors, and even how they all blend together in culinary perfection! If you\'re a Cookie who knows your stuff, this is definitely something to refer to.
The morning stars shining bright, an owl resting on a branch... This decoration has a bit of all the things one would consider part of a mystical early-morning landscape.
A round carpet with a \"Kurly\" print in the middle. It could give any room a more sophisticated feel to it.

While there exist many unidentified objects within the Witch\'s Castle, this orb is among the most mysterious. If you feel yourself remember long-forgotten memories, the brilliant glass sphere shows a moment where a certain witch completely changed the world. It seems the world itself does not forget easily.

Its tip might be crooked and its brim split, but this old witch\'s hat still makes an excellent hideout for a Cookie looking to rest their dough after a hectic day. But who might have been the owner of this hat? Be carefulthey might come back looking for it any day!

Something incredible happened after someone poured this toxic potion into the teacup...! Fortunately, the living foam doesn\'t seem to be able to escape its porcelain confines. Still, it\'s better not to take the witch\'s belongings lightly!

This marshmallow meowgician has roasted to perfection and is now enjoying the pleasure of sound sleep atop their wisdom\'s cushion. It is highly advised not to get ahead of yourself when getting to know this meowjestic pundit, for they will only reveal their most roasty-toasty belly to someone they trust!

An animated bat replica made by a certain skilled resident. It likes to be placed in spacious, empty rooms. Every now and then, a certain mischievous Cookie places it in empty hallways, but let\'s keep that to a minimum so that the timid mice don\'t flee.

Welcome to GingerBright\'s Lovely Candy Room!
Welcome to Angel Cookie\'s Peaceful Room of Holiness!
Welcome to Zombie Cookie\'s Room of Awakening!
Welcome to Devil Cookie\'s Room of Carbonated Evil!
Welcome to Wizard Cookie\'s Room of Spellbooks!
Welcome to BOOM BOOM! Cherry Cookie\'s Room!
Welcome to Snow Sugar Cookie\'s Warm Winter Room!
