A grinder that can turn candies into fine powder. It is said powder made with this becomes infused with a coffee-like aroma... What could be behind such a result?
A long stopped syrup mill. Let\'s decorate a room with it!
This grinder will turn even the hardest candy into fine dust. If you have to ask \"will it grind?\" the answer is almost certainly \"yes.\
A cart filled with bottles of syrup. Let\'s find a good place to put it.
A barrel and a simple snack. It\'ll probably look good somewhere...
A simple, round window. Let\'s put it somewhere!
A transparent tube transporting tasty syrup. Anyone would like having this in their room!
A cog that has been around for a while. Let\'s find a place to put it!
A pipe used for transporting syrup. Let\'s place it somewhere!
A wall made using planks. It smells nice and sweet from all the syrup.
An indoor lawn with yellow grass. What a lucky find!
A computer made out of half a soda can filled with various devices. With this you can easily check what\'s going on in the Syrup Garden!
A shelf containing bottles of syrup to be used in an emergency. What a lucky find!
A chair used while keeping an eye on the Syrup Garden. It looks comfy!
A footrest used while keeping an eye on the Syrup Garden. It looks comfy!
Cans of emergency fuel. What a lucky find!
Various blueprints and plans. Anyone would like having this in their room!
A window that opens to a barren landscape. Let\'s put it up somewhere.
A fan blowing fresh air. Where should we put this?
A long, hanging vine. Let\'s put it somewhere and swing from it!
Lights hanging from the ceiling with vines. This helps you traverse vegetation at night!
A wire tap made out of various pieces of scrap metal. What a lucky find!
A hatch that only opens in emergency situations. Let\'s put it to good use.
A wall made by welding iron plates. What a lucky find!
A floor made out of solid metal. Try decorating the floor with this!
A plush loveseat made to seat two Cookies and two Cookies alone.
A fancy table made out of a teacup. Where should we put this?
Identical seats made of whipped cream and cherries. Perfect for when you expect company!
A simple tea table. Anyone would like this!
A red nightstand. Someone might like this.
A window made specifically for two inseparable Cherry Lady twins. For some reason, one of the two windows cannot be opened.
A long window with a cherry blossom decoration. Let\'s put it to good use!
A perfectly symmetrical heart-shaped picture frame. Hung up nice and secure so it\'s not crooked!
A symmetrical decoration hanging from the ceiling. What a lucky find!
A long, green curtain. Looking at it puts your mind at ease.
A round, symmetrical rug. Let\'s place it in an equally symmetrical place!
A wallpaper that is perfectly symmetrical. What a lucky find!
Flooring with an argyle pattern. What a lucky find!
My, my! When I heard the Juice Bar\'s bartender called in sick,
I never imagined the esteemed Sparkling Party\'s very own Sparkling Cookie would be aiding today as well!
Nonsense! Though I must admit, my guests are quite fond of my latest Squeakalicious Soda, haha!
Haha, perhaps those particular patrons of yours have yet to taste my signature Sparkling Juice.
Throngs of guests have traveled beyond the Cat Tower to sample my Squeakalicious Soda.
I\'ve hosted customers who have claimed they escaped the oven just to taste my Sparkling Juice.
Shall we... erm... prepare for opening?
Now then! Shall we finish what we\'ve started?
I believe an outside opinion is needed to wrap things up.
Hm, yes, yes... Then we must...
Why don\'t we have our latest guest be the judge of our little debate?
I agree! Vampire Cookie is a frequent guest of mine. I am sure he will provide some valuable insight.
Oh, c\'mon... Can\'t we all just relax and chill...?
So, lemme get this straight. You want me to try this juice made from a full bunch of grapes...
And then try this creamy, grape soda...
And tell you which one\'s better?
I think I need another sip of each...
Can\'t rush something like this, fellas...
I guess... erm... we should prepare a few extras for his consideration.
That\'s the best thing I\'ve heard all day!
I look forward to your final verdict.
Do I really have to choose just one...?
Nah, I think I still need to taste both a bit more.
By my gouda and halloumi, our concoctions must be equally matched if he\'s deliberating this much!
Yes, it appears so, doesn\'t it?
Your ideas and recipes are exquisite, good Cheesemaster.
And I too am just as impressed at your finesse, good Sparkling Cookie!
What would you say to a... collaboration of sorts? A special recipe to commend this momentous occasion?
It would be a great honor to do so, my friend!
Oh wow, I can\'t wait to see what you two will come up with!
WOW! That\'s the best thing I\'ve ever tasted!
Haha! I\'m glad you enjoyed it.
Ah, a fine compliment for a fine drink!
Perhaps he\'s indulged a bit too much...
Perhaps we should call for Alchemist Cookie to handle this situation?
Yes! I believe a good nagging is well deserved for our taste-testing patron!
Angel Cookie\'s gonna freak out when they see this mess! HAHAHA!
Oh, maybe one more finishing touch...
(I can\'t let Angel Cookie know it was me...!!!)
And erm... I was... I was about to clean this all up for you. Yeah! Cleaning!
(This plan\'s going terribly... I just wanted to prank Angel Cookie!)
Cleaning is such fun, isn\'t it?
It\'s boring because it\'s not my vibe!
We should move on to our next act of kindness...
Are you even listening to me?!
(I should\'ve just come clean at the very beginning...!)
(Wait a minute... Honesty is an act of kindness too, isn\'t it?!)
(PFFFT! I don\'t care anymore... I\'m gonna make a run for it!)
(There\'s nowhere to hide in this room! BAH!)
If you want to be just like the angel statues...
Then it must mean you\'re ready to be a kinder Cookie...
I can help you become a kinder Cookie...
(NO! I CAN\'T GO IN THERE! NOOO!)
(I NEED TO GET OUT OF HERE!!!)
We can open the portal now...
(Ain\'t no way I\'m gonna go through that door! That portal\'s unnatural!!!)
(What do I do? WHAT DO I DO?!)
Haha! Angel Cookie\'ll never find me...!
There\'s no way they\'ll find me-
Devil Cookie... Were you trying to do something bad...?
No, you\'ve got it all wrong!
Er... I feel so nice and kind because of all the things we did today...!
And look at the time! It\'s time for nice and kind Cookies to go to bed and sleep!
It\'s important to sleep on time!!!
Ah...! Yes, sleep is very important...
OK... I will take you next time...
(I should put up this poster before I leave... quickly!)
They\'re the happiest, cheeriest folks in the entire garden!
Not just me, but these other Cookies too!
We\'re happy to meet you, too!
Nice to meet yaaa, such beautiful greetings!
Really? Is that the best rhyme you could come up with...?
This is the Vegetable Residents\' beloved performer,
He\'s always strumming his guitar and sings instead of talking.
Eeeek! B. Rock\'n 51 is looking good!
Yeeeah! I could barely survive, all that time underground where I couldn\'t thrive!
He\'s so cool! He\'s so cool! His lyrics are amazing as ever!
Radish Cookie, got a question for yooou!
I tried to pay attention to the time at first, but now I have no idea how long it\'s been.
Eeek! Then we better stretch our stiff bodies!
Let\'s party! Party till the morning dew! Eeek!
... You JUST woke up minutes ago...
Haha! See? I told ya they\'re the most fun-lovin\' folks in the garden!
Let\'s go straight to the Sugar Beats Plaza!
Wohoo! Should we go as well?
We have to go fix the Sweet Heart.
That\'s alright! The theater is on the way anyway, so we\'ll make a quick stop.
Hehe! I think that\'s a wonderful idea!
The Sugar Beats Plaza is a total mess...
The stage is gone! And all the lights are broken...
Seems like it all dried up and wilted away...
Crushed are my dreams of a show!
Don\'t look so sad! We can build a new theater!
Now that everyone has awoken from their sleep, you can all work together!
Ah... so you\'re all just going to leave...
It\'s not like we have to do the whole festival thing anyway...
Thought you were a frieeend, all cool and nice!
He\'s really not giving up on the rhyming, is he...
Uhm... Well this doesn\'t feel great...
Let\'s help them before we go.
That Cookie must be freshly baked!
You just said we have hearts of ice!
Hahaha! If that\'s what you want, then why not!
Let\'s work together to rebuild the Sugar Beats Plaza!
syrup drops after a grand party.
we couldn\'t find any in time!
Oh no! It\'d be a shame to end
I want to try that too!
Wow! Look at how many syrup drops we collected in such a short time!
I can\'t believe we\'re gathered all in one place once more!
I\'ve been dreaming of this for the longest time...
Every time I fell asleep in the corner of the garden, all by myself...
Every time I fixed the faucet all by myself...
And now everything is back to how it\'s supposed to be!
Seeing everyone so happy makes us happy too!
Calm down and tell us what happened.
My little sister is stuck in the ground over there! We have to get her out!
Looks like there are more residents that need our help!
We\'re getting super good at pulling up residents from the ground now.
Yay! Let\'s go meet the new resident!
Long time no see, Cheery Cherry Tomato!
You\'ve woken up from your sleep!
We\'re fixing up the garden, you see!
You can thank us later. You must be feeling a bit dazed, still.
Who told you to wake us up?!
You can\'t just wake us up because you selfishly wanted to!
Wait a second, didn\'t everyone want to wake up?
That\'s what the Vegetable Residents told you, huh?
But WE Fruit Residents think differently!
I\'m really sorry Cheery, but it\'s true.
EXCUSE ME! Can\'t you see I\'m a fragrant little fruit?
It\'s even in my name! Cheery CHERRY Tomato, you see?
She\'s just woken up, but here we go again...
That\'s it! I don\'t wanna talk to any of you anymore!
I\'m going to find the Fruit Residents!
Why can\'t we just be a normal family...
This is really becoming a big problem!
Hey, no need to get upset, hehe!
Every family\'s got their own problems. But family\'s about sharing worries together!
Yes, at once, we must evacuate.
Gosh, you gave us a fright.
Nice to see you again! I\'m glad to see you\'re safe!
Well, we were but... now we\'re not so sure.
Unfortunately, someone decided to wake up the whole garden.
It was them! Radish Cookie and a bunch of Cookies I\'ve never seen before!
Are the words of this vegetable true?
This is simply too much! Why would you do such a thing, Radish Cookie?
Why would a Cookie such as yourself proceed with such reckless behavior?
I wanted to see everyone again, like old times!
I can\'t help but ask, but why is it that you mustn\'t wake up the garden?
I want to know too! After all, all the Vegetable Residents seemed happy!
They couldn\'t possibly understand our point of view.
Wait! Tell us why you mustn\'t wake up the garden!
We do not have time to explain such a thing to those who are unaware of the long history of this garden.
But if we were to give you a piece of advice...
Your strawberry scent is so sweet and fragrant, so be careful.
To be sweet in this garden is to be cursed.
Well then, we must be on our way.
Yes, on our way we must be.
Wait, let me come with you! I\'m a fruit too!
Is something the matter, Radish Cookie?
Of course not! Everyone was happy to wake up again!
Well, those two just now had a different opinion is all...?
What would Rosemary Cookie have done in this situation...?
I have no idea what she\'d say if she could see me now...
Rosemary Cookie would be proud of you, I\'m sure!
But you don\'t know anything about my big sister at all.
True, I\'ve never met her, and I don\'t know a lot about her...
But I know that you\'re a great repair-Cookie that does her best for the Syrup Garden and all its Residents.
And Cookies can\'t help but root for those who put their heart into helping others!
You sound so well-spoken for once, saying things like that...
There\'s one reason I keep fixing this garden! To wake everyone up! To save everyone!
Everyone who understands can\'t help but agree, right? Even the Fruit Residents! And, I\'m sure that Rosemary Cookie will too!
That\'s the spirit! Keep your chin up and stand strong, Radish Cookie!
Alrighty then! Let\'s pull ourselves together and head to the Sweet Heart!
We\'re almost there, so buckle up and follow me!
We\'re with you all the way!
Yeah, but I have an idea...!
Yup! There are four faucets in the area.
I thought I\'d lost you forever!
Haha! It\'s a fresh new start!
Now that everyone\'s up and awake,
we can all get back to work and-
Why is Rosemary Cookie so angry?
We were right on their tails.
From his reaction... It seems we are at a draw.
Excuse me. You must vacate the premises!
No, that sounds a bit too mean...
You\'ve yet to pay your expenses and are no longer welcome at...
Hm, that\'s sounds a bit too... cold?
Pardon for the interruption. But may I ask why you are mumbling in front of my room?
AH?! Ah! Oh yes, hello there, sir.
I believe you started with, \"Away with you! Out! BEGONE!\" I must admit that I was quite fond of that one.
I will be honest with you. I am no longer in a stable enough financial position to pay for my stay at the hotel.
If permitted, may I have a few minutes to pack my belongings? Just a few family heirlooms is all.
Heirlooms are always a part of the Grand Cabinet Hotel\'s auction! And there\'s an auction very soon, sir!
Maybe... well, I mean... if you\'re willing, these heirlooms could be featured at the auction...?
The revered treasures of House Danish... in an auction?
Well, it\'s just an idea, sir. They might be enough to cover your expenses? And that means I won\'t have to kick, ahem, send you away?
O-O-Oh, but of course, that\'s only if you\'d a-a-allow me to assist! Perhaps I can take a look at them first? A quick evaluation?
Sir! What about this wonderful, illustrious antique desk?!
Such a fine specimen may fetch a good price, enough to cover your stay!
That desk belonged to the very Cookie who first discovered the Witch\'s Cabinet! The one who designed this very hotel before it was even a hotel!
No! I refuse to put up a piece of history to some auction! The very thought puts a stain on my honor!
Let\'s look for something else, perhaps?
You\'d dare insult Great Grandmother Danish with such a blasphemous suggestion?!
Great Grandmother Danish risked her life to bring the chess set from the deadly and treacherous witch\'s study...
Alas, I cannot part with such an heirloom just to hear the clinking of Sugar Coins.
(Oh... I think I should call the Manager...)
The chess set is not for sale.
NO, have you no respect for one\'s family elders?!
This masterpiece of a painting, \"Likeness of Lordly Little Lad\", is a timeless work of art by the legendary artist, Brushed Danish Cookie.
This piece is so priceless, if it were ever sold at an auction, I could stay in this room forever!
No, I could buy the entire floor of this hotel...
I... I didn\'t really think... erm...
But I shall not put it up for auction. As the heir of House Danish, I cannot commit myself to such financial greed.
But sir! You must come to a decision!
And so... This is my fate. To squander in the back alley of the hotel. But alas, I... I cannot give up such prized family relics.
Good news, sir! I looked over the books and there\'s a few vacant rooms available until the day of the auction!
I\'ve reported this directly to the Manager! He has personally arranged for a temporarily extended stay for you, sir.
You... The warmth of your heart fills me with gratitude. Thank you.
But... It\'s only until the auction, sir.
This auction must be quite the popular occasion...
Yes, there are many relics and rare finds featured at the auction. This year will feature the \"Pathfinder\'s Last Compass\"!
What? Did I hear you just correctly?
Have you... heard of it, sir?
... Of course I\'ve heard of it, for it too is part of House Danish\'s lineage and history.
How many family treasures are there?!
Please inform me of when exactly the auction will be held. It looks like I must extend my stay up until the very day of the auction!
There are so many wonderful places inside the castle!
\"Marvelous\" isn\'t quite the word I\'d use...
GingerBrave! Let\'s decorate this place together!
(Wait a second... Things that are cute? Things that... GingerBright thinks... are cute...)
(... WAIT! Then that means?! That monster plant from last time!)
(Oh no, no, no! This can\'t end well!)
Ahem. I\'m gonna go find some things we\'ll need then.
I-I-I\'ll go with you, Wizard Cookie!
Then let\'s do this! We can start with this wall first!
There\'s something a bit weird here...
OH! Those are just stale Cookies who didn\'t drink enough Life Potions!
Aw, it\'s not so bad when you take a closer look.
You can tell they were all baked by the same witch! They all look pretty similar, don\'t they? Teehee!
Aaand, if you look really close at them for a long time...
OH! I\'ve got a wonderful idea just now!
And let\'s decorate the jar to make it prettier!
I\'m sure the stale Cookies will feel all nice and warm!
The jar will liven this place up SO MUCH!
I don\'t think \"cute\" really describes this...
Really? But look at them, all inside!
We should keep up the pace!
Good lighting is important when playing video games... Hehe.
What an awesome idea, Strawberry Cookie!
Curtains\'ll give a sense of privacy from prying eyes!
This room is getting better and better!
It\'s... getting somewhere for sure, hehe...
We\'re missing a nice, pretty flower!
Did you know that, before we met you and Wizard Cookie...
GingerBrave and I found the bestest and prettiest flower out in the hallways!
We should give that flower a new home!
A flower from the castle hallways...?
I\'m so excited! This place needs a bit of color to brighten up the place. That flower\'s gonna be perfect!
What in the name of wizard\'s beards and ice cream...
Saying hello to an old friend, GingerBrave? TEEHEE!
I thought it\'d look perfect in this room!
(No thank you...! I\'d rather lock myself in a treasure chest than staying another minute here!!!)
(Note to self, for all our sakes. \"If GingerBright thinks something\'s cute, RUN.\")
To help the flower grow all healthy and strong,
we should leave lollipops right here!
This flower really loves lollipops, hehehe!
(Note to self... NEVER FORGET! If GingerBright thinks something\'s cute...)

When the sun sets, you can hear the sound of wheels turning in the distance, hinting at the start of a fun festival! This mobile stage is carved out of a large pumpkin, and is perfect for simple plays.
A place to store good luck gifts! I\'m sure anyone would love having one of these!
A storage for neatly keeping all concert outfits in one place. What a lucky find!
A cart filled with sweet syrup droplets. What a lucky find!
A cabbage dressed up for party! Having one of these around will definitely raise the mood of everyone around!
A tomato street light decorated for a festival. Even so, it\'d probably look good anywhere you place it.
A table made for simple events. Let\'s find a good spot for it!
A small seat made out of a bottle cap. It serves its purpose.
A bunch of leaves tied together with a light source. Let\'s hang it up right away!
A wallpaper portraying fireflies in the night sky. While the wallpaper does glow at night, it\'s not bright enough to disturb a good night\'s sleep.
Oh no, there\'s been an accident! Let\'s place it somewhere and pretend we didn\'t see it.
A faucet, fixed using things thrown away by the witches. You can truly feel Radish Cookie\'s determination radiating from it!
A pipe that doesn\'t seem to be able to decide for a direction. I\'m sure we can find a place for it, still!
A pipe in a fairly rough shape. Let\'s find a place where it can shine!
A pipe that has been sealed by someone. I\'m sure there\'s a wall somewhere that could use this!
Weeds growing freely from the ground. It\'s certain to bring any room closer to nature!
A small patch of grass that desperately needs more syrup to grow. Let\'s place it somewhere it can reach the skies!
A warning sign that has faded with time. Let\'s put it to good use!
A strangely twisting pipe. Let\'s find a good place for it!
This pipe goes this way and that way too! Let\'s put it somewhere it can be of good use.
A pipe with a gadget attached for metering. It serves its purpose.
Ivy that grows however it pleases! One look away and the whole wall will be overgrown with it!
A wallpaper that makes you feel like you\'re in the middle of the forest. What a lucky find!
Basic floor made from dry dirt. It\'s not much, but it has a certain rustic charm.
Stand Up! Even If We Crumble!
The Witch\'s Castle is full of unexpected dangers. Will you really be able to escape out through the window?
The compass is being sold at the Grand Cabinet Hotel auction. It was fun working a brief part-time job at the hotel to get this!
The Cookies went through the hotel looking for captured guests and staff. Phew! That was a doozy!
Some memories fade with time. Will the two Cookies be able to resolve their complicated relationship?
GingerBrave has never cleaned before, but he seems to be doing well! The uniform fits like a glove too!
An encounter with the syndicate as they raid the auction! It was scary as they attacked in a group, but our friends have made it through together.
The first deadlift competition! It was far from an easy, but thanks to GingerBright, the Cookies have won!
What even is a cuteness contest...? No one is sure, but Strawberry Cookie was the perfect choice as competitor!
Wizard Cookie shocked everyone with the dish he presented for the contest. But it impressed Cashew, so... A win is a win!
The time has come to put an end to a long, bad relationship. Perhaps today\'s showdown was destined from the beginning.
The residents feel the groove again at the Sugar Beats Plaza! This is the moment Radish Cookie has been looking forward to while rejuvenating the barren garden!
The day when the Reaper harvested all the sweet residents of the Syrup Garden... This event is likely the reason for Rosemary Cookie\'s cold demeanor.
Rosemary Cookie realized as soon as she heard Radish Cookie\'s cry! Radish Cookie is no longer a half-baked Cookie!
Bright red eyes shining through the faded bushes! Our heroes\' first encounter with Radish Cookie started with a small misunderstanding!
Our friends helped Radish Cookie wake the garden up by soaking the soil in syrup! Is it just me, or can you still smell that sweet fragrance?
Our heroes engaged in a bout with the Churro Golem in front of the Sweet Heart! Why is he so angry?
Just sticking a straw in the ground makes syrup well up?! GingerBrave and friends completely lost track of time watching the amazing sight!

A stone staircase with a luxurious red carpet. Walking down these feels both fancy and comfortable!
A particularly sleepy statue. Let\'s put it somewhere it can sleep in peace.
A gemstone that glows light blue, able to light up a room. Anyone would like this!
A double door with cute gargoyle-shaped handles. What a lucky find!

A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Witchberry Cookie. When you touch it, it releases a sweet scent of witchberries, making it popular among all Cookies.

Oh, he\'s not afraid of my lollipop this time...!

My pliers? Does something need fixin\' right now?!

Are you sure you want to skip this story?
A shadowy figure, clutching an inherited recipe of old, enters the castle. Soon after, the ancient oven awakens from its slumber...
A freshly-baked Cookie has escaped from the oven! While fleeing from the clutches of the terrifying witch, the Cookie fell outside the castle, but is saved by a mysterious, radiant wanderer...
The escaped Cookie has met Witchberry Cookie, who reveals that this place is the terrifying witch\'s castle. The freshly-baked Cookie sees an open window and vows to escape through it!
Our new friend, the freshly-baked Cookie, has fixed the stairs to make his way up the castle. Already, he\'s making an impact on the castle, little by little!
The escaped Cookie has met Grandpa Doorstache, whose mouth has been frozen shut! Our friend decides to thaw the surrounding rooms to help Grandpa Doorstache speak normally.

Grandpa Doorstache can speak once more, thanks to our Cookie friend. The hearty doorkeeper warns the Cookie to walk gingerly yet bravely. Inspired by these words, Cookie decides to give himself the name, \"GingerBrave.\

GingerBrave suddenly feels dizzy and falls unconscious. Another Cookie, GingerBright, discovers our unconscious friend and gives him a Life Potion. Always remember: Life Potions are key to preventing staleness.
GingerBright is certain following GingerBrave on an adventure will lead to all sorts of fun! The two Cookies decide to team up and find a way out of the castle.

Our friends meet the shy Strawberry Cookie and a talking treasure chest... Er, correction, Wizard Cookie, who is trapped inside the chest. Apparently, Wizard Cookie is conducting research on a spell to create Life Potions?!
Wizard Cookie succeeded in conjuring a cauldron filled to the brim with Life Potion, perhaps a bit too successful! The Cookies tried to store as much Life Potion as they could into empty vials.
The four Cookies decide to travel together. Each has their own reason for embarking on this adventure, but they all agree that it will be better to work as a team!
\"Waaah! Go away!\" The group witnessed a small Cookie being harassed by a huge cat! Don\'t worry, we\'ll save you!
The team rescued the cute and adorable GingerDozer. But after learning of the witch\'s return, GingerDozer is... smiling?
Our friends continue their journey, but are on the verge of starving. Suddenly, a delicious, savory aroma wafts from somewhere unknown. They eagerly seek the aroma\'s source!

The Cookies have discovered Cheesehaven, the greatest tavern in the Witch\'s Kitchen. But it\'s in danger of closing down permanently... Our friends decide to help its owner, the Cheesemaster, reopen the tavern!
GingerBrave and friends have successfully helped the Cheesemaster handle a full house. After a busy night, and a hearty meal, GingerDozer seems sleepier than ever.
The team chats deep into the night. It seems like they\'ll go their separate ways once they make it outside the window.
GingerBrave and friends have finally made it to the top-most window of the witch\'s kitchen! Just as they decide to finally make their escape, a shadow approaches from behind!

Despite the window of escape being right in front of his eyes, GingerBrave decides to rescue GingerDozer from the clutches of the Shadow Witch. GingerBright, Wizard Cookie, and Strawberry Cookie join him on the daring rescue mission!
The team arrives at the Grand Cabinet Hotel, only to find it empty. GingerBright rings a bell at the front desk and observe a clumsy employee running their way.
The group learns that an enchanted compass is up for auction at the hotel. Maybe it can help them find GingerDozer?! Our friends decide to speak with the hotel manager to learn more.

The compass is the highlight of the auction, and there\'s no way our friends can get their hands on it without bidding. The team decides to take part-time jobs to earn Sugar Coins for the big auction.
In his quest to collect Sugar Coins, GingerBrave has decided to clean rooms. But some guests seem... odd. While trying to do his job, GingerBrave is kicked out of a room.
Wizard Cookie\'s part-time job in the kitchen started with peeling potatoes. But alas, no magic allowed?!
GingerBright has decided to work as a bellhop. She gets caught up in a slight commotion between two Cookies who seem to know each other...
Strawberry Cookie, trying her hand at room service, runs into a worried guest. She musters up the courage to provide a heartfelt, honest answer and receives a generous tip as thanks!

Each member of the team has completed their part-time shifts. They regroup and head to the auction with their hard-earned Sugar Coins, but are slightly delayed by a tiny mess, which they decide to help clean up.
Our friends engage in a bidding war with the regal Marble Danish Cookie, who also seeks the compass. But out of nowhere, disaster strikes the auction house!
GingerBrave opens his eyes to find... Witchberry Cookie? According to her, the hotel has been raided by the Apricot Jam Syndicate. Get up and save your friends, GingerBrave!
GingerBrave managed to find and free his friends. The team tries to untie Marble Danish Cookie but... the rope won\'t come loose! Marble Danish Cookie asks the group to find his sword.
Our friends manage to free Marble Danish Cookie and decide to rescue the staff and guests from the bandits! But they\'re ambushed!
The manager has witnessed first-hand how strong and capable the Cookies are. He begs them to save the hotel. Our friends and Marble Danish Cookie decide to save the hotel, together!
The Cookies decide to rescue the hostages, but don\'t know where to begin. Marble Danish Cookie has an idea. They visit a particularly old room first...
The old, dusty room has a secret passageway! Marble Danish Cookie tells our friends that the hotel used to be his childhood home. There\'s a story behind it, but there are hostages to rescue!

One of the Syndicate\'s lieutenants, Cashew, is holding the chef hostage and forcing him to taste-test a horrendous bowl of mush. Cashew challenges the Cookies to a cooking contest in exchange for the chef\'s freedom. Wizard Cookie steps up to the plate!
The Cookies discover an old cutting board... which is actually a picture of Cookies who used to work for the House of Danish. The team learns of the family\'s history... and how it fell to ruin.
Walnut is forcing the bellhop to exercise. In exchange for the bellhop\'s freedom, Walnut proposes a competition of strength. And guess who\'s accepted the challenge? GINGERBRIGHT!
The team discovers another painting, this time showing the three greatest treasures of House Danish. The Cookies decide to continue their mission to defeat the bandits.
Miss Scarab is terrified of Peanut, who challenges Strawberry Cookie to a battle of... cuteness? Strawberry Cookie may be shy, but she won\'t give up on her quest to rescue the guests!

Another painting was hidden behind a mirror. A young Marble Danish Cookie and another Cookie are portrayed. After a brief history lesson from Marble Danish Cookie, the team continues with their mission.
The Cookies have saved all of the staff and guests! The manager insists on expressing his gratitude with a gift... But he needs the Cookies to find it for him.

The team is presented with a Golden Key from the manager, but the leader of the Apricot Jam Syndicate, Sachertorte Cookie, appears! Our friends finally learn more about the feud between Sachertorte Cookie and Marble Danish Cookie.
The team is in hot pursuit of the bandits. An obstacle blocks their path, but nothing can stand in the way of teamwork and determination!
The path forward is cleared, but Sachertorte Cookie appears once more! Our heroes charge forward to capture her, but fall into a trap and GingerBrave has been kidnapped!

GingerBrave has been rescued, but Sachertorte Cookie, once more, has evaded capture. GingerBright proposes a plan to capture the bandits, but the room they\'re in is too messy to hold a strategy meeting.
GingerBright\'s plan is laid out on the table, and everyone slowly agrees. Except for a mysterious voice that suddenly yells, NO!
The mystery voice was Witchberry Cookie, who has appeared to tell our friends that they need a new plan that will actually prove useful. Or will it?
GingerBrave and Wizard Cookie run off to search for oil. The chef provides them with some top-notch olive oil as thanks for saving him and the hotel.
GingerBright is looking for baby powder and runs into the bellhop and vault keeper. The two members of the staff are eager to help her and her friends with whatever they need.
Strawberry Cookie and Marble Danish Cookie are in search of some sturdy rope and run into Miss Scarab. They don\'t see any rope, but with the help of Miss Scarab, the two procure a good length.
The Cookies regroup with their procured supplies. But GingerBrave is suddenly curious... \"Do Marble Danish Cookie and Sachertorte Cookie really have to keep fighting?\
The baby powder is used to distract the bandits, but Sachertorte Cookie buys time for her colleagues to escape. She\'s stronger than she looks!
The Cookies manage to escape from the Apricot Jam rope thanks to covering themselves in oil. They use the rope from Miss Scarab to continue their pursuit.
Sachertorte Cookie, with compass in hand, taunts the Cookies. Marble Danish Cookie charges forward to bring an end to their feud...

Marble Danish Cookie finally realizes the truth after a reminder from Sachertorte Cookie, who was genuinely hurt by his past actions. He offers a sincere apology. Sachertorte Cookie disappears... but has left the compass!!! Has she forgiven him?

Despite being a family treasure, Marble Danish Cookie has decided to let the Cookies keep the compass. The compass points towards the Syrup Garden! Our friends embark on the next chapter of their adventure.
The group arrives at the Syrup Garden... but there\'s no syrup in sight! The garden is bone dry and barren. The Cookies decide to look for something to drink!
Our friends find some syrup, but it was a trap! The team meets Radish Cookie, who is keeping watch over the garden all by herself!
Radish Cookie tells our heroes about the situation she\'s in. The Syrup Garden was once teeming with life... The faucets were broken by the Churro Golem, which caused the garden to shrivel and wilt.
Radish Cookie claims that syrup will flow once more if they fix one of the faucets and asks our heroes for help. The team is eager to help a Cookie in need!
As soon as they fix the faucet, the Syrup Garden returns to life! The arid soil becomes healthy once more and residents start popping up from beneath the ground!
The awakened farmers wish to thank our friends with a snack. They insist on it! Our friends decide to indulge as it\'s not polite to refuse!
GingerBrave and friends tell Radish Cookie that they are searching for GingerDozer. Perhaps the leader of the garden, and Radish Cookie\'s sister, Rosemary Cookie, could help!

The Churro Golem appears! Radish Cookie is shocked to see that the Churro Golem has broken the faucet once more. Our friends fend off the Churro Golem as Radish Cookie promises the team to take them to meet Rosemary Cookie at the Sweet Heart.
The road to the Sweet Heart is no relaxing walk. The Churro Golem has broken a syrup pipe, which needs fixing!
With another faucet fixed, more residents sprout from the ground! This time, they are vegetable residents!
The cheerful Vegetable Residents decide to celebrate the garden\'s return to life with a party. Our friends join them at Sugar Beats Plaza.
Sugar Beats Plaza has been abandoned for so long that it\'s in very rough shape. But not to worry! Our friends are eager to help restore the plaza to its former glory.
The residents are ready to PAAARTY! Our friends decide to help the party\'s traditional conclusion of drinking syrup drops by finding more syrup.
A small but very vocal Cheery Cherry Tomato is angry for being pulled out of the ground. Why? Well... According to her, fruit residents such as herself didn\'t want to be awakened...
After seeing the Fruit Resident\'s reaction to being awakened, Radish Cookie begins to wonder if she\'s truly doing the right thing... Stay strong, Radish Cookie!
Our friends have finally arrived at the Sweet Heart, which is being strangled by the Churro Golem\'s vines. The team hurriedly removes the vines to free Rosemary Cookie!
The Sweet Heart is back in full operation, but the Churro Golem has appeared once more! He sure is persistent!

Rosemary Cookie has awakened. But the joy of being reunited is short-lived, as Rosemary Cookie is shocked and aghast to see the garden revitalized. \"The Syrup Garden must not be awakened,\" she exclaims! What does she mean?!
GingerBrave and friends chase after Rosemary Cookie and Radish Cookie. Why must the Syrup Garden not be awakened?!
Witchberry Cookie is rummaging through bunches of clutter here and there. She asks that you clean the place up and help her find something very important.
You discover a bundle of witchberries stored in a jar. Witchberry Cookie tells you a story about the castle\'s past.
Witchberry Cookie has found what she\'s looking for! She wonders if other Cookies such as herself will ever be baked one day.
In ages past, the castle was filled with many witches and their animal friends. Perhaps there are still traces of them around the castle?
Witchberry Cookie says that her dough is extra special due to a single, extra ingredient. She\'s not telling you what that secret ingredient is so easily...

The Apricot Jam Syndicate has returned to their hideout and decide to open a party to celebrate their latest haul. But they decide to clean up first. Hey, just because they\'re bandits doesn\'t mean their lair is filthy!
It\'s not a real party without really tasty food! Walnut volunteers to cook for the night and reminisces about the first time meeting Sachertorte Cookie.
Peanut is decorating the lair and reminisces with Sachertorte Cookie on how the Syndicate decided to create their emblem. After sharing a few words, Sachertorte Cookie disappears to... somewhere.
The party is ready to begin! But where\'s Sachertorte Cookie? OH! There she is, and she\'s brought a special gift for the party?!
Presents, memories, food, and cake! It\'s about time to get the party really started now!
GingerBright is wandering around the castle and gets an amazing idea! She wants to try decorating a room herself, from start to finish! GingerBright eagerly asks Strawberry Cookie to join her.
It seems that GingerBright has always had a soft spot for stale Cookies in jars... She wants them to feel comfy in her room.
Lighting is an important element of interior design! GingerBright decides to hang up some cute curtains, but something\'s right outside the window?
GingerBright\'s masterpiece is almost complete, but there\'s something. OH! She thinks that having a plant in the room will be finishing cherry on top.
The room is finally complete! GingerBright is extremely pleased with how the room turned out, but GingerBrave and Wizard Cookie are somewhat... hesitant to provide their honest opinions.
The Juice Bar\'s bartender has called in sick! The Cheesemaster and Sparkling Cookie have come to the Juice Bar\'s aid... but there\'s some tension in the air.
The two tavernmasters decide to find out whose beverage recipes are better. They invite Vampire Cookie to be an impartial judge.
Let the judging commence! But according to Vampire Cookie, they\'re both too good to just choose one. I guess this round\'s a tie?
Round 2! Vampire Cookie tastes both entries, but cannot come to a decision. Sparkling Cookie and the Cheesemaster both agree to create a special beverage together!
The ultimate beverage, created through teamwork, has been presented to Vampire Cookie... who has probably had too much juice tonight. Right before he falls asleep, he declares the competition a draw!

Marble Danish Cookie is visited by a very nervous bellhop who has come to collect overdue fees for his hotel room, but he does not have enough funds. The bellhop suggests, carefully, that putting some items up for sale in the auction is an option to consider.
The bellhop suggests to Marble Danish Cookie that a desk may be a suitable entry for the auction. Marble Danish Cookie suddenly becomes very angry and shares a history lesson with the bellhop.

This time, the bellhop points at a chess piece for the auction, but alas, Marble Danish Cookie once more regales the bellhop with an even longer history lesson. All of his family treasures are too valuable and sentimental!
Alas, there are very little options left. The bellhop suggests a portrait\'s frame and, as expected, Marble Danish Cookie refuses to be separated from it.

In the end, Marble Danish Cookie is kicked out of the Grand Cabinet Hotel... While wallowing in self-pity, he is shocked to see the bellhop looking for him! Thanks to the bellhop\'s pleas to the manager, Marble Danish Cookie can stay in the hotel, but only until the auction... where a certain compass is up for grabs.
Devil Cookie has decided to \"redecorate\" Angel Cookie\'s room. But Angel Cookie has returned a bit too soon!
Devil Cookie has somehow ended up cleaning the mess they caused. The mischievous Cookie decides to make a run for it but...

The first escape attempt has failed! Devil Cookie makes up an excuse, but Angel Cookie misunderstands and is convinced that Devil Cookie is ready to become a kinder, nicer Cookie and suggest they go through the Portal to the Heavens together.
No matter what happens, Devil Cookie is unwilling to pass through the magical portal! The Cookie suddenly feigns illness to escape!
Right before making an escape, Angel Cookie has figured out the truth. Devil Cookie puts on an amazing acting display and manages to finally escape.
Tap to save the freshly baked Cookie!

The store opens once you reach Lv.5!

This underground lobby of the witch\'s castle has a mysterious and eerie vibe. A stone statue that might wake up at any moment, an altar for something, and even echoing meows coming from unlit hallways! What kind of secrets does this castle really hold...?

We\'ve looked everywhere... but it looks like your hat isn\'t here...
Maybe we could take another look...?
But... I\'ve already looked everywhere I could think of...
Hey, Radish Cookie? Could you ask Rosemary Cookie if she\'s seen our friend\'s hat?
The thing is... Well... Rosemary Cookie\'s the one who ruined the spa...
WHAT?! There\'s no way she\'d do that! She loves taking care of the garden and everyone here!
We were relaxin\' and chillin\' here after we called it a day, but then Rosemary Cookie showed up.
Mind you, we hadn\'t seen her in forever! So we called out to her, to say hi and stuff!
Hey, Rosemary Cookie! The spa\'s back in business!
She took one look at the spa and all the hot syrup... and got all angry and frustrated!
She flew into a rampage, I tell ya! Started to pour out the syrup all over the floor!
The place was ruined in the blink of an eye!
Was it a distraction to steal my hat?!
All that for a farmer\'s hat? If she were after MY hat, I\'d understand...
Anyways... y\'all should probably find her, and quick. Can\'t shake the feelin\' that something big\'s gonna go down soon...
Don\'t worry, Radish Cookie! We\'ll help you look for her.
Maybe Rosemary Cookie\'s confused or something...? She\'s been sleeping for a long time, hasn\'t she?
Thanks, y\'all. I\'m really glad y\'all are here with me!
We\'re happy to help! Now let\'s keep moving!
Which means she can\'t be far!
Which means she must\'ve gone that way!
C\'mon! We should follow her trail!
... How could you do this to me?!
How could you do that to our garden?!
WHAT SORT OF GARDENER ABANDONS HER GARDEN!!!
Afraid? Afraid of what? TELL ME!
It\'s already begun... The garden is in danger once more...! But this is too soon.
Churro Golem! Find out where the Reaper has gone. And tell everyone to get to safety!
We can fight back! The residents are healthier than ever! We\'ve got new friends who can help! We can do this, TOGETHER!!!
Is that really all you can think of?
The more time is wasted, the more lives are at risk.
I\'m sorry, kiddo. I... You didn\'t need to see that.
Lead the way, sport! We\'re here to help!
Don\'t worry, it\'s a simple and quick procedure. You\'ll be snug inside the pod in no time.
Okay... I believe you. But I\'m still nervous...
This\'ll be our first time helping with something like this! But everything\'ll be alright!
If I may interject? I\'ve no hands-on, practical experience, but trust me when I say I am familiar with the procedure thanks to my extensive reading.
ROSEMARY COOKIE! NO SURGERY! NO SURGERRRYYY!
Rest assured, I will be the only one performing the procedure. You\'re in good hands... These Cookies are here to aid me with minor tasks.
I think your... enthusiasm... was a bit too much for her.
We, erm... We just wanted to reassure her that everything\'ll be fine...
Here, take some of my hair and scatter it around our friend. It should calm her down.
Now\'s our chance! Pull from both ends of the pod and don\'t let go!
Eh? Rosemary Cookie? Rosemary Cookie! ROSEMARY COOKIE?!
We\'re back together again! Thanks, Rosemary Cookie. You\'re the best gardener ever!
I couldn\'t have done it without the help of these two.
Thank you, GingerBright and Wizard Cookie. I meant it when I said I couldn\'t have done it without you.
You\'re really good at gardening and taking care of the residents!
I try... But it\'s always better if no one gets hurt in the first place.
If only Radish Cookie hadn\'t restored the garden...
But everything Radish Cookie\'s done so far was to help the garden, wasn\'t it?
Pardon me for asking so bluntly but... Why mustn\'t the Syrup Garden be awakened?
You\'ve seen much of the garden already, haven\'t you? And you\'re familiar with how verdant it can truly be.
The flow of sweet syrup, the rich soil, the heartiest of residents... Everything within the garden is fragrant and aromatic, healthy and robust.
You probably think it\'s the sweetest of blessings, don\'t you? But you\'re wrong. In reality, it\'s the bitterest of curses.
The witch knows that our garden is special. That we\'re special. And because of the syrup... we taste special.
We\'ve always tried to avoid the witch\'s attention, hiding and lying low. The sweetest of residents must always take extra care.
Everyone was quite skilled in hiding amongst the leaves and bushes, but we lived in peace. That is... until the Reaper appeared.
The witch offered rewards for our capture. Raiders and hunters swarmed the garden in droves to offer us to the witch. And the Reaper was the worst of them all.
Many of our friends were captured and sacrificed to the witch. Foul rumors and horror stories soon reached our ears, of how the witch enjoyed her meals...
Radish Cookie wanted to resist, fight off the invaders. She built all sorts of gadgets in her attempt to keep them and the Reaper at bay.
But I knew it was futile... With each passing day, we lost more and more of our closest friends...
Then one day, Radish Cookie left the garden, claiming that the answer to defeating the Reaper might be out there somewhere.
As she ran off into the distance, I told the Churro Golem my plan. Something that I had been thinking over for a very long time...
That\'s when you asked the Churro Golem to break all the faucets, right?
Hmm... Making the garden a dry and barren place and removing the Syrup Garden from the Reaper\'s sights.
Yes. I thought it was the only way to ensure our survival... The garden, the residents, myself,
You knew she wouldn\'t dare face the Reaper alone...
It was a solid plan, and it worked. But I did not take into account one major variable...
I knew Radish Cookie was persistent and stubborn. But I didn\'t know that her persistence would succeed in restoring the garden.
She is- Wait, did you hear that?
Something\'s definitely wrong! We should find him quickly!
But not very smart, are you?
You smell like lovely lil\' ssstrawwwberries!
I won\'t run away from fear!!!
We can do this if we

I need to find a way...
Something smells sweeter and riper than ever!
Please! Fear will only make me age and rot faster!
I will turn into browned mush! There\'s no reason to take me!
You cannot offer such a pathetic, rotten specimen as I to the witch, can you?!
Oh ho ho? That only means produce such as yourself must be disposed of more quickly and efficiently!!!
What else have we got here... Ah! A vegetable!
A fair warning! No one likes broccoli!
But fresh broccoli is scrrrumptious in all types of stir-fry! Kehehehe!
She\'s taking the residents somewhere else...?!
In you go! Nice and quietly, one by one!
OH!!! Well, you asked and you shall receive... You\'re going to Mount St. Cr?me!
Such a lovely place! Where eternal frost keeps everyone ripe and fresh!
Aw, don\'t make that face, little tasty! You should feel blessed to call Mount St. Cr?me your new home!!!
Well, technically speaking, a temporary home... Because your final destination is the witch\'s dining table!
So many recipes, so many appetizers and entr?es! I wonder where you\'ll end up?!
Maybe you\'ll all be part of a hearty stew served with Cookies for dessert?
Or maybe as a healthy snack for the witch\'s minions?!
Or if you\'re super lucky, you might end up as part of the greatest supper with that sleepy Cookie?
Oooh, I heard that Cookie\'s a special one too... So tasty, ripened dough... But very sleepy apparently.
I need to get out of here and find everyone! We need to save GingerDozer from the witch!!!
Just gotta find a way out of here first and...
You know, talking to yourself can often bring unwanted attention, sweet little Cookie.
Were you thinking about whether you\'d be a snack or dessert?
Maybe with tea? Or with coffee?
I\'m quite curious as to what this greenhouse contains...
No... Something else... I don\'t know.
It\'s an unfamiliar smell... Acrid, stinging...
Normally, wherever Rosemary Cookie goes, there\'s an aromatic scent of herbs left in her wake... But this scent is...
Come, let us head inside. Time is of the essence.
Looks like the path is blocked.
Which means it\'s another job for teamwork!
but it will open the path

It will grow exponentially, and won\'t stop until all of the garden\'s syrup is transformed into the bitterest of concoctions.
NOT ON MY WATCH! I\'ll keep fighting!!!
The garden we remember is gone! And nothing can ever bring it back!
This garden! The residents! You and me! We can never go back!!!
Why are you doing this?! Why won\'t you protect the garden and our friends?!
How many friends have we lost... We were helpless, useless.
Our garden... A stomping grounds for evil and death.
And you... Reckless and thoughtless as ever.
I am protecting everything we loved. I am saving them.
The garden we knew will be gone forever, but no one will ever hurt us again...
As long as everyone remains unharmed... I will do anything it takes.
First a haul of fresh produce,
I\'ll remember this harvest for AGES!
Fresh produce, Cookies, and even a Churro Golem!
My sweet, sweet, Syrup Garden, how I\'ve missed you sooo!
Take the others... and get away from here, as far as you can.
And this time... don\'t look back.
What\'re you saying? Snap out of it!!!
My leg is broken, I felt it crumble... You and I both know that all of us can\'t make it.
I won\'t give up! C\'mon, sis!
Just listen to me for once! The Denatonium Hedera will take over the entire garden and there\'s no way to stop it.
Once the garden is desiccated, no one will gaze upon us. The witch, the Reaper... No more harm will befall our friends.
The residents who have failed to flee the garden will burrow into the ground... forever hibernating, forever hidden and safe...
Everyone will be perpetually unharmed... And more importantly, alive.
You think the residents will be thankful for being stuck in the ground, away from everyone they love? You think this is the answer to staying safe?
You have no right to force such cruel isolation upon any of them, on ME! I\'ve been alone, I\'ve been isolated, I KNOW WHAT IT\'S LIKE!
Sure, life can suck and be full of bruises and falling down, but it\'s also about getting back up and keeping at it!
Having your friends backs! Giving a helping hand! Cheering each other on! Living free to chase dreams and hope for a better future!
That\'s the real meaning of life!
You call yourself old and wise? BAH! You\'re just... just a selfish coward!!!
BWAHAHA! Give this Cookie a ROUND. OF. APPLAUSE!
Splennndid! Maaarvelous! What an inspiring, insightful speech from our lovely flourbrain here!
Oh, I do so wish to hear the rest of your fire-spitting debate...
But tut, tut, tut... We have an appointment to keep... at the witch\'s dining table!
Oooh, so you have a plan, eh?
I can do this all day!

But... I don\'t remember the exact name of the place... I was too scared and couldn\'t concentrate clearly but...

No longer is it considered sacred. It has been corrupted... a place of misery and doom.
Mount St. Cr?me is now a perpetually frozen prison, where all become one with the frost or until...

I- well... I must admit, despite the odds, we have had a remarkable winning streak so far.

How to Survive in the Garden

A small spa in the garden filled with the sweetest and most aromatic of steam! The syrup is heated to the perfect temperature over a long period of time. When relaxing in the tub, you can almost feel your stress melting away.
A sturdy hut built with deep-fried dough and bolstered with thick, hardened chocolate. As a finishing touch, the Churro Golem sprinkled cinnamon around the entire hut to truly make it a cozy home.

Lost a twig? Leaves withering? Stem feeling weak? Then you might be in need of medical care! The residents of the Syrup Garden visit this clinic for all their health issues and needs. From surgical equipment to syrup medicine, this clinic has everything that\'s needed to provide top-notch care!
Who would force two siblings to share a room... It\'s a recipe for disaster! Luckily, the two tomatoes have negotiated somewhat of a deal by splitting the room exactly in half.

The Reaper\'s warehouse for storing equipment. Everything about this place is creepy, no doubt about it. What\'s that thing used for? What\'s this? Why does something like that exist?! Let\'s get out of here before we\'re offered up to the Witch\'s Table!
If you look carefully around the dark greenhouse, you\'ll find some strange seedlings growing peacefully... Sure, they look harmless enough, but they\'re giving off a weird vibe.
A Means to Save Them All
Our heroes find Radish Cookie in front of a broken spa. Is there anyone inside? \"EEEK! Don\'t come inside!\
The Cookies have fixed the spa, but learn that it was Rosemary Cookie who broke it. Why would she do such a thing?
Our friends find one of Rosemary Cookie\'s leafy hairs leading somewhere. C\'mon, let\'s follow the trail!
A shocking discovery! The Cookies learn that it was Rosemary Cookie who forced the garden to become dry! Radish Cookie angrily asks her why she would do such a horrendous thing.
The Reaper has returned to the Syrup Garden and is kidnapping the residents. Our friends decide to help protect the garden!
We learn that Rosemary Cookie forced the garden to become dry in order to protect the garden and ensure the survival of the residents and Radish Cookie.
While trying to save the residents, the Cookies walk into a trap. OH NO! Strawberry Cookie has been kidnapped by the Reaper!
Rosemary Cookie helplessly looks at the ensuing chaos and is struck with fear... She forms a plan to save the garden from the Reaper, once and for all.
Strawberry Cookie is held prisoner somewhere by the Reaper. But she overhears something about GingerDozer\'s whereabouts!
Our friends follow Rosemary Cookie to a secret greenhouse. Radish Cookie feels uneasy, with an unexplained sense of foreboding.
Rosemary Cookie asks the Cookies to plant a type of vine into the ground, a Denatonium Hedera seedling. But the vines grow out of control and begin to pollute the garden with frightening speed!
Our heroes try to weed out the vines and prevent it from growing any further. The garden was just restored!!! We can\'t lose it again!
Rosemary Cookie is determined to stop the Reaper from appearing in the garden, even if it means ruining the garden. Radish Cookie is heartbroken at Rosemary Cookie\'s desperation.
The group believes that all hope is lost... but garden\'s residents appear to resist the Reaper\'s harvesting! Get up, Rosemary Cookie! Fight with us! Fight for our home!
Our heroes have defeated the Reaper. Strawberry Cookie tells the group about GingerDozer\'s whereabouts, a place called Mount St. Cr?me.

<color=#B5684F>We aim for CookieRun: Witch\'s Castle to be a fair and enjoyable experience for everyone, and as such take policy violations very seriously.
Feel like your strength is withering? Try resting a while in hot, bubbly syrup! In no time, you\'ll find yourself up and jumping, even sweeter than before!
A plain syrup pump. It doesn\'t seem to have been used in a while.
A shallow tub, a perfectly safe alternative for veggies with little legs.
A well-wiped chair. Sit on this for a more comfortable time washing!
A plate enchanted with fog-repelling magic. A perfect fit for a hot, steamy bathroom.
A half-transparent window with an intricate zig-zag pattern. Let\'s place it somewhere!
An elegant chandelier. What a lucky find!
A surprisingly soft mat made out of sedimentary rock. It feels great to walk on, so let\'s place it somewhere right away!
Wall panels made out of gleaming, sugary syrup. Who wouldn\'t want to bedazzle their room like this?
Shiny jade floor tiles. Let\'s decorate a room with these!
This scale has been redesign to quickly tend to scratches and other serious injuries that the residents of the garden may suffer. May every resident lying down on this scale have a speedy recovery!
A light fixture powered by small, hard-working fireflies. With this, no procedure will ever have to be done with bad visibility!
A medical sickbed for giving injured leeks and green onions comfortable rest. We should keep one around for emergencies.
A medical sickbed for giving unwell apples comfortable rest. We should keep one around for emergencies.
It\'s important for plant health to spray them regularly with syrup. This bottle also contains a herb to bring the fragrance to the next level.
A roll of leaves that do a decent job at blocking sunlight out. Let\'s hang it up somewhere right away!
A hanging light made out of a turquoise pendant. Let\'s put it in a room to lighten it up!
A hammock made for the comfort of soft and frail fruits. What a lucky find!
A syrup filled with sweet, sticky syrup. Let\'s hang it somewhere it can be reached in an emergency.
A rope where you can hang emergency packs of syrup. Let\'s hang them up somewhere they can easily be accessed!
Tent cloth that has been carefully stitched together to not let anything through. We should be able to find a good place to put it.
A floor covered in band aids. Maybe it got hurt after someone stepped too hard on it.
Lie on top of the cherry pie, looking at the cherry-topped drink above, and fall asleep to the pleasant cherry fragrance. This piece is a must-have for all the cherry lovers out there!
The mere thought of that unfinished book below is enough to get rid of all your sleepiness! Now it\'s up to you5 more minutes in bed, or getting up to find out what happens in the next chapter!
These fruits have been polished to the point where they positively sparkle! ... Or are they just replicas?
These cherry lights give off a comfy red light. Let\'s place them somewhere nice!
A seat made out of a wood stump and a leaf. Let\'s use it to give a room a more natural vibe!
A wood stump with a cute strawberry seat cover. Let\'s place it somewhere right away!
These color crayons are enough to bring your wildest imaginations to the real world! Let\'s give them to someone who\'ll make good use of them.
A box filled with bright-red tomatoes. Just looking at them makes you feel a bit peckish!
A planter where small tomatoesdreaming of one day becoming large and tastygrow. Let\'s help them achieve those dreams, and place them somewhere with loads of sunlight!
A collection of small pictures to hang up on a wall. Let\'s find a nice place for them!
A drawing of two cherries. Even from this rough depiction, you can tell they are a match made in heaven!
A wall made of wooden planks, painted in a soothing turquoise color. Put this up in a room to give it a natural, yet stylish feel!
Mix and match these tiles to create the floor pattern you want!

A special canopy that keeps the cinnamon fragrance inside thanks to the roof covered in thick chocolate sauce. In the Churro Golem\'s language, a structure like this is called \"CHUR-OH-CHUR!!!\" Just make sure to put a rising inflection on the final syllable, as anything else obviously would cause a fight to break out.
Various items that seems to have been part of a butler\'s belongings. What a lucky find!
A planter of churros, growing nice and healthy. Let\'s take good care of these!
A lovely, heart-shaped cabinet. This would make a great gift to any Cookie!
Pieces of churro that seemingly were about to be eaten. Instead, now they get to be decoration!
A churro hanging from the ceiling. It seems to be used to practice strange combat techniques.
A rug made out of oil paper. Someone might like having this in their room.
This floor may be a bit unpleasant to walk on, but it is great at keeping the room warm even on cold days!
The very solid wall of a hut. What a lucky find!

A small spa in the garden filled with the sweetest and most aromatic of steam! The syrup is heated to the perfect temperature over a long period of time. When relaxing in the tub, you can almost feel your stress melting away.

Lost a twig? Leaves withering? Stem feeling weak? Then you might be in need of medical care! The residents of the Syrup Garden visit this clinic for all their health issues and needs. From surgical equipment to syrup medicine, this clinic has everything that\'s needed to provide top-notch care!
Who would force two siblings to share a room... It\'s a recipe for disaster! Luckily, the two tomatoes have negotiated somewhat of a deal by splitting the room exactly in half.
A sturdy hut built with deep-fried dough and bolstered with thick, hardened chocolate. As a finishing touch, the Churro Golem sprinkled cinnamon around the entire hut to truly make it a cozy home.
The Churro Golem breaking the faucets... making the garden go bone dry. That was all your doing?
Days and nights alone, trying to wake up you and the residents. My endless failures to irrigate the garden with nothing but scrappy old parts.
And all that time... It was you?

The Syrup Garden has finally awoken! But who would\'ve thought that a long-forgotten threat would return alongside it?!
Hey, take a look at this!
Congrats! You finished the Witchberry Season! A perfect way to remember meeting the lovable Witchberry Cookie in your adventures!

Sweet strawberry cream, crispy waffles, and chubby fresh strawberriesis there a cuter combination? Meet Strawberry Crepe Cookie with an unyielding sparkle of curiosity in the eyes. And this curiosity is a force to be reckoned with: Strawberry Crepe Cookie will stop at nothing to find an answer to every question! Having grown up with Wafflebots, this Cookie preferred tinkering with robotic parts to playing with toys. This little genius\'s cute waffle headset is a tiny engineering marvel on its own. But don\'t touch it! Or you risk witnessing a change from the cute Strawberry Crepe Cookie to the furious one.
Hm, how long will it take to
Welcome to Exciting Schematic Research Strawberry Crepe Cookie\'s Room!
A headset hand-crafted by Strawberry Crepe Cookie. It rumbles threateningly if you get too close... Maybe it\'s more than just a head ornament?!

A special piece of equipment that can analyze structural composition and ingredients of Cookies. According to Strawberry Crepe Cookie, it is still an early prototype, so it can only measure powder levels up to 9000.
This little friend was made by Strawberry Crepe Cookie using discarded parts. But as can be seen with this pupper, even unwanted parts combined can make a dear friend!
Proof of completing the Herb Season Collection. Thanks to your efforts, the castle feels as fresh as a blooming field of flowers!

The Reaper\'s warehouse for storing equipment. Everything about this place is creepy, no doubt about it. What\'s that thing used for? What\'s this? Why does something like that exist?! Let\'s get out of here before we\'re offered up to the Witch\'s Table!
If you look carefully around the dark greenhouse, you\'ll find some strange seedlings growing peacefully... Sure, they look harmless enough, but they\'re giving off a weird vibe.

The Cookies are preparing for adventure...
The Witch is baking more Cookies...
A makeshift prison made from a hollowed-out pumpkin. The dim red color and the putrid pumpkin stench can make a softie out of even the toughest of Cookies.
A pumpkin that happened to be in the wrong place at the wrong time when someone could no longer contain their frustration.
A trap that seems to have its best days behind it. The teeth still look sharp, so better not take any chances!
A door from which a sweet, fruity scent emanates. You can place it in any room, but it somehow always leads to the same place.
A place to hang gardening tools. Let\'s place it somewhere it comes to good use!
A ceiling-mounted fixture for storing fruit. Every room needs fruit, so let\'s find a good place for it!
Or is it half-emptied? Every Cookie in the castle seems to have a different perspective.
A rug made out of hay raked together to form a nice circle. Let\'s make good use of it!

Old, wooden floor panels that give away your presence when you walk on them. While not optimal for someone who likes to go for discreet late-night snacks, they are surprisingly effective for alerting you about intruders!
A wall made of less-than-sturdy planks. Don\'t lean on them, unless you\'re looking for a quick way to create an extra entrance.
Already obtained items are replaced with mileage points.
Purple Coins resembling fresh lavender and sage. These can only be obtained during the Herb Season!
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Strawberry Crepe Cookie\'s soul. If you listen closely, it seems to emit a mechanical whirring noise.
A giant Wafflebot undergoing research by Strawberry Crepe Cookie. It won\'t be long before we have adorable giant Wafflebot dogs running around the place, happily wagging their tails!
Manually control Wafflebots from this elevated seat! It\'s made with a fluffy strawberry crepe cushion, so your feet will be fine even after multiple hours of use!

One of Strawberry Crepe Cookie\'s more advanced creationsa data processing device capable of complex calculations using data from all the Cookie\'s other machines. With this, you can find out everything from the exact density of a Wafflebot to its optimal temperature and suitable toppings! The ultimate Wafflebot is within reach!
A handy tool used for fixing broken waffle machinery. What a lucky find!
A control panel for various mechanical devices. What a lucky find!
A soft footrest made from a cone of strawberry cream. Let\'s put it to good use!
A schematic for creating a giant Wafflebot puppy. The \"Version 618\" at the bottom shows how much effort has been put into creating the perfect companion.
A display showing the vitals of a nearby Wafflebot. We should probably put it somewhere in sight.
A monitor detailing the science of Cookie anatomy. I had no clue all of this was inside me!
A mechanical fan providing air circulation to a room. Strawberry Crepe Cookie says the added spiky edges make any room at least 7.8% cooler.
A lamp made from a waffle cone and strawberry cream. It gives off a smooth light that keeps your eyes from straining, even after hours of research.
Fluorescent lights with modules to control resistivity, so that you can research under optimally controlled conditions.
A floor-mounted glass pane with a sturdy crepe frame. It gives the room a high-tech, yet clean look!
A wall filled with circuits, lighting up as they activate. The very essence of the curious mind of Strawberry Crepe Cookie.
The more mechanical devices in a lab, the more neatly the lab needs to be maintained! That\'s the reason Strawberry Crepe Cookie keeps this floor free from even a single speck of dust.
A beautiful fountain, endlessly spouting syrup. All year round, it seems to be surrounded by pretty flowers and butterflies, drawn by the sweet fragrance.
A fountain with fresh water pouring out of it. The sound of water flowing down through flower pots, forgotten in time, bring peace of mind for nearby Cookies.
A single tulip, leaves adorned with little drops of dew.
A transient abode for plants looking for someplace new to live.
A table for replanting Candy Flowers. Perfect for simple gardening needs!
Stained glass depicting a flower bud just about to bloom. It must have taken a lot of effort for it to get this far.
Stained glass depicting a bud sprouting through the earth. You may have a long way to go, but I\'ll be there cherring you on throughout your journey!
Stained glass depicting seeds planted deep in the ground. It serves as a reminder that even the most beautiful flower once grew silently in the darkness of the soil.
A basket filled with large leaves. Just imagine a relaxed afternoon spent resting in this!
A hand-made ladder that can do a bit of everything. Let\'s place it somewhere easy to reach.
A leafy curtain that blocks out unwanted sunlight. If you leave the window open to let the wind in, you\'ll find the room is filled with a pleasant fragrance.
A ceiling lamp made from a fully-bloomed daisy flower. It\'s sure to bring your room both light as well as a sense of elegance.
Shh... Even as little seedlings, Cookievorous plants tend to have quite the temper if they don\'t get enough sleep.
A planter hanging from the ceiling, adorned with a cute ribbon. Let\'s put it somewhere nice!
A coconut in need of some more rest. Let\'s hang it up somewhere nice and quiet.
This herb wallpaper gives a fresh, spring-like feeling to any room it\'s placed in!
Spring blooms, even in the tiniest of cracks! These stone tiles have pretty flowers and greenery growing in between them.
Herb Cookie\'s Room of Herbal Tranquility
Herb Cookie\'s peaceful room is filled with the fragrant scent of herbs and the faint rustling of grass. All concerns and anxieties are washed away as you enter this tranquil haven.
A Bear Jelly Toy with a design capturing the characteristics of Herb Cookie perfectly. When you hug it, the faint herbal scent will help make you relax.
This Floating Fluffy Seedpuff has seen many corners of the castle.
No one knows how long this Drifting Fluffy Seedpuff has been in the castle.
This Hovering Fluffy Seedpuff is a great friend to have around.

This adorable gardener loves sowing seeds at midday while basking in the sunlight. Our hard-working, green-thumbed friend here has an uncanny ability to choose the best plots of land for flowers to grow.

This handsome gardener loves harvesting syrup reeds and berries while watching the sun rise upon the horizon. Our warm-hearted, green-thumbed friend here takes extra care to harvest fruits without damaging a single twig.

This hearty gardener knows that a productive winter will bring an abundant spring. Our diligent and fast-working friend here ensures that the soil doesn\'t freeze solid, allowing the roots to continue growing throughout the winter.

Welcome to Strawberry Crepe Cookie\'s bustling hub of robotics research and maintenance, a state-of-the-art facility used to repair and create highly advanced Wafflebots. This workshop is filled with bright flashing screens, intricately tangled wires, and topped off with the occasional shower of sparks.

A terrarium with cute seedlings healthily growing. I wonder how they\'ll look once they bloom? Perhaps friendly trees with branches casting comforting shadows on hot summer days, or maybe beautiful flowers putting smiles on everyone\'s faces?
A desk belonging to a certain gardener. What a lucky find!
A flowerbed full of dreamwood flowers. Let\'s put them somewhere they can grow and flourish!
A bowl filled with carefully mixed sprouts and herbs. Looks like it might be used for some medicinal purpose.
A large window that somehow feels important. Let\'s pick a good spot to place it!
Documents containing research data. It looks important, so let\'s hang them up somewhere!
A shelf filled with herbs and traces of nature. Let\'s put this to good use.
Various liquids hanging from a sturdy branch. What a lucky find!
A glass bulb containing a self-luminescent seed. What a lucky find!
A hatch to an indoor cultivation patch. It lets you grow your favorite plants but not have to worry about walking on them!
A wall belonging to someone truly passionate about gardening. Let\'s fill its room with greenery!
The floor of someone truly passionate about gardening. Let\'s fill its room with plants!

Meowstress! I have found your goggles!

These were made with cutting-edge technology, truly state-of-the-art! The only good thing to come from halfwits who dare to call themselves scientists.
The olfactory sensors can detect even the most minute ingredients, and the lenses are capable of zooming in on the tiniest of granular inconsistencies.
O-O-Of course! Such a splendid contraption! Now, if you\'ll excuse me, I shall put an end to the incessant noise!
Hello there, Ageless Cookie! It\'s me, a cute kitty cat! Look at me smile! Don\'t you want to smile after looking at such a fine specimen as I?!
Everyone likes cats! This Cookie will be in awe of me and stop crying, which means more badges from the Meowstress!
This is the opposite of quiet!
GAAAH?! A GIANT CROW?! SCARY GOGGLES! A GIANT CAT! HEEELP ME!!!
The weird goggles are making him cry even louder. At least he was quiet when he first saw my smile...
This stale Cookie is scared of everything! There\'s no way to stop his crying! This is a disaster!
I-I- What I meant was... Ahem! I didn\'t mean to say that out loud- I mean... DOH!
Okay, you useless furball. I\'ll tell you exactly how to silence this rascal.
I can see AND hear that he\'s crying. Just let me think for a moment!
I thought all brats liked toys and snacks... It was a surefire plan. Where did my calculations go wrong?
Wrong...? No, it wasn\'t the plan that was wrong.
There\'s something wrong with this Cookie! This ugly one is the cause of all this mess, my failed experiments!!!
Let\'s be realistic here... I don\'t need a whole Cookie to analyze the ingredients. I just need some crumbs. Perhaps the plan with the hammer is still viable?
Then you\'ll be quiet, and then I\'ll be able to conduct my research on baking more Cookies in peace... Yes, yes.
YES! I will smash you into smithereens! It\'s an ideal solution to all my troubles!!!
She\'s plotting sinister things again. Her meticulous notes are slowly becoming a mess...
She can be so impulsive sometimes, but this is on a whole new level!
I should stop her before she regrets it!
Meowstress? Before we crush this noisy doughrat, how about you consult your favorite book first?
You know... THE book! The book that helped you find this castle? Your grandmother\'s precious book?
The tome? Perhaps you have a point. It may contain some sort of answer...
Yes! Reporting for duty! I will do anything and everything you ask!
Put this crying lump of dough in the refrigerator.
Right away! I shall do as you command!
Does this mean this humble servant will receive a badge? It\'s been sooo long since the Meowstress has bestowed praise upon me...
The cleaning\'s done and the fridge is here but... Ew, it\'s quite dirty.
Come to think of it... Why must this Cookie be put in the refrigerator?
Yes, this is definitely... I remember now. I think... Hm, no? Maybe? Was it? Or could it be?
I dare not ask the Meowstress right now... She\'s too focused on her research.
If I disturb her, she won\'t give me the praise I deserve!
Best not to think too much... Let\'s get rid of this frost and open the door, and...
IN YOU GO, you pesky Cookie! Say hello to your temporary home!
No matter. Keep sobbing, little one.
Your own tears will aid in seasoning your dough. A little salt can go a long way in preserving desserts such as you.
