Everyone needs to wait here in an orderly fashion until it is their turn to undergo the expiration inspection. Ages ago, when everything was fresh and preserved, the waiting room was filled with travelers greetings each other with smiles and laughter. Nowadays, the ambience of this room is filled only with groans and winces of pain caused by mold infection...

Mount St. Cr?me\'s arid yet chilled temperatures are possible thanks to its temperature controller. Such an environment was perfect for prolonging freshness for all residents. But with the controller gone haywire, Mount St. Cr?me has become abysmally dreary and miserable...
A device that lets out a cool breeze when the coolant and antifreeze levels are identical. However, it is extremely difficult to achieve this.
An old flashlight that has become home to a colony of fungi. Let\'s give them a nice, dark, and damp home!
A chunk of ice containing vials of antifreeze liquid that\'s used to keep stable temperatures. It seems like the liquid\'s effects doesn\'t extend outside the vials.
A shattered vial somewhat containing liquid coolant. In a way, it\'ll make your room a bit cooler.
A hole in the wall, giving the room a beautiful view of the moonlit sky outside.
A softly illuminated cave passage. Mysteries and adventures are sure to wait those who walk through!
Tiny icicles. Make sure to watch your head if you place these in a room!
Long icicles that won\'t melt even if you place them indoors. Just remember to watch your head!
Pretty crystals hanging from the ceiling. Let\'s make a room positively shining!
With these walls in your room, you\'ll feel like every day is a spelunking adventure!
A floor made out of beautiful, yet mysterious blue stone. Perfect for when you\'re looking for that magical cave aesthetic.
A sofa made out of a moldy piece of meat. Now this is a... rare sight!
A sofa made out of a moldy piece of bread. Let\'s put it to good use!
A sofa made out of a moldy egg carton. What a lucky find!
A moldy suitcase that lost its owner a long time ago. Like this, it\'s easily recognizable when going traveling!
A group of self-luminescent fungus flowers. Plant it in a room and it fulfills the roles of both vegetation and lighting!
A self-luminescent fungus flower. While not yet fully grown, you can plant it in a room and it will be a reliable source of light for many years ahead!
Stained glass, that is also stained with patches of mold! How ironic.

Want to know the temperature on Mount St. Cr?me? While the device used to be redundant for the mountain and its permanently freezing state, it ended up breaking just as it gained a purpose when the controller stopped working.
A ceiling-mounted lamp made out of ice cream. It\'s slowly melting, so better place it somewhere nice and refrigerated!
A wall decoration made out of ice. The rising temperatures have caused it to melt, so it definitely has seen better days. Still, let\'s put it to good use!
A self-luminescent fungus flower. Plant this on a wall in any room for some convenient lighting!
A wallpaper covered with mold. What a lucky find!
A floor mat consisting of soft blue mold. Who wouldn\'t want this in their room?!
First Cream Cookie of Mount St. Cr?me
This suspicious-looking Spore doesn\'t seem like the ideal friend...
This jumpy Spore doesn\'t seem like it\'d enjoy a quiet lunch with tea...
This fuzzy-looking spore doesn\'t seem like a cuddly friend...
A soft-hearted Cream Guard who always tries to look out for their friends.
A soft-hearted Cream Guard who always tries to make new friends.
A soft-hearted Cream Guard who always tries to keep their promises.
A resident of Mount St. Cr?me. They are always talking about the importance of strong bones.
A resident of Mount St. Cr?me. They are always talking about the importance of laughter.
A resident of Mount St. Cr?me. They are always talking about the importance of kindness.
Your typical, average Butterbar. They\'re always so serious for some reason.
Your ordinary, mediocre Butterbar. They\'re always concerned about work for some reason.
Your undistinguished, unexcited Butterbar. It looks like they\'d be able to sleep until sunrise at any given moment.
Happy and healthy Breadan, a long-time resident of Mount St. Cr?me.
Jovial and giggly Breadan, a friend who\'s always willing to listen to your stories.
Down-to-earth Breadan, an admirer of Mount St. Cr?me\'s scenery.
Happy and healthy Jammy, who needs some time to warm-up to new friends.
Sour and tarty Jammy, who always seems to have a sarcastic joke ready.
Hardy and mellow Jammy, who tends to listen rather than talk.

Cream Cake is very proud of their hairdo, which is actually a hearty scoop of the freshest cream in the neighborhood. They may spend a bit too much time on styling, but everyone loves to converse about hair products and fashion with this amazingly charming resident.

Cream Cake is very proud of their bold fashion sense, especially today\'s selection of red and pink hues. They may spend a bit too much time on selecting their outfit for the day, but everyone loves to converse about colors and fashion with this wonderfully chipper resident.

Cream Cake is very proud of their chic fashion sense, especially today\'s selection of casual chocolate. They may spend a bit too much time talking about breakout fashion trends, but everyone loves to converse about the latest news with this cheerful and kindhearted resident.
A bouncy Cream Bunny. It seems oddly familiar for some reason?
A cuddly Green Tea Bunny. It seems so cuddly!
A jiggly Rice Cake Bunny. It seems like the perfect friend to call on any occasion!
This species of bird only lives in the coldest and freshest of environments where the temperature hovers near-freezing. When they are in a good mood, they will chirp the happiest of tunes.

This species of bird only lives in the coldest and freshest of environments where the temperature hovers near-freezing. When they are in an excited mood, they will flap their wings as if applauding, causing a minty aroma to spread across the area.

This species of bird only lives in the coldest and freshest of environments where the temperature hovers near-freezing. When they feel unsafe or nervous, they will breathe in as much air as they can to look large and intimidating. Unfortunately, it just looks cuter!
Welcome to First Cream Cookie\'s radiant and elegant room!

Tales of old claim that the chilled winds of Mount St. Cr?me could restore freshness and stave off all signs of staleness. You can find the heart of this premise represented within First Cream Cookie\'s room.
A divine whisk, once used by the Witch who baked the First Batch. It radiates with the will to make all things sweet.
A thin, crisply baked ceremonial hat. Even as time passes, First Cream Cookie\'s memories of that dearly missed someone only grows clearer.
An elegant brooch, once a treasured keepsake of nobility. The golden light, still brilliant, seems to reminisce those glory days of yore.
Onyx Coins resembling the darkest of cocoa powder. These can only be obtained during the Onyx Cream Season!
Proof of completing the First Cream Season Collection. Thanks to your efforts, a fresh breeze now fills the hallways of the castle!
First Cream Cookie Bear Jelly Toy
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles First Cream Cookie. When stroking the cold, rich cream, even the surrounding air feels fresh.
Mount St. Cr?me has fallen from grace. There is nothing but lukewarm, humid air and an unwanted layer of built-up frost now.
Our friends have encountered an unknown, ferocious creature of some kind! WHAT IS THAT THING?!
Everyone who calls Mount St. Cr?me their home trust and follow her guidance.
When the gates opened, the residents were overjoyed to see First Cream Cookie.
The temperature controller for Mount St. Cr?me has been fixed! Let the cold and arid winds wash over the region once more!
Only the brightest and strongest of light could open such a cold and frozen gate.

When warm light envelops this sculpture of First Cream Cookie, it feels like you will remember something important, that you had previously forgotten... But what could it be, and what is this subtle feeling of desperation accompanying it?
It was thanks to First Cream Cookie that Mount St. Cr?me became a sacred and fresh sanctuary. Alas, it seems like it those days are gone.
A beautiful handrail decorated with fully bloomed Creambloom flowers. It does a good job separating two parts of a room.
A large urn filled with pretty creambloom flowers. This would make for a great addition to an elegant room!
A simple, yet elegant candlestick. It exudes a divine aura.
A puffy stool made out of fresh cream. You feel your energy recharge the moment you sit down in this!
A table as fresh as the items placed on top of it. Let\'s put this to good use!
An organ made with sweet whipped cream. When played, the tunes are just as smooth and fresh as you would expect from the instrument\'s appearance.
Stained glass with a blinding warm light shining through. Looking at it reminds you of an old story.
When you look at the soft light shining through, it kind of feels like someone you miss is talking to you...
Cream stairs decorated with a red velvet carpet. Walking on this will make you feel like the star of the show!
A golden ceiling-mounted fixture with a beautiful gemstone hanging at the bottom. What a find!
A bird cage housing a cute little Cream Roll Bird. Some would rather it gets to fly freely in the sky, but in here it will live a long, safe life.
A chandelier that fills First Cream Cookie\'s room with a soft, sacred light.
A fluffy rug made out of buttercream. Avoid spilling any liquid on it, as cleaning it is an arduous process.
A warm wallpaper that emits a pleasant fragrance.
This elegant floor is so soft that any walking style would turn into a form of sneaking when it\'s walked on.
Our friends have arrived to Mount St. Cr?me, but it\'s a much scarier and unpleasant place than they expected!
Somewhere in Mount St. Cr?me, Onyx Cream Cookie shares news of the lukewarm winds and the appearance of a \"small Cookie\" to First Cream Cookie.
The group has barely escaped from the unknown monstrosity. They need to find GingerDozer, but don\'t know where to go. If only they could use the compass once more...
GingerBrave and friends decide to ask for directions, but the residents seem ill. They decide to help the sickened residents before asking questions.
Our heroes managed to temporarily cure the ill residents from their mold with baking soda. They learn that there\'s some sort of settlement close by.
The Cookies are about to be swarmed by spores of some kind...! Onyx Cream Cookie appears and saves them. Our friends decide to help Onyx Cream Cookie\'s effort to fix the temperature controller.
The temperature controller has been repaired! Our heroes make way to the Cr?me Refuge to see if they can finally get some information on GingerDozer\'s whereabouts.

Many residents of Mount St. Cr?me suffer from mold. They approach the closed gates of the Cr?me Refuge... But a monster has appeared! In a blinding flash of light, First Cream Cookie has appeared to save everyone!

but it\'s the start to gathering up some courage!

Myeh? Everything you see here ARE my treasures!

I can stare at this thing all day long! It moves with such grace, such finesse, and with such enticing colors! Nothing compares to this fine masterpiece!

I wouldn\'t trade that table for the... the... the entire castle!

I still do not understand it fully, but...
I believe the time is nigh... for me to follow destiny.
Haha, apologies, my friend. I did not want to bring up my burdens to one who has been traveling so long.
Ah, but where are my manners? Please, make yourself comfortable and help yourself to these fresh Jellies.

Welp! I\'m definitely curious! After all, fire and heat are key. Ya might say that they\'re the keys to my smashing success, haha!

HAHAHA! Get ready for my favorite sounds in

NOPE! Just you wait, I\'ll find something! Something BIG! Bigger and biggest!
The bestest thing I\'ve ever made! Say hello to the Cherry Cupcake! It\'s got everything I\'ve ever made inside!
Oooh... Either I\'m seeing stars, or you\'ve really just sent us into space...!
An explosion of this magnitude will destroy, not only my forge, but probably my entire shop!
Lemme just make some room here and get a glass ready and-
Let\'s see... There was an order placed for a special batch of Green Juice, right?
Ah! I made it to the right place!
Oh? But it says right here that I\'m supposed to deliver this to Vampire Cookie.
It also says I need to make sure you drink some...
Look, I don\'t think... Erm, actually, let\'s start over.
Oh dear, where did he go?
He\'s not under the chair, not behind the curtains...
Oh well. I\'ll just pour out some of my fresh herbal juice into all of his empty glasses.
Then he\'ll have to drink some! Hehe, he\'s going to be so healthy!
NNNOOO! I don\'t want that green gunk anywhere NEAR my glasses!
Shall we try some healthy, green juice together then?
Oh cool! It\'s the famous Retro Game Berry!
I\'ve heard it\'s always online so you can play against anyone, anywhere, anytime!
And it\'s got a leaderboard system where only one champion can reign supreme!
It sounds like you know everything about this already, Strawberry Crepe Cookie...
Of course! I\'ve played it before, but I\'ve never been able to become the champion!
Oh wow... You were faster than any speedrunner just now...!

I just... I just thought this move would work.

DO IT AGAIN! Show me how you did that! I wanna learn!!!

Preparations are complete. It has taken me all winter, but my latest experimental elixir is finally ready for the real test.
Aaand... that\'s that! Research notes are completed and now, it\'s finally time!
If my calculations are correct, this elixir should provide me with enhanced intelligence!
What\'s this...? I feel so... heavy, drowsy. It\'s like my dough is melting onto the floor.
Something\'s wrong... The formula, the calculations were all precise! Or could it be... cross contamination?
Waaait... Why is there a half-empty glass of grape juice on my workstation?! Grrr... VAMPIRE COOKIE!!!
The antidote! I need to find the back-up antidote I made! Buuut... It\'s like the whole world is slowing down...
You\'re being weird. Usually, you\'d be sticking your nose in your research journal, or experimenting, but... you haven\'t moved a muscle all day.
You\'re just lying down and staring off into space. How many glasses of my grape juice did you have?
Is this is my life now...?
You\'re not so bad nowadays, ya know? The lazy talking, the blank staring.
Looks like you\'ve finally opened your eyes to the bliss of a slow, relaxing life. Not bad, isn\'t it?
Quit yapping away... I\'m too tired to talk right now.
That\'s the best thing I\'ve heard from you, ever! You\'re the greatest sister a Cookie could have, I tell ya.
I thought you were going to analyze the gems I found from my latest adventure!
Hmph, I knew it! I KNEW IT!
Everyone out there looks a bit... well, really angry!
Ugh! You stink of grape juice!
You know what? Let\'s just go... It looks like Alchemist Cookie has given up on her pursuit for knowledge.
... This is bad! All those years Alchemist Cookie spent getting smart and doing research will end up in crumbs if she doesn\'t snap out of... whatever this is!
I\'m the lazy one in the family, not her! She needs to better than me!
Nope. I told you last time, I\'m not using magic to conjure up some grape juice for you.
And also, another nope. I\'ve never tasted grape juice that the ancient wizards made.
Magic! Magic is the only way to bring Alchemist Cookie back!
Alchemist Cookie drank some experimental elixir and became weird! She\'s been drinking grape juice all day, not moving a muscle, and nothing else!
How much grape juice have YOU had today...?
Cast a spell that makes you go away...
So annoying... TO HAVE TO KEEP NAGGING YOU TO STAY OUT OF MY ROOM!
And I told you a million times to clean up after yourself!!! What\'s with all the grape juice stains around here?!
And why didn\'t you air this place out? It reeks of grape juice in here! What sort of slob have you become to live in an environment like this?!
My little sister...! Always so serious and angry! The one who\'d always make my juice taste like vinegar with her nagging... SHE\'S BACK!
I\'ll never say this out loud, but... You give my laziness meaning, little sis.
Welcome to my room, Cream Unicorn Cookie!
Thank you for inviting me. It\'s such a lovely place, filled with joy.
Besides, it\'s hard to meet Cookies who want to talk about all sorts of things!
Hehe, I like listening to all sorts of stories and memories.
Memories are like stars in the night sky, there are so many...! And I want to hear them all...!
Then you\'ve come to the right place! I\'ve got all sorts of stories to share!
Do you know how I met GingerBrave? I found him flat on the floor, in a dark room all by himself!
He woke up after I gave him some Life Potions. But he didn\'t know ANYTHING about the castle. And then we decided look for more potions together, teehee!
It sounds like a such a fun memory. What happened next-
Speaking of Life Potions, it reminds me of those stale and spoiled Cookies outside the Castle. They kinda look like Zombie Cookie, but they act a lot different.
But then it\'s only natural that everyone\'s different right? Like, look at Vampire Cookie and Alchemist Cookie. They\'re family, but they talk and act totally differently!
I\'ve never seen a Cookie who loves grape juice as much as Vampire Cookie! Speaking of juice, have you met Sparkling Cookie? He knows how to make all sorts of juice!
Have you been to the Sparkling Party? It\'s such a fun place! Oh, do you wanna hear some jokes? I met Avocado Cookie there, and she taught me some really funny ones!
What do you call a fish with no eye? Teehee, take a guess! I wonder if you can get the answer? It\'s very funny and it\'s a lot simpler than you think!
This feels like... riding a really, really fast merry-go-round.
There was this one time that Strawberry Cookie wanted to ride the swings, but it was a bit shaky and made a weird noise. She held onto the rope so tightly!
When it was time to get off, she still wouldn\'t let go! I kept telling her to get off, but we ended up staying there for hours! It was okay though, since we had so much fun there and-
Do you want to see the stars? Is that where you\'re going? That sounds like a perfect idea! You\'re amazing! Let\'s go outside!
Did you know that Wizard Cookie once taught me how to find constellations? It\'s really easy. You see those stars? They make a giant dipper and those make an hourglass!
It sounds like you have so many interesting memories, GingerBright... So, so many...
May sweet blessings be upon you, Rosemary Cookie...
May sweet blessings be upon us all.
I somehow feel... calmer and much more confident than before.
The journey here was worth it. Thank you, Angel Cookie.
I\'m happy for you, Rosemary Cookie...
Feel free to visit any time...!
You are too kind. Well then, I shall now take my leave.
I, well... No, it may not be a small favor after all. Never mind.
No, it\'s okay... You can ask...!
Well... I was wondering if you\'d be willing to bless the residents of the Syrup Garden as well.
They are my dearest friends and family. But their recent efforts to restore and protect the garden have taken a toll on them.
I know it\'s unreasonable for me to ask, but-
Of course! Everyone must be blessed...!
Will you be alright? You do not have to push yourself!
The Syrup Garden is home to many, many residents, after all...
It\'s okay...! It\'s only one garden...!
Bring as many as you wish, Rosemary Cookie... The more blessings to share, the better...!
Angel Cookie... You truly have a heart of gold...!
Calm down, everyone! Please form a line! Everyone will be blessed, so please remain in line!
She\'s right! There\'s no need for chaos! Everyone stand behind me and-
Me first! Me first! Me first!
Angel Cookie\'s passing blessings out! Everyone scream, cheer, and shout!
OW! Did you just push me?!
Rosemary Cookie...! Are these...? Are they all... residents of the Syrup Garden?
The ones gathered here are only about a third of the garden\'s population!
I knew there was someone secretly reading my research notes.
And to catch you... I set a trap!
Now... Let\'s see who you are, thief!!!
You... You\'ve finally abandoned magic and decided to steal my insights into alchemy, haven\'t you?
I dunno. Maybe you\'ve finally admitted to alchemy being superior to some wand-waving wizarding!
Huh...? My name is Wizard Cookie!
I\'m looking everywhere I can for it!
Hm. Doesn\'t sound like you\'re lying or anything.
... But can you prove you\'re not lying?
Just take a look by the stairs you use for storing reagents! It\'ll probably be around there somewhere!
Then who has been messing with my research logs?!
You may be annoying, but I still consider you a peer when it comes to the pursuit of knowledge! I wouldn\'t steal anything of yours!
Well, okay... I think so too, but...
Alriiight then...! Now... where are you...? There has to be some sort of alchemical formula for making grape...
I think we found your so-called thief.
I think I can see that too, obviously.
Oh? Is this a bad time?
So, essentially, you\'re going to host a party?
Yes, to commemorate the return of several of my family\'s treasures.
However, as it has been quite some time since I\'ve hosted such an event, I am unsure I\'ll be able to pull it off.
Hence, the reason for requesting your aid.
And an excellent reason! I\'ll make sure your party goes well!
I too shall do my best to create the finest blend of juices for your party.
First things first. Have you chosen a theme for your party?
A theme! You need to decorate for the party with a clear concept in mind!
Think about it. Every guest will each wield a sword.
Then, they will all engage in a spectacular display of swordsmanship.
I dare not risk damaging them.
I shall think about the theme later. For now, let us address the issue of invitations.
Have you any advice to provide?
Then the first invitation I write will be to a Cookie I wish to duel, in full armor.
The two of you realize this is a PARTY, right?
I shall now sit at my desk, the most significant treasure in my family\'s entire history. From there, I shall write my first invitations.
Oooh, you\'ve already thought of a Cookie you want to invite?
Do I know the Cookie you\'re giving this invitation to?
Do you want us to deliver it to someone?
No. These invitations are for you.
Is it not customary to first invite those who have aided in the party\'s preparations?
I\'m very touched, Marble Danish Cookie! I promise to help make this party one for the history books!
It did, erm, almost go off the rails...
But, nonetheless, I will do my best to help you prepare as well!
Thank you, both. Now then, shall we begin with the preparations?
A special package to provide a cozy break for the Cookies!
Top value decor package tailored to {0}\'s tastes!
Drop the swords to the bottom and attack!
Bring My Sister Back to Normal!
Can\'t Fully Enjoy Laziness Without Nagging
A new themed decor package is available!
Log in daily for a bunch of awesome gifts!
The Good, the Bad, the... Weird?
The House of Danish Holds a Party
Cream Unicorn Cookie is paying a visit to GingerBright\'s room. GingerBright is overjoyed to have a visitor!
An over-excited GingerBright is more than happy to share her tales and stories... A dizzying amount of stories...
Sensing that the conversation has somehow gone off the rails, Cream Unicorn Cookie tries to make an escape...
After receiving a blessing from Angel Cookie, Rosemary Cookie asks for a small favor...
Rosemary Cookie asks if Angel Cookie can share blessings with the residents of the Syrup Garden. Angel Cookie happily agrees!
The residents of the Syrup Garden have come to visit Angel Cookie for blessings! And there\'s a LOT of residents...! A LOT!!!
Someone has been tampering with Alchemist Cookie\'s research! She\'s set a trap for the culprit, who turns out to be... Wizard Cookie?
Wizard Cookie claims he\'s innocent! He tries to prove he\'s not the culprit.
Having been proven innocent, Alchemist Cookie and Wizard Cookie discover the identity of the true culprit...!
Marble Danish Cookie, after procuring several of his family\'s heirlooms and treasures, has decided to host a party. He\'s asked Cheesecake Cookie and Sparkling Cookie to provide some expert advice!
Marble Danish Cookie has an... interesting theme for the party, which Cheesecake Cookie finds fascinating. The only thing stopping them from this strange plan is Sparkling Cookie.
Having figured out the big picture for the party, Marble Danish Cookie writes the first pair of party invitations. Which two Cookies will he be inviting first?
Though a welcome phenomenon at first, Vampire Cookie misses his sister\'s usual self. Get back to normal, Alchemist Cookie!

There was once a lonely street with but a single candy cane tree. At some point, a passerby decided to hang a sturdy swing from the tree, and another passerby placed a beautiful cushion. Having become a cozy shelter for all, this place brings comfort and joy to every visitor.
Marble Danish Cookie Bear Jelly Toy
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Angel Cookie. The fuzzy hair is especially soft and makes the toy extra cuddle-worthy.
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Marble Danish Cookie. Made from a total of 128 layers of the finest cloth, this toy is the epitome of luxurious quality.

A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles GingerBright. The toy\'s face is beaming with the brightest and cheeriest of smiles. If you listen carefully, you can almost make out a faint but excited giggle.
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Strawberry Shortcake Cookie. Even a single glance at this toy seemingly tells you that it\'ll always stay by your side as a friend and companion.

FIFTEEN YEARS! That\'s no small feat! A sweet and tangy strawberry shortcake has been prepared to celebrate the fun-filled years of running! All the Cookies have been running with hearts burning with courage, thanks to you! And you! AND YOU!
The guards of the Cr?me Refuge endlessly debate the true definition of freshness and where to draw the line. Meanwhile, our friends help Onyx Cream Cookie with his mold infection.

Onyx Cream Cookie, having reassured the guards that the Temperature Controller has been repaired, requests entry into the refuge and vouches for our friends. But something about the refuge seems... off.
First Cream Cookie has returned to the Cr?me Refuge! The residents are ecstatic! They cheer and welcome her return...!
The Cr?me Refuge has been engulfed in disorder due to Fizzy Soda\'s antics! But just before our heroes could dish out some justice, a monster appears!

Onyx Cream Cookie easily defeats the moldy monstrosity. The inhabitants of the refuge peek out from their hiding spots, welcoming them. Our friends are eager to learn about the Cr?me Refuge\'s situation.
The climate of the refuge has been growing warmer and warmer, leaving the residents no choice but to rely on ice packs. But Fizzy has wrested control and monopolized the ice packs!
The group learns that a cabal of sodas has been overseeing the icy prison and growing in strength! Onyx Cream Cookie cannot stand by and tolerate such injustice.
GingerBrave and friends have brought much needed ice packs to the refuge! They then head off into the frozen lands to rescue GingerDozer!
Stop right there! You\'re not going anywhere until you\'ve undergone the expiration inspection!
No, wait! Hear me out! I\'m only a single day past expiration...!
And I\'m entirely brined. Expiration doesn\'t really, usually apply to me...?
Everyone must adhere to the inspection!
All travelers past expiration will not be allowed entry! No exceptions, no exemptions, and no excuses!
Hold on a moment. They seem fresh enough...!
It can\'t hurt to let them inside, can it?
This is no time for leniency! The refuge doesn\'t have enough ice packs to go around.
Is the temperature getting to your head?! We\'re already in enough of a pickle because of Fizzy\'s antics...!
Letting these folks in would only make things worse!
I\'m still fresh! I swear I am! Believe me!
You won\'t be in a bigger pickle cuz of me, I promise. My expiration date is just a suggestion after all!
What\'re they talking about? What\'s expiration mean...?
Ahem. The concept of an expiration date is often used for determining the maximum duration of freshness.
Do Cookies have an expiration date too?
Hm! I\'ve never heard of this expiration thing before!
Hm, now that I think about it...
I\'ve not come across any notion of Cookies such as ourselves being tied to the very concept.
What if we\'re not allowed in \"just because\"?
There was a time when such a concept held no meaning in Mount St. Cr?me...
If I may? I\'m confident that you will be granted entry.
Please, send my regards to those in the refuge.
Why don\'t you tag along with us then?
Yeah, after all, it\'s always nice to say hello!
My exposure to warmer temperatures has... adversely affected my dough.
If you\'re infected, are you in pain right now?! Just like the Moldizens from before?
Hold on a moment! We helped the Moldizens from before with baking soda and it\'s proved effective!
Let\'s use the rest of it, quickly!
Stop! Please hold for an expiration inspection!
Huh...? Hey, these folks are Cookies.
Of course! We\'re quite fresh, crunchy, and very much lively, thank you very much.
Wow, looks like Onyx Cream Cookie is famous around here too!
Greetings, old friends. It is good to see you again.
It seems that, with the passing of time, much has changed here.
We thought we\'d never see you again! Everyone has missed you so, so much, Sir Onyx Cream Cookie!
Though it has taken much time, the temperature controller is back in working order.
So I implore you to grant all of us entry. I will vouch for everyone.
After all, they seem quite fresh and worthy of entry.
Yes, yes! We\'re still fresh! We promise!
The temperature controller... Is it really fixed?
Indeed! We personally had a stake in its repair.
It\'s a miracle...! It\'s just what we\'ve been waiting for!
They look so happy at the news!
Everyone will be overjoyed at your return, Sir Onyx Cream Cookie!
It\'s been so... Well, the refuge... something happened.
Sounds like some sort of commotion!
It definitely sounds like this Cr?me Refuge is quite populated!
C\'mon! Let\'s take a look for ourselves!
Apologies, but we must depart with haste!
This place is a bit, well...
The Cr?me Refuge has become as lawless as-
And that\'s the thanks I get?!
And you two piles of scraps!
I will not allow such injustice.
HAHA! Looks like you\'ve got bigger fish to fry!
I\'ll get rid of that holier-than-thou stench of yours!
That was awesome, Onyx Cream Cookie!
You really showed that monster who\'s boss!
Such prowess in combat deserves high praise!
The only thing WE seem to be doing when facing such a monstrosity is, well...
Thanks, Onyx Cream Cookie... You saved us again!
No need for such flattery. I am only doing what is required.
So this is the Cr?me Refuge, huh?
Is it just me or is it a bit too quiet...?
All that noise we heard before... It\'s like it never happened.
You DID...! You defeated the monster...?!
Onyx Cream Cookie took care of everything!
ONYX CREAM COOKIE! It really is you!!!
Everyone we\'ve met so far is super happy to see Onyx Cream Cookie.
I\'m glad we were able to come this far, together.
Hehe! You can say that again, GingerBrave!
So much has happened while you were away, sir...!
The greedy have wrestled control of the refuge and we-
He ran off when the monster showed up.
Just how much chaos has been wrought upon the refuge...?
Oh no... Everyone looks really tired and sick...
everyone in the refuge managed to stay fresh with ice packs.
So ice packs can keep everyone fresh?
But... why does everyone look so tired...?
Well, we used to harvest ice packs found in the chilled alcove.
The cold, dry winds there were perfect for keeping them nice and frosty...
We used to bring back as many as we could to the refuge.
And once an ice pack became too warm, it could be refrozen in the alcove, good as new.
But Fizzy... he started to... He just decided...
Without those ice packs, most of us are just days away from expiring...
So that\'s why the refuge seems so gloomy...
It\'s obvious that Fizzy Soda\'s greed has wrought much havoc...
This dire crisis must be resolved.
it will take precious time for temperatures to return to normal.
I must make haste and bring an end to Fizzy\'s tyranny, ensuring that ice packs are available for all!
We won\'t let you go alone, Onyx Cream Cookie!
Hehe. Right on cue, as always, GingerBrave.
He\'s right! We\'re going with you!
How is it that you\'ve changed so drastically?
It\'s as if you weren\'t affected by mold, but by something far worse!
YEAH! And it\'s not nice being a big, mean, selfish bully!
Hey, come on now! No need for such hurtful words!
The old me is gone, and good riddance, I say!
I used to be a weak worrywart, always concerned about losing the last of my bubbles.
But once the frost started to build up, so did my strength!
It happened to all of us sodas! We\'re taller! We\'re stronger! WE\'RE BULKED UP!
Bulked up? I guess that\'s... one way to put it. But, something\'s awfully... lumpy about him.
I knew something was off! Yeah, he definitely looks a bit weird!
It seems the carbonation within him has burst out rather than bulked up...
Bubbles, shmubbles! Gains are gains, ya hear?! I\'m still stronger than I\'ve ever been!
Us sodas are never gonna let the old days come back!
Resist all you want! You\'re gonna end up like everyone else here!
As permanent residents of Mount St. Cr?me and its Icy Prison, with us as your wardens! PAHAHAHA!
I cannot permit this madness to continue.
Your reign of terror ends now!
His hardened ice must be shaved away to reveal his weakness!
At any given chance, we must not hesitate to strike!
Let us lower our stance and bring the swords to the bottom, striking from below!
Let us bring an end to his tyranny!
That was amazing, Onyx Cream Cookie!
So he DOES have a weak spot!
It\'s now or never, Onyx Cream Cookie!
You did it, Onyx Cream Cookie!
Looks like he\'s definitely down for the count!
And now we can deliver fresh ice packs to the Cr?me Refuge!
Ah! And we may also find a way
Alchemist Cookie decided to test her newest elixir... by drinking it herself! But it was contaminated with a drop of grape juice?! The results... have turned the world upside down.
Vampire Cookie loves the way Alchemist Cookie has changed. It\'s awesome having such a laid-back younger sister!

It seems that Alchemist Cookie\'s newfound laziness is causing a stir... Other Cookies are eager for Alchemist Cookie to continue her research, but she\'s not moving a muscle. Vampire Cookie realizes that she can\'t stay this way any longer.
Vampire Cookie hurriedly asks Wizard Cookie for a favor: a magic spell to return Alchemist Cookie to her normal self. What\'ll happen next?!

It worked! Vampire Cookie welcomes the annoying nagging from his sister to its fullest. With everything back to normal, he decides to enjoy a glass of grape juice with Alchemist Cookie\'s rant continuing in the background.

\"Leave everything about running the Star Coal Express to me!\"  Twisted Donut Cookie and his trusty Coco Drop helpers comb every inch of the train to make sure it\'s in proper shape for a safe trip to the next destination. With this dynamic team at work, no dough marks nor spots can be found when it\'s time for new passengers to board, and the train keeps its almost glittering shine at all times!
\"Leave everything about running the Star Coal Express to me!\" The train is a precious gift from his grandfather.
I wonder where we\'ll end up

Lumps of Star Coal. It seems they\'re from some otherworldly place that\'s just as sweet and filled with adventures. Don\'t be fooled by their colorful and shiny exterior; as the name suggests, they are NOT safe for consumption! Instead, save these and exchange them for special rewards!
Bring an end to the ice pack monopoly
Get a perfect start to the season together

Whoever stacked these pancakes in such a precarious way was surely an adventurous sort! This delicious stack of flapjacks can only be found in the Star Coal Express\' very own dining carriage. You\'re going to need a stomach that\'s ready for adventuring to wolf down this dish!

Sturdy bags to keep your things safe on all of your adventures! It\'s always a good idea to prepare for the unknown, but don\'t forget to leave some extra space for all the stuff you might find during the journey!
Down! Down, boy, down! You greedy little, adorable thing, you! This chest is always hungry for all sorts of items, but it loves to scarf down all sorts of adventuring gear and necessities!
A pristine, well-maintained train seat. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
Ssshhh, do not disturb! Loafykins is sleeping!
There\'s no doubt whose luggage this is! Let\'s keep it in a nice and safe place.
A simple potted plant. What a lucky find!
Super useful and colorful Star Coal! Who wouldn\'t like to have this?!

A single glance out this window fills your mind with curiosity and wonder. Your heart begins to pound with excitement and, before you know it, you\'re ready for an epic adventure and you won\'t give up until you\'ve completed it!
Stickers used to decorate the passenger carriages. Let\'s put these to good use.
Does this really gauge steam? Maybe it measures excitement? Or maybe it\'s for something else?!
A simple yet sturdy lamp. Let\'s put it here and there.
Seems like this hammock is already in use. Let\'s place it somewhere carefully so the occupant doesn\'t wake up!
Wallpaper used to decorate the interior of a certain train\'s passenger carriages. They look and smell amazing!
Wooden flooring used to decorate the interior of a certain train\'s passenger carriages. They seem to creak and sing as the train chugs along.
A rapier that is sharp enough to slice through solid ice with a single swing. The worn handle is evidence of a rigorous training regimen.

Deep within Mount St. Cr?me, water droplets from icy stalactites dripped down to create gleaming crystals of ice. Onyx Cream Cookie decided to create this clasp as a reminder of Mount St. Cr?me\'s once pristine beauty and chilled climate.

After discovering that he too was infected with mold, Onyx Cream Cookie wore an eyepatch to conceal his ailment for a brief period of time. It was not shame that made him wear it, but a strong desire to prevent unnecessary worries and concerns.
Onyx Coins resembling the darkest of cocoa powder. These can only be obtained during the Onyx Cream Season!
Onyx Cream Cookie Bear Jelly Toy
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Onyx Cream Cookie. The toy seems to radiate an aura of loyalty and commitment.
Proof of completing the Onyx Cream Season Collection. Always remember to never give up in the face of adversity!
Profile obtained by completing the \"Cr?me Refuge\" Chapter

This stalwart defender\'s dough was created by blending diligently churned cream with substantial portions of cocoa powder resembling onyxes as dark as the night sky. Onyx Cream Cookie perseveres to uphold his skill with a sword and protect the residents of Mount St. Cr?me, fueled by a profound loyalty to a certain radiant and noble Cookie. Many recognize his unwavering love for Mount St. Cr?me, as can be seen through their trust and confidence in his name alone. Will his efforts to restore Mount St. Cr?me to its former glory succeed? And, if successful, will he be able to reunite with the Cookie to whom he has pledged an oath of loyalty?
I shall protect these sacred lands.
Welcome to Snow Stormed Night Onyx Cream Cookie\'s Room!
Snow Stormed Night Onyx Cream Cookie\'s Room

The lands of Mount St. Cr?me would be engulfed by howling gales and fierce blizzards every time the refrigerator was opened. Despite the icy winds peltering the window, Onyx Cream Cookie\'s room always gives off a sense of calm, just like the Cookie himself.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Onyx Cream Cookie\'s soul. It looks like it can withstand anything.

Onyx Cr?me Wolf are fiercely territorial and will pursue anyone who dares to trespass on their grounds. Their usual method of hunting is to hide and meld into the shadows, lurking silently until the opportune moment to strike arrives. However, they are also extremely loyal to those they consider family.

The lush, glistening coats of Butter Cr?me Wolves can be spotted from long distances away. They are very particular about keeping their fur pristine and well-kept. Perhaps this is why they are rather relaxed and less aggressive than most wolves.

Berry Cr?me Wolves naturally carry a distinct scent of berries and cream. This odor attracts nearby rabbits, who flee after finding a pack of wolves instead a patch of berries. But in reality, the wolves use this natural scent of theirs in hopes of meeting new friends... not for hunting.
A wild Cr?me Pretzel Reindeer. It seems friendly and calm.
A wild Matcha Pretzel Reindeer. It seems to have called this place home for a very long time.
A wild Mint Pretzel Reindeer. No one knows where they came from...

No one is allowed past this gate without permission. If an intruder attempts to breach the gate, the fork attached above is triggered to drop. Scary! Actually, not really... According to one of the guards, the fork is just there for decoration purposes only.
A wall from where one can keep watch. It\'s very secure too.
An impenetrable wall used to secure an area. Have we mentioned it\'s very sturdy?
A frozen spire with a window. Let\'s put it to good use!
A small mushroom growing atop a patch of moss. What a lucky find!
A mushroom growing atop a patch of moss! What an interesting find!
A skull covered in jam. Creepy...!
A lone watchtower where one can keep watch. It\'s really sturdy.
A lookout post covered in snow. Watch your step!
A stony mountain with a sharp peak. Looks intimidating!
A stony mountain with a snow-capped peak. Looks amazing!
A very tall, stony mountain with a steep peak. Nature is awesome!
A giant icicle, cold to the touch. Be careful when walking below this thing!
A small icicle, cold to the touch. Be careful when walking below this thing!
A frozen wall. Let\'s place it here and there.
A patch of ground covered in mold and fungus. Let\'s place it here and there, with caution.

A specialized bed used to stave off expiration. It\'s used for emergency situations, especially for those on the brink of their expiration date. You need to use the sleeping bag instead of coming into direct contact with the ice, otherwise you might get frostbite!
An industrial-grade fan used to cool an area. It serves its purpose.
An emergency radio that only broadcasts news and public announcements. What a lucky find!
A collection of frozen rocks. These will look great wherever you decide to put them.
An emergency ice kit used to stave off spoilage. A must-have!
A cot used in emergency shelters to administer first aid. It\'s comfier than you think!
A makeshift stool made from a mayonnaise bottle\'s cap. It serves its purpose.
This rapid-freeze, industrial-grade freezer is used to store ice packs and ice cubes. Both Cookies and residents step into this unit whenever they need to cool down.
Milk bottles that guarantee long-lasting freshness. Who wouldn\'t like to have these?!
The freshest eggs ever. Everyone loves these!
An ice-pack fastened onto the ceiling. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
A stalactite with water dripping downwards. Let\'s place it here and there.
A specialized thermometer used to specifically measure cold temperatures only. What a lucky find!
A puddle. And it\'s wet. Caution: slippery floor.
An insulated wall that keeps things cold. Try decorating the wall with this to keep things cool.
An insulated floor that keep things cold. Try decorating the floor with this to keep things cool.

A two-tiered plate carrying all sorts of frozen goods and ice packs. Everything within is protected by a glass cloche. You might want to partner-up with a friend before opening this thing or you might get trapped inside!
A workbench used to harvest and pack ice. It works very well!
A frozen water bottle. Let\'s place it here and there.
A bundle of ice and small ice packs. What a lucky find!
A pile of stale ice from some old sorbet. Still looks scrumptious! Sort of...
Harvesting in progress! The ice hasn\'t been put into a pack yet.
A small area to rest after harvesting ice. Let\'s put it to good use!
An ice cube tray that contains colorful, frozen juice. Who wouldn\'t like to have this?!
A stalactite of ice cream. It goes well wherever you place it!
Two stalactites of ice cream. Let\'s place it here and there.
A solid sheet of ice. Try decorating the walls with these.
A solid sheet of ice. Try decorating the floor with these.

As the winds of Mount St. Cr?me have become saturated with humidity, mold and decay has spread at a frightening pace. The refuge was built in order to prolong freshness in these warm times, with ice packs being distributed to those on the brink of expiration.

This alcove is filled with leftover jelly beans, half-empty bottles of water, and stale ice cream. But mostly everything is either unusable or moldy... except for the ice packs! These precious ice packs can only be found here! Hopefully, there aren\'t any frozen jelly beans inside them...

A checkpoint to ensure the refuge does not fall victim to mold or decay. Therefore, only residents who haven\'t reached past their expiration date are allowed entry. None have managed to sneak past this tightly secured point of entry.
This radiant fireplace burns bright and hot no matter how cold it is outside. Sitting in front of it brings a sensation of warmth and comfort that no other fireplaces can give.
A tiny velvet stool, in navy blue. It serves its purpose.
A heavy torch made from iron. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
The crest of the Onyx Cream family. What a lucky find!
This arch is steeped in history. Just looking at it makes you feel like you are home.
A simple and pragmatic chair. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
An elegant but cozy rug. What a lucky find!
A table used for games and recreation. Who wouldn\'t like to have this?!
A lamp that gives off a soft, warm glow. Let\'s place it somewhere!
A solid pillar. Let\'s put it here and there.
A silvery fireplace with a crackling, pale fire. It looks cold and eerie, but the closer you get, the more you feel at home.
An ottoman that is soft, comfy, and elegantly decorated. You could sit on this for hours without feeling the need to get up!

From this window, you can view the snow from the warmth of your room. As the winds pick up, you can hear the snow peltering the window. Sitting by this window and watching the snowstorm somehow calms your mind.
An impressively decorated pillar featuring the Onyx Cream family crest. It\'s fancy, but not flashy. It\'s sturdy, but not bulky. And it goes well with anything in any room.

A chandelier of candles embraces the room with a warm glow. Be careful not to neglect it though as the candles may be extinguished on a windy day. Though it can be a chore, Onyx Cream Cookie adores this chandelier and the warmth it radiates.

Through ice and snow, wind and storm, these walls are built to withstand anything. This solid brick wall is capable of insulating heat in the harshest of cold snaps as well. Rest assured, you\'ll always be shielded from the cold at night as you fall asleep.
A decorative floor chosen by Onyx Cream Cookie himself. It\'s an elegant yet uncomplicated pattern, much like the Cookie himself.
Our friends have officially teamed up with Onyx Cream Cookie, who is eager to restore Mount St. Cr?me to its former glory. What fuels his courage and loyalty?
Fizzy Soda was always concerned that he\'d lose his carbonation. But no more! The change of climate has tremendously transformed the region and himself!
Devil Cookie happens to hear a bit of Mint Choco Cookie\'s solo violin piece and claims it\'s BORING! But, uh-oh, the composer of the piece is none other than Mint Choco Cookie himself!
Devil Cookie tries to make amends, but Mint Choco Cookie enters into a deep monologue on the history of his composed piece.
In the end, Mint Choco Cookie performs a concert in Devil Cookie\'s room... What an interesting but heartwarming apology, Devil Cookie!
A Cookie who Loves Cold and Snow
Onyx Cream Cookie has provided his room to shelter a few Moldizens. However, the summer heat has made his usually comfortable room rather warm. Is there a way to provide a chillier environment?
Onyx Cream Cookie has requested the aid of Snow Sugar Cookie. As Snow Sugar Cookie waves their magic wand, it suddenly begins to snow!
As he gazes upon the falling snow, Onyx Cream Cookie is reminded of a certain Cookie, one who resembles the pure white snow.
Avocado Cookie has decided that today will be the day she will make Blackberry Cookie laugh!
Blackberry Cookie remains unphased, especially because she\'s already heard the jokes that were prepared. Avocado Cookie only has one more joke up her sleeve... Will it work?!
Alas, Blackberry Cookie does not laugh. How many jokes will it take to finally get a reaction from her?
Adventurer Cookie is never home, and Blackberry Cookie is seeking a way to find him. Wizard Cookie attempts to use a summoning spell to find the wandering explorer!
The summoning spell worked! Sort of... Instead of Adventurer Cookie, the spell has summoned Alchemist Cookie, who also has an idea to solve the problem of Adventurer Cookie\'s constant running away.

Alchemist Cookie wants to create a potion to keep Adventurer Cookie at home, but Wizard Cookie is adamant that he can make the spell work. As usual, the two enter into a heated argument of magic vs. alchemy.
Aw, I\'m glad to have helped!
I will have to look for
What is that noise? Who\'s making that racket?
I guess you did not enjoy the solo piece I was playing.
HEHEHE! You know I was joking, right...?
The title of this piece is \"The Lonely Musician.\" It\'s a solo violin piece that was composed during a prolonged period of difficulty.
There was an unusually violent storm that night... I still remember the cold raindrops mercilessly pounding against the castle\'s walls.
Everyone took refuge to warm and cozy spots throughout the castle. But I continued to perform outside, risking sogginess.
Would you like to know why I continued to perform that night, Devil Cookie?
I wanted to reach someone, anyone with my music. To have them hear my violin, hear my soul. As a musician without a stage, I had no choice but to continue performing in the rain.
So I endured that ferocious storm. The rain had drenched my violin, muffling its usual effervescent strings. And yet, I kept hoping that someone would listen.
Hey, can we like, stop this conversation and-
This solo was composed as a reminder of my struggle. Perhaps it resonated with you on a certain level, my friend.
Ladies and gentlemen, I would like to welcome everyone to this small concert of mine.
Before I begin, I\'d like to introduce and thank our wondrous host, who has allowed us to use this amazing space for my performance.
A warm round of applause for our host, Devil Cookie.
Stop clapping! No compliments! Don\'t cheer! QUIET!
The first piece is a solo violin sonata I composed myself. It is titled, \"A Lonely Musician.\
START CLAPPING EVERYONE! Clap your hands! Applaud! You\'re about to witness the greatest violin solo ever!
Hurry, come inside! It\'s much cooler in here.
It\'s... not so different from the temperature outside...
I thought it would be an acceptable temperature, but it seems that there is no beating the summer heat...
It\'ll only spread more if we don\'t find a place to cool down...
It seems I must find another answer to this predicament.
Please wait here. Keep movement to a minimum, otherwise you will just be warming yourselves up.
Over here! There are residents who need aid, immediately!
Sir Onyx Cream Cookie...? Who\'re you talking to...?
Everyone, say hello to Snow Sugar Cookie. I\'ve asked for their help.
A Cookie? How can a Cookie help us...?
I don\'t know if I\'ll be of much help... But I\'ll try my best...!
I heard that you like winter and snow, just like me!
Huh? What\'s happening? Why is that thing you\'re holding glowing blue?
Do you feel that?! There\'s a cold breeze coming from over there!
I... I don\'t believe it! It\'s snowing?!
Hugging the great Snow King is like... the best feeling ever. I don\'t feel as itchy as before!
Calm down, everyone! The Snow King may not like being crowded!
It\'s okay! I think the Snow King is happy to meet new friends.
Hehe! Then does that mean I can scooch in closer?
Thank you, Snow Sugar Cookie. I believe it isn\'t an exaggeration to say that you\'ve saved the day.
Aw, I\'m glad to have helped! And besides, I got to meet some new friends!
But erm... It looks like something was bothering you earlier, Onyx Cream Cookie. Is something wrong?
It\'s nothing. The cold breeze and snow just... made me think of...
I thought you called me to help organize your forge.
And yet, it seems that was not the case.
Is that so? Then please, make it quick, for I\'ve more urgent matters at the mansion.
Alrighty! But where\'re my manners?! Take a seat and make yourself at home!
Ah? Not on the anvil... it\'s not the most comfortable of places to sit, haha!
Now, get ready to laugh so hard, you\'ll end up crying!
What does a sick apple tell the doctor?
That too has already been repeated on many occasions.
Hmmm... Those two didn\'t cut it, eh...?
Now, if I may, I must return to the mansion.
Wait! Not so fast! I\'ve still got one more for ya!
How would you, Blackberry Cookie, say hello to a fish underwater?
But excessive exposure to water would lead to sogginess.
Blub, blub, blub, I\'m Blubberry Cookie!
Huh... I thought that one would definitely do the trick.
I really must return to the mansion now.
Oh well! I\'ll get her to laugh next time, I know it!
One day, I will definitely make her laugh!
You came here to ask if I could figure out where Adventurer Cookie is right now?
It sounds like you need a detective, not a wizard...
As I was organizing some old documents and books...
I found a book on something called \"summoning magic.\
I assumed that, as a wizard, you would be familiar with it.
Oh?! Summoning magic? Is that what I think it-
No, no, wait! Let me look it up myself first!
Ah! Here we are! The \"Summoning Spell to Summon Anything!\
... A rather odd and suspicious name.
Now, let me see here... First, I need to picture a specific characteristic of Adventurer Cookie in my head. His hat, maybe? And then, I open this up and...
Okay! And now... the incantation... I SUMMON THEE!
But this is not the Cookie we seek.
I... may have confused who wears what sort of hat...
Uh, HELLO!? Will someone tell me what\'s going on here?
I have requested Wizard Cookie to locate Adventurer Cookie through the means of magic.
I tried to cast a spell while picturing Adventurer Cookie in my head...
And let me guess, it was me who was summoned, not him?
I think I know a surefire method of finding Adventurer Cookie and keeping him at home!
We can use alchemy to transmute Adventurer Cookie!
Just imagine! He actually stays at home like a responsible Cookie!
There\'d be no need to worry about him gallivanting outside the mansion anymore!
But that\'s not Adventurer Cookie! That sounds like a sham!
Besides, I already know what went wrong with the incantation. It\'ll work this time, I know it!
An alchemical transmutation of a Cookie...! It\'s genius!
It seems they are both living in their own worlds...
Oh? Wizard Cookie\'s spellbook has fallen onto the floor.
The accuracy of this spell has been calculated to be... 0.00001%.
Use for entertainment and recreation only.
Hey, can I write down my formula here?
No! You are NOT ALLOWED to write anything about alchemy in my spellbook!
They truly are living in their own worlds...
I will have to look for Adventurer Cookie myself.
The Cookies have been eagerly waiting to solve puzzles with you! Are you ready to lead them on an adventure?

Meet First and Epic Cookies with
Cream-colored coins that give off a fresh fragrance. These can only be obtained during the First Cream Season!
What if Onyx Cream Cookie shows up? He might get angry and scold us and...

Hehe, I can see it now. He\'d probably say something like...

This isn\'t the time to laugh!
Let\'s make a run for it, quickly!
If anything were to go wrong...

Legend has it that you descended from the clouds, shining with radiance... all that time ago.
No signs of suspicious activity or trespassers.
Strange... How long will she remain asleep?
We believe that you are the one who has blessed Mount St. Cr?me with eternal freshness.
And yet, I want to know.
What mystical energy and strength flows in your dough?
And why do you slumber in these chilled lands?
This is... You\'re in Mount St Cr?me.
A sacred land regarded as a safe and fresh haven for all.
It has been considered so ever since your arrival,
as Mount St. Cr?me has remained in a perpetual state of chilled freshness.

Do not fear. Rest assured, you are quite safe here.

Everyone is eager to meet you, if you are willing?
There are many who wish to show their appreciation, First Cream Cookie.
They have been waiting patiently for quite a long time.
Ah! Pardon me for springing such a request without warning...! If you do not wish to-
I do not know your name. What should I call you?
Where are my manners! My name is Onyx Cream Cookie.
I assume that I have been asleep for a long time... and you and the residents of this place have kept me safe during my slumber.
I\'ve heard that this is where you train.
Your swordsmanship skills are already well-honed, and yet you continue to train. Why?
Though Mount St. Cr?me is peaceful and remains fresh,
One can never be too prepared for a crisis.
Hehe, that\'s Onyx Cream Cookie for ya!

I am also training in the hopes to aid you, Madam First Cream Cookie.
To help you regain your memories...
If I am to help you, then I must be diligent in my training.
Woohoo! You\'re the best, First Cream Cookie!
Permit me to go with you! I am certain that I can aid you in your quest!
Or would I... just be getting your way?
I am weak, and no matter how much I try, I will never measure up to your strength.
No, my friend. That is not the case.
You have kept watch over Mount St. Cr?me for many winters.
If you were to leave Mount St. Cr?me with me,
the residents who look up to you would fall into despair and lose hope.
So I must ask of you... Will you and the residents of Mount St. Cr?me wait patiently for my return?
We shall await your safe return, Madam First Cream Cookie.
... May your every step shine brightly.
And just like that... You departed from these lands, as if you would return soon.
Nevertheless... I will continue to protect our home,
for I firmly believe in your promise to return.

Maybe I should plant some seeds around it, to give it some friends?
Yes! Let\'s make the world green!
I hope everyone grows big and strong!
Oh, hello little sprouts! You\'re already growing, I see!
Oh! Hello, Zombie Cookie! It\'s been-

Wait, is Zombie Cookie afraid of plants...?
Grah... No more plants near... Good...
I have a gift for you! Here!
It looks like moss and algae, but it\'s just a regular carpet! It\'s not a real plant, see?
I didn\'t know that I was planting seeds in your room. I\'m really, really sorry.
Would you like to take a closer look at it? It\'s a rather splendid shade of-

What sort of flavors would you prefer? Is there anything that comes to mind?
Hm, I think... I\'m looking for something that tastes like cocoa!
... You\'ve mentioned that just now. What I meant is, anything other than that?

Three plentiful portions of cocoa with a mere half-drop of sparkling juice.

This is wonderful, Sparkling Cookie!!! I couldn\'t have discovered this amazing glass of cocoa without your help! You really are the best bartender ever!

I\'m glad she\'s pleased with the results, which makes my job ever more satisfying!
Do not mention it. After all, it seemed that you needed a place to rest.

Now, to pick up where we left off.

Pardon me, but I must step outside for a brief moment.
Wait here and make yourself comfortable.

I\'ve returned with someone who is
You absolutely should stay for just a

Yes, but not anymore. Long ago, I used to keep a watchful eye over a certain young and adorable Cookie.

I am DEFINITELY not interested in the Snow Sugar Wand anymore! I\'m leaving!

And now we\'ve come full circle to experience a misunderstanding about a misunderstanding!!!
Herb Cookie, lost and alone, has stumbled upon an empty field. He decides to spruce up the place by sowing some seeds, but it turns out this is Zombie Cookie\'s room!
The seeds that were planted have sprouted! Zombie Cookie becomes distraught and flees the area...
Herb Cookie learns that Zombie Cookie is deathly afraid of plants. He tries to apologize with a small gift... but Zombie Cookie\'s reaction is not what Herb Cookie expected!
A New Item on the Menu
Sparkling Cookie attempts to make a drink for Cocoa Cookie, but it turns out the only drink she wants is hot cocoa!
Sparkling Cookie wants to introduce Cocoa Cookie to new flavors and varieties of juice. But, once again, Cocoa Cookie only wants a cup of hot cocoa!

In the end, Sparkling Cookie prepares a mug of rich cocoa for his visitor. He may have failed in convincing her to try something new, but her beaming, warm smile is enough to stave off the bitter taste of failure.

Adventurer Cookie has been invited to visit Sachertorte Cookie\'s lavishly furnished room. Just as a nefarious plot begins to form, her attitude suddenly changes once she learns that he has run away from home!
Adventurer Cookie claims that he\'s being chased. But by whom? Sachertorte Cookie asks the name of his so-called pursuer. Just what is she planning?

Wizard Cookie, flabbergasted at the idea that he wants to steal the Snow Sugar Wand, fails to convince his host that he\'s not trying to pilfer it, but things go awry once more!
May Every Step be Blessed by Light

All the residents of Mount St. Cr?me believe that the region\'s chilled, dry environment, where everyone remains eternally fresh, is thanks to the presence of this mysterious, slumbering Cookie. A few youngsters have snuck into the chamber to get a glimpse of this radiant Cookie, only to run into a stern-faced Onyx Cream Cookie!
Where did she come from? Who is she? What is her name? Onyx Cream Cookie ponders these thoughts to himself... only to see that she has woken up...!
First Cream Cookie has awakened, but with no memories. Nevertheless, her presence alone is enough to win the hearts of all the residents of Mount St. Cr?me.
Onyx Cream Cookie trains diligently, day and night, in order to be of aid to First Cream Cookie. Though all is peaceful, he continues to train in preparation for the worst.

An exquisite set of arrows crafted from the purest and clearest ice. Though fragile, Snow Crystal Cookie prefers these arrows due to their inconspicuous appearance. According to her, they are perfectly suitable for delivering a stern warning without firing a shot.

A brooch gifted by a certain Cookie who urged Snow Crystal Cookie to fasten her coat and keep warm. The cold never bothered her in the first place, but she seems to wear it at all times for sentimental reasons.
A hairpin that resembles a broken frost arrow. It holds Snow Crystal Cookie\'s hair firmly in place, making it an essential accessory for an archer such as herself!

This Cookie was baked with a single snowflake perched atop a leaf from the witch\'s garden. Snow Crystal Cookie\'s eyes are as clear and serene as the dawn air, which help her keep watch for intruders and never miss her target. The residents of Mount St. Cr?me admire her, but they often shrink back from her chilly demeanor. However, one Cookie, as bright and lively as a rainbow, is unfazed by Snow Crystal Cookie\'s frigid personality.
Snow Crystal Cookie Bear Jelly Toy
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Snow Crystal Cookie, especially her cold gaze and icy demeanor.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Snow Crystal Cookie\'s soul. Holding it in your hands, you\'re reminded of snow gently falling on a dark, silent night.
The leftovers of a drink made with fresh fruit, sweeteners, and carbonated water. It looks like someone has quenched a rather strong thirst and left the fruit untouched...
A storage shelf made from recycled aluminum cans. Something\'s oddly familiar about the items being stored within...
An ice pack that has been confiscated from those who need it. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
A simple, yet very large, straw. It serves its purpose.
A pile of old bottle caps, haphazardly stacked together. Anyone would love to have some of these!
A rather odd attempt to make a chair with broken glass and a bottle cap. Let\'s put it to good use!
A sofa made from broken glass. At least the cushion seems soft... and safe. What an interesting find!
A shard of broken glass. Try decorating the room with it, carefully.
One of the largest bottle caps ever seen! Anyone would love to have one of these.
Recycled bottle caps tied together to make a set of lights. What an ingenious idea!
A hanging lamp made from a piece of shattered glass. This will look great wherever you decide to put it!
This vending machine gives off a dim and eerie glow. Try decorating the wall with this.
Some sort of carbonated drink has been frozen to make a solid floor. Watch your step because there\'s ice sticking out of it.
Ice crystals are usually beautiful, but they\'re rather intimidating in this case. This prison cell\'s bars are so sturdy, there\'s no way to escape without help from the outside.
A bottle of soda that has burst open due to the cold temperature. It goes well wherever you place it.
A collection of ice cream cones that have been frozen solid. What a lucky find!
The leftovers of a spiny fish. Does it serve a purpose...?
An ice candle that gives off a bluish glow. Anyone would like this!
A piece of frozen candy that has grown ice spikes as sharp as knives. It goes well wherever you place it!
A cage hanging from the ceiling. It serves its purpose a bit too well.
A collection of collars worn by Cokeberus. What a lucky find!
An intimidating looking flail chain. Try placing it here and there.
This spiderweb has become frozen solid. It goes well wherever you place it.
A wall made from various foodstuffs that have been frozen over the years. Try decorating the wall with these.
A slippery floor made from solid ice. Try decorating the floor with these.
Welcome to Snow Crystal Cookie\'s Room of Frigid Solitude!
My eyes are as sharp as ever.

Salty Cream Foxes are easily recognized by their dense, firm fur. Their manes, in particular, are sturdy enough to remain intact even after a powerful sneeze. It\'s no wonder they take great pride in their coats.

The fur of a Lemon Cream Fox has a rather tart and tangy aroma with a hint of sweet syrup. These foxes can often be found wrinkling their noses, as their cream fur is potentially too tart, even for themselves!

The Strawberry Cream Fox covers itself in layers of strawberry cream and is friendly to all other breeds of foxes, from kits to adults. Strawberry Cream Foxes often sway their tails in a cheerful manner to win more friends.
A wise Shaved Ice Turtle. They seem familiar somehow...
A clever Mango Ice Turtle. Hopefully you\'ll get along!
A prudent Strawberry Ice Turtle. Such an amazing friend!
Snow Crystal Cookie\'s Room of Frigid Solitude

It\'s clear that Snow Crystal Cookie\'s room was always chilly, even before unwanted frost and moisture fell upon Mount St. Cr?me. Her room is so quiet, you can almost hear the ice slowly freezing. This room is perfect for clearing your mind of worries and concern.

This ancient hollow, suffused with a mysterious light, contains traces of a certain witch who clearly baked many Cookies in the castle a long, long time ago. What sort of Cookies was this witch planning to bake with the leftover dough? But the bigger mystery is... where did the witch disappear to after preparing all these ingredients?

The nefarious gang of sodas keeps a stern eye on their captives within the icy prison. Within this small hideout of theirs, there are traces of the fearsome minions of the witch that GingerBrave and friends have encountered throughout the castle! Why is all this stuff here? What is going on?

The glittering shards of ice and clusters of frost seem beautiful until you realize this entire frozen complex is a massive prison! It\'s said that the witch\'s minions imprison their captives here until they are ready to be sacrificed to the witch\'s table... But not anymore!

This mysterious lump of dough has been placed in the very center of the secret hollow. It is safe to assume that it was prepared for baking, but ultimately forgotten and too frozen to be useful. One question remains unanswered: who prepared this dough and why?
Do you think this stuff can
Grrr...! I won\'t forgive you two!
I know how to make your
Thank you for coming all this way, Strawberry Crepe Cookie.
WOW! I\'ve never seen a room like this before! Is that a real merry-go-round?!
Oh, sorry to disappoint you, but it\'s just a bed that looks like a merry-go-round.
Eh? So it\'s just a boring piece of furniture that doesn\'t do anything?
Well, yes, but it\'s shiny like the starry night sky...!
It\'s a happy room, just like an amusement park. Now, you said you wanted to share memories about-
Hmmm... Maybe a simple rotation spell? The axis might be able to absorb mana and... Yeah, with enough centrifugal force it might work?
Linear motion...? How much horsepower can it crank out after absorbing mana...? Or could it function on the same principles as my Wafflebots...?
Yeah, yeah! I can see it now...! It\'d definitely work!
CREAM UNICORN COOKIE! I know how to make your bed spin just like a real merry-go-round!
At first glance, I thought it\'d be impossible to make your bed spin.
But thinking about it in terms of pure magichanical engineering was only limiting my approach! You get what I mean, right?
I needed to think about it in an entirely different way! And that\'s when it hit me...! What if the design incorporated a little dessert magic?!
Hear me out. If we add more sweetness to this bedpost here, it\'d be able to safely house all the mana-infused circuitry, which\'ll be needed to make it spin!
Trust me! In principle, it\'s a similar design to my Wafflebots. And it\'s- Hey, what\'s with that face? Are you doing some calculations in your head?
Erm... Strawberry Crepe Cookie? I thought you wanted to talk about memories...
Yeah, yeah. But let\'s see if my theory for this new design works out!
If I\'m right, and I always am, this bed will spin like a real merry-go-round!!!
The mana-infused circuitry is securely in place, and we\'re ready for the next step!
Hey, Cream Unicorn Cookie? Do me a favor and press that green button on the control panel!
Hey! This isn\'t the time for a nap! We\'ve still got a lot of work to do!!!
Pffft... Fine, I\'ll do it myself! All I need to do is press this button and...
HAHA! It works! It\'s spinning like a real merry-go-round!
Because all I see in my dreams are beautiful butterflies...
It\'s a world without magichanical engineering... or circuits... or headaches...
So all this junk is the reason why you\'re running away from home?
It\'s not running away, it\'s exploration and adventuring!
Running away from home is bad, which means Adventurer Cookie is bad too!
Hehehe! He\'s my kind of Cookie!
But... there\'s something weird about this room...
These things here... How\'d you get your hands on them?
Good question! I\'ll tell you all about\'em!
That\'s how the sphinx and I became best friends, and I was given this door as a gift!
This trap was given to me as a reward for ending a feud between two villages.
They said they didn\'t need it anymore!
Adventurer Cookie is... nice?! Almost too nice!
And say hello to the Cheesebirds! I helped mend their injured wings.
They then followed me all the way home and made their nest here!
OH! This stone pillar is really special and-
Now that I think about it, you look a bit ill...
No! Get away from me! I\'m leaving!!!
Oh no, looks like Devil Cookie\'s still groggy...
I am glad I could help... but we can\'t relax just yet...
I will stay a bit longer and keep watch...
Devil Cookie, stop! You need to lie down and rest!
Huh...?! What\'s happening? I can\'t... move!
Grrr...! I won\'t forgive you two!
So... you\'re worried that the other residents are scared of you?
You usually stick around with the other Cookie, not me.
... No, no. What I meant to say is...
The other Cookie is much more likely to provide more heartwarming advice than myself.
And besides. You tend to be quite friendly with the other residents too.
Tell me... How do you do it?
Hmmm... One thing comes to mind.
You are usually behind Madam First Cream Cookie, carrying out her orders and requests.
You do not step forward into the light, hence the residents are unfamiliar with whom you really are.
So what you\'re saying is... I should interact with them more often?
Yes. And you aren\'t the easiest Cookie to approach.
Maybe I should smile and laugh more.
Correct. You should also try to appear majestic and helpful.
Reach out to the residents first, especially to those who are in need of aid.
Try doing what you are best at when it\'s needed most.
Shall we put it to test?
Very well. I shall try it immediately.
My donut balloon is stuck in a tree...
My life is ruined... I will no longer be able to experience joy and happiness from this moment forward...
Huh? That\'s a bit over-the-top, isn\'t it?
There is a resident who looks troubled.
Onyx Cream Cookie said I should help residents in need...
Yes... I just need to retrieve that balloon.
If I can hit the branch with an arrow, the string may become untangled.
EEEK! An arrow came out of nowhere?!
What\'s happening?! Are we under attack?!
I... I think... I think that Cookie shot at us!
Everyone is looking at me now. Perhaps this is the perfect time to attempt a smile.
Am I doing it? Is this what they call... smiling?
Wait for me! Don\'t leave me heeere!!!
They\'re gone. Perhaps they were too shy.
Although, I feel proud of myself for doing a good a deed. I should tell that Cookie about what happened.
