Snow Crystal Coins resembling glistening ice crystals. These can only be obtained during the Snow Crystal Season!
Warden of the Icy Prison, Cokeberus
The fearsome warden, Cokeberus, rules the icy prison with an iron paw! Rumor has it they fall asleep after eating snacks, but is this really the time to put it to the test?!
We found GingerDozer! Is he deep asleep?! Why isn\'t he waking up...?
A fluffy cotton chair. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
A small window shaped like a snowflake. Looking at it makes you feel calm.
A quiver for frost arrows. It\'s no wonder who this belongs to!
A giant beanbag made from the softest shaved ice. Anyone would love to have these!
This fencing was crafted from sturdy ice crystals. It serves its purpose.
A mount to store a bow. What a lucky find!
A decorative branch of cotton. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
A wind chime made from delicate ice. Let\'s put this to good use.
A shelf for storing many, many arrows. It serves its purpose very well!
This diffuser fills Snow Crystal Cookie\'s room with a gentle aroma. It almost makes you mistakenly feel something similar to warmth.
You feel as if you\'re looking upon a beautiful painting when snow falls outside this snowflake engraved window. One could gaze out this window forever.
A table designed so that you can enjoy the view outside no matter where you sit. The tablecloth, which resembles flower petals, matches perfectly.
Designed in the shape of crystallized ice, this cozy spot is not only pretty but also spacious!

This cotton stool appears soft and fluffy, but it\'s surprisingly firm, allowing one to sit upright with proper posture. It\'s well-maintained to be neat and tidy, just how Snow Crystal Cookie likes things to be.
When gazing at this wallpaper, many are reminded of silent winter nights where the only audible sound is the gentle piling of snow. Somehow, it makes you feel cool and refreshed even in the summer!
This floor, with its mosaic pattern of different shades of ice, looks like it was made from hundreds of shards of frozen crystals. But don\'t worry, it\'s not slippery at all.

Though Snow Crystal Cookie doesn\'t mind the cold, someone must have wanted to add a touch of warmth and comfort to her room. When sunlight enters through the window, this diffuser blooms and releases a soft fragrance that can warm anyone\'s heart.
Get a perfect start to the season
Remove the Ice & Free Salty Cream Yeti
Proof of completing the Snow Crystal Season Collection. A heart burning with passion and loyalty is more than enough to stave off the cold!
Okay! It should melt away now, right?
Let\'s check out another wall too!
Now we can find out what that noise is!
Tap the ice to free Salty Cream Yeti!
Upon entering the secret hollow, First Cream Cookie receives a vision of the Witch of Light. She must find \"the small Cookie\"!
GingerBrave and friends hear someone crying... The source is none other than Salty Cream Yeti, who claims they were crying out of sadness for Mount St. Cr?me\'s collapse.

Believing the group to be intruders, Snow Crystal Cookie fires an arrow to ward them off! But thanks to Onyx Cream Cookie, the arrow is safely deflected. Interestingly, it seems these two know each other!

The Cookies enter the hollow, hoping to repair the compass, but the unexpected happens! The mysterious energy within the chamber affects the compass, causing it to shine with a bright, blinding light.
The team manages to sneak into hostile territory, and they finally learn why the cabal of frozen sodas do not want Mount St. Cr?me to return to its former glory. Better tread carefully!
The icy prison holds captives who will soon join the witch\'s table! GingerDozer is somewhere inside...!!! We have to find him before it\'s too late!
GingerBrave and friends hurriedly rush deeper into the prison, as does First Cream Cookie. They finally discover the one they\'ve been seeking!

It\'s GingerDozer! But he\'s not waking up? To make matters worse, the warden of the prison, Cokeberus, has appeared! And a mysterious Cookie has kidnapped the small Cookie away, right in front of First Cream Cookie\'s eyes!
Appearing before GingerBrave and friends is... First Cream Cookie?!
Strawberry Crepe Cookie has paid Cream Unicorn Cookie a visit. Things go awry when Strawberry Crepe Cookie discovers a bed in the shape of a merry-go-round that doesn\'t spin!
Strawberry Crepe Cookie is excited to start a new magichanical engineering project. No one can stop this tinkering genius, not even the owner of the bed!
The upgrades to the merry-go-round bed are complete! Strawberry Crepe Cookie watches it spin, but Cream Unicorn Cookie is napping away the troubles in dreamland...
Running away from home to embark on a new adventure? It happens all the time! Devil Cookie admires Adventurer Cookie\'s daring and renegade attitude. But there\'s something else...
It turns out Adventurer Cookie is one of the nicest Cookies living in the castle! Devil Cookie, shocked by this discovery, faints with disappoints.
Devil Cookie wakes up to find Angel Cookie standing nearby!!! Being surrounded by such good and kind Cookies is too horrendous... The prankster vows to take revenge on them one day!
Snow Crystal Cookie is aware that the residents of Mount St. Cr?me are somewhat intimidated by her. She asks Onyx Cream Cookie for some advice.
Onyx Cream Cookie encourages Snow Crystal Cookie to interact with the residents and neighbors. Taking his advice to heart, she sets out to test this new approach!
Snow Crystal Cookie has helped the residents the best way she could. She\'s proud of her newest achievement! Alas, she seems unaware that this latest escapade hasn\'t delivered the desired effect...

Salty Cream Yeti is one of the most iconic residents of Mount St. Cr?me, especially known for having a sweet and salty coat of cream fur, and matching personalityaffectionate and endearing, but also tearful and sometimes irritating. This adorable yeti really must stop crying though, since adding moisture to an already chilly place will make the frost worse...
But I did not expect it
I had a feeling we\'d see
But no matter what we do...
Fear not, for his life is
If I am correct, the controller
Onyx Cream Cookie, Snow Crystal Cookie.
What exactly did you leave behind, First Cream Cookie?
I didn\'t want to interrupt earlier... hehe.
Honestly, I\'m curious too... But I\'m going to guess it\'s a powerful, magical artifact of some sort?
It\'s... a relic that holds a portion of my magical essence.
It enables me to cast spells of greater magnitude and strength.
This ancient land had always been capable of prolonging freshness for even the ill and spoiled...
But I did not expect it would fall into despair due to my absence...
Upon my previous return to Mount St. Cr?me, I could not believe my eyes at just how much it had changed.
I left a portion of my magical essence within the relic, and yet...
When did things start going downhill in the first place...?
An astute question. Despite the artifact\'s presence, it still wasn\'t enough to stave off the spoilage...
I have an idea of the root cause.
But first, I must retrieve the relic to be sure.
If we find it, can we wake up GingerDozer?
Not only can we wake him,
we may yet be able to restore Mount St. Cr?me to its former state.
So we\'ll finally get to see the real Mount St. Cr?me!
Mount St. Cr?me back to normal? Waking GingerDozer up? I can\'t handle the excitement!!!
C\'mon! Onwards, to the Chamber of Freshest Cream!
LOOK! There\'s a Cookie trapped in there!
Oh no! Is that Cookie a friend of yours?
Her name is Rainbow Sherbet Cookie. Her, Snow Crystal Cookie, and Onyx Cream Cookie...
The three of them have called Mount St. Cr?me their home for many moons.
Oh! We should get Rainbow Sherbet Cookie out of there!!!
Those bindings are not made of mere steel.
Oh? What if I like, just... tap them to make sure?
I... don\'t think that\'s a good idea...
Rainbow Sherbet Cookie might get hurt...
Oh! You\'re right! Then what should we do?
Hold on. Let me take a closer look.
Everyone, keep your distance! I advise against making physical contact with these bindings.
Those things over there! They look kind of important...
What if we get rid of them?
And so smart too! You\'re really cool, Strawberry Cookie!
Those things definitely do something important...!
I\'ve got it! I know exactly what we need do!
No one said it\'d be easy...!
But... But it IS slowing down a bit!
Rainbow Sherbet Cookie. Can you hear me? Are you alright?
You\'re not hurt, are you? Can you get up?
If so, it\'s a really cool, life-like dream.
I think she\'s a bit confused...
How long has she been sleeping?
Ahem! Greetings, Rainbow Sherbet Cookie. This is NOT a dream!
We\'re friends with First Cream Cookie!
Why were you imprisoned here? Do you remember what happened?
There was a Cookie from the outside! Someone who didn\'t belong in Mount St. Cr?me!
I saw them sneak into the Chamber of Freshest Cream and followed them!
A Cookie from the outside... I have an idea of whom you speak.
Did that Cookie lock you up in here, Rainbow Sherbet Cookie?
That Cookie was frantically looking for something in the Chamber of Freshest Cream.
First Egg Cookie was more than likely seeking the relic.
So... your relic was stolen? What do we do now, First Cream Cookie?
We can\'t restore this area back to normal without it!
And... it\'ll be impossible to wake GingerDozer up...
The intruder was seeking your sacred relic.
I didn\'t know what the Cookie was truly up to...
But I knew that they wanted to sabotage it... or worse!
I had to do something! I had no choice but to charge in!
Hehe...! At least the relic is safe, My Lady!
Whoa! What you did was really cool and brave, Rainbow Sherbet Cookie!
I am glad you are safe... But you should have known better.
Your life may have been in danger.
First Cream Cookie? Your relic is safe though, and it\'s all thanks to Rainbow Sherbet Cookie!
I sorta get it though. It\'s only natural to be concerned!
Perhaps we should examine the relic and see if it\'s unharmed?
This can\'t be... The relic is corrupted.
There is no doubt that this is First Egg Cookie\'s doing.
It all makes sense now. The temperature controller\'s constant malfunctioning...
... is because the relic has been tampered with and sabotaged.
Thus, Mount St. Cr?me has become...
And Rainbow Sherbet Cookie was put in harm\'s way due to...
I am the root cause for all this despair.
If only I had disregarded First Egg Cookie\'s words, I would never had left Mount St. Cr?me.
Hey, c\'mon, First Cream Cookie! It\'s not too late!
Can\'t we try to undo whatever\'s been done to your relic?
If we can pull that off, we can bring the old Mount St. Cr?me back, and even wake GingerDozer up!
It might be a long shot... but we\'re willing to help!
Thank you. It will not be easy, but let us cleanse this corruption!
And it\'s tied up in thorny vines!
Time to whack this weed away!
We can finally cleanse the relic!
I cannot... keep... I am too...
This will not be the end.
It feels so cool and fresh!
Oh? GingerDozer and First Cream Cookie know each other?
I\'ve never seen this little one in Mount St. Cr?me before!
Aaah, First Cream Cookie knows who GingerDozer is though.
Didn\'t she say that he was a Cookie of the First Batch?
Oh! I remember her saying that!
Cookies of the First Batch... are ones who were baked with Life Powder for the very first time in history.
They were baked by the great Witch, thus their name.
I have been tasked to seek and protect the Cookies of the First Batch.
And I am still looking for them to this day.
Oooh...! Does that mean the small Cookie you were looking for...
I am afraid not... I could not save that small Cookie...
Has the Mistress sent me a vision...?
A vision of the First Batch being baked into the world...?
Why have you shown me this vision, Mistress...? Are you assuring me that my path is correct...?
Are you okay, First Cream Cookie?
Yes, I am fine. But, my friends...
You were seeking to escape the castle through the window, were you not?
Oh yeah! Escape...! GingerBrave wanted to leave the castle!
And I still do! I want to get far away from here, away from the witch!
But... I\'m a bit worried about that small Cookie you\'re looking for, First Cream Cookie.
The one you said you couldn\'t save.
Me too! We can\'t just stand around here!
Oh! Is the saboteur of your relic, the one called First Egg Cookie, somehow responsible for this missing Cookie as well?
First Cream Cookie! How can we help?
I\'m still a freshly-baked Cookie, but I want to do what\'s right!
Yippee! Another adventure! Let me help too!
Hm... I too shall aid you. After all, there\'s no better teacher than experiencing new things!
I... I want to help too...!!!
I... I wish to apologize for my demeanor when we first met in front of the window.
If you wish to aid in my calling...
Please, help me protect the Cookies of the First Batch. Find them, so that I may fulfill my destiny and keep them safe.

As expected, there are no visitors or intruders... After all, barely anyone knows of this place.
Still, I must not let my guard down.
First Cream Cookie explicitly requested that no one is to enter this place.
And I will fulfill her wishes...
Could it be... First Cream Cookie?
Hm... I\'ve managed to clear away the ice and debris to gain a clear line of sight...
But in doing so, this place has gotten quite messy and cluttered...
So far, no Cookies or residents have made their way here.
The wall of ice outside actually helped with hiding the entrance to the hollow...
But now, it simply looks terrible.
Yes... I think I shall do some organizing.
Has that bundle of fuzzy-looking fabric always been there?
Calm down and answer my question. Why are you here?
Were you trying to sneak into the secret hollow?
Because if you were, I cannot and will not allow it, no matter how well-known you are around these parts.
Well? Spit it out. Why are you here? And since when?
I was just standing around in front of the secret hollow...
And I saw First Cream Cookie go inside!
I heard her talking and then... then...
I didn\'t mean to... but I heard everything thing she said!!!
And that no one was allowed to step foot in the chamber.
And after hearing her say that, I, Salty Cream Yeti, a proud resident of Mount St. Cr?me...!!!
I decided to do what Madam First Cream Cookie asked!
Ever since the unwanted frost showed up in Mount St. Cr?me, this area has grown chillier than usual.
And because the ice is growing so thick, it\'s difficult to see what\'s inside.
You\'re the one who made this place a mess, aren\'t you?
I wasn\'t trying to make a mess on purpose!
It\'s just... This place was too quiet, and I was bored, and there was nothing to do...
And then I started looking around, and one thing led to another, and then... well...
Madam First Cream Cookie will return soon.
Yes... This is the perfect spot for the sculptures...
This spot also serves as a strategic advantage, providing some good cover.
We should keep the snowball rolling and clean inside too!
No, we will not be going inside.
There is no doubt that the winds of Mount St. Cr?me have changed.
Despite being deep within this hollow, I can still feel the chilled, damp air.
I miss our home... I miss the old Mount St. Cr?me...
Your tears will freeze up immediately.
Like me, I know you aren\'t bothered by the cold...
But you should consider joining the other residents elsewhere.
I believe this place will get... quite lonesome over time.
But if I leave... Snow Crystal Cookie will be lonely...
What\'re you thinking, Salty Cream Yeti?
I came as soon as I could. You mentioned an overgrown plant that needs tending to?
They\'re on the table over here.
This candied flower and this one too, in the repotting pot.
These are very healthy flowers. I can tell that you\'ve taken care of them with lots of love.
Will you start pruning them right away or-
Is that a Cookievorous plant? How have you come across such a rare specimen?
Oh! You know about Cookievorous plants? You can take a closer look if you\'d like!
I\'ve never seen such a calm and docile Cookievorous plant before.
Do you have some sort of secret, personal method?
Nothing special! I just kept giving it nutrients and lots of water. Oh, and I played music for it too!
Fascinating. I will remember to jot those down in my journal.
It is more like an observation and research log, for the plants in the Syrup Garden.
I also write down notes about plants I\'ve learned about in my travels.
That\'s awesome! If it\'s okay, can I pay you a visit and read your notes?
Of course. I am happy to share such knowledge.
Pardon me, but what is this fountain\'s purpose?
Oh! It\'s called the Fountain of Sweet Growth! Its waters contain all the nutrients that plants need.
And these fixtures here... They are made with luminous daisies?
Wow! You really know your stuff!
Of course. Now then, shall we commence with the-
No, sorry, I have one more question.
This is... It\'s said to grow larger than any Cookie... It\'s...
Your hunch is right! It\'s a gigantigrow tulip!
I didn\'t think you\'d recognize this one! You\'re amazing, Rosemary Cookie!!!
I am very glad to have met you as well, someone who loves plants as much as I do.
Well then, I shall begin pruning the-
Before you start, I wanted to ask you something. What are your thoughts on this tillandsia coconut?
Hehe, like I said, I try my best!
I could spend all day talking about plants with you, Rosemary Cookie!
After I am done pruning, do you wish to come visit my room and talk some more?
I can show you my observation journal.
Oh! You should also take a look at these herb curtains!
Thank you for mentioning them first. I actually wanted to ask about them for a while now.
Haha! By all means! We can take our time and talk all day!
Yup! All of this stuff was made from scraps by yours truly!
I used all sorts of parts and junk that I found throughout the castle.
All this stuff was made from scraps?!
You said you were under-equipped for your last expedition. Isn\'t that dangerous?
Yeah. I set out to find some relics and treasures in the kitchen\'s cellar with nothing but a rope... I didn\'t find a single crumb!
That won\'t do! Which is why... I went ahead and made some gear that might be useful for ya!

The Cookies finally meet First Cream Cookie! But before they could rejoice, the temperature controller has gone out of control again!

In order to ensure Mount St. Cr?me remain fresh and chilled, First Cream Cookie left her sacred relic behind during her absence. Could it be that the region\'s temperature problems were caused by a problem with the relic?
The Cookies travel to the Chamber of Freshest Cream to retrieve First Cream Cookie\'s relic. They\'re surprised to discover Rainbow Sherbet Cookie, trapped in some sort of magical prison!
Our friends succeed in freeing Rainbow Sherbet Cookie! She claims that an intruder was snooping around the chamber, looking for something. She reveals what the intruder was looking for...!
Despite the potential danger, Rainbow Sherbet Cookie has safeguarded the relic. But somehow, it has been corrupted with some form of foul magic!

Our friends have successfully purified the sacred relic! Immediately, First Cream Cookie wields its power to restore Mount St. Cr?me to its former glory and a chilled, fresh breeze begins to flow through the region. And what\'s this?! GingerDozer has awakened!

Our heroes learn there are more Cookies of the First Batch! GingerBrave and friends decide to postpone their escape from the castle in order to help First Cream Cookie in her search for these mysterious Cookies!

Cocoa Cookie is getting ready to attend Mint Choco Cookie\'s recital... only to discover that her ticket is missing!!!

Rainbow Sherbet Cookie learns that real rainbows are created when sunlight meets water droplets in the air. She decides to try it out immediately... only to discover the water freezes too rapidly.

Snow Crystal Cookie manages to rescue Rainbow Sherbet Cookie from the ice. The stoic archer points out it is near impossible to create rainbows with traditional methods in such a cold environment and, no less, indoors.

Though failing to create rainbows using water, the colors reflecting off of the ice has created a dazzling display in its own right. Rainbow Sherbet Cookie is ecstatic to have discovered such a unique method of creating rainbows.

Strawberry Crepe Cookie, having grown bored of playing with the Wafflebots, aimlessly looks for something to do. Suddenly, Radish Cookie appears and asks to become Strawberry Crepe Cookie\'s apprentice!

Strawberry Crepe Cookie decides to accept Radish Cookie as an apprentice. To demonstrate a sense of authority, the engineering genius tells Radish Cookie to run five meters. Is this what mentors really do?
Radish Cookie has completed her task! And the next one, and the next one! Strawberry Crepe Cookie starts to feel bored again, but Radish Cookie has an ingenious solution.
With a mixture of joy and curiosity, Rainbow Sherbet Cookie explores Mount St. Cr?me to see its restoration in full. She happens to find the Cr?me Refuge.

Cherry Cream Muffin tells Rainbow Sherbet Cookie how the residents struggled to survive the lukewarm, moist air. Upon hearing this tale, Rainbow Sherbet Cookie decides to help create new, happier memories by hosting a party.
The old supplies and ice packs are cleared away to make room for party decorations and fancy lights. But the party can\'t start without inviting guests!
The Cr?me Refuge has transformed into a bright and lively party venue. Snow Crystal Cookie was also invited... but the other guests are rather unsure if she is enjoying the party or not.

The party closes with many wishes for Mount St. Cr?me to stay fresh and chilled for a long, long time. Rainbow Sherbet Cookie adds in a last-minute prayer wishing for everyone\'s happiness and freshness.

But then they just started accusing us of being villains and kicked us out!
Ah? Haha, I presume it was Buckwheat Cookie who expelled you?
Well, I have not heard of this so-called \"First Batch\", but...
There is, without a doubt, a young Cookie who is not from these lands, residing in the temple.
The Cookie is referred to as Yummers. Though rather average in appearance, the young one has a bottomless pit for a stomach! With quite an adorable demeanor as well.
An average looking Cookie...? It\'s more than likely Yummers could belong to the First Batch.
Wait, so there IS a Cookie of the First Batch in the temple! But why\'d they kick us out?
The Temple of Abundance was once a grand community.
All of us would work and toil the lands, but no matter how difficult and sweaty things were, the harvest was always worth it.
Alas, those days are now a memory of the past.
The Temple of Abundance has changed, and not for the better.
Once again, because of Buckwheat Cookie.
Ah, so the one who scolded us is named Buckwheat Cookie, eh?
Who is she...? Did she do something to the temple...?
As children, we were rather close. She would always be scheming a new prank to pull on the adults.
We were caught and disciplined on many occasions, but we always ended up laughing together.
But one day, without warning, Buckwheat Cookie\'s demeanor changed.
She used to be quiet and timid, but she slowly became more vibrant...
Buckwheat Cookie then started to step forward and lead the others. Everything was fine until...
Her ambition. It slowly grew into something akin to greed.
First Grain Cookie has always cherished Yummers.
She was always fond of Cookies with a robust appetite. And Yummers is rather endearing, so much so that even we grew to adore him.
But I caught a glimpse of something in Buckwheat Cookie\'s eyes.
Originally, she did not give much thought to Yummers. But she suddenly spent more time with him and First Grain Cookie, almost every waking moment.
She then fell into a habit of suspicion and doubt, always on guard for something. Perhaps she had heard a rumor about Yummers being in danger...
And now... I believe that brings us here.
So her demeanor just changed like that? For what reason?
I am at a loss for an answer. Though I\'ve tried to ask her directly, she simply refuses to meet with me.
But things were going rather well, which is why I dismissed my own concerns...
Ever since Buckwheat Cookie took a more active role in managing the farms, the crops have been growing at an exponential rate.
The harvest was bountiful beyond our wildest dreams. They grew so abundant that no one had to worry about working the farms ever again.
But that sounds like good news!
Until it became a reality... virtually everyone stopped working on the land.
As a result, the land is dying... The soil\'s nutrients have all but dried out.
I\'ve tried on multiple occasions to warn the others of this perilous situation, but they brushed me aside. They\'ve become too accustomed to feasting day in and day out.
The Temple of Abundance is no longer the joyful and pleasant land I grew up in.
It is now a den of greed and sloth...
That\'s... a lot to take in.
It\'s the right thing to do! You need help, and we\'re willing to lend you a hand!
And of course... right on cue, GingerBrave.
If Yummers is the Cookie we\'re looking for, we\'d be helping each other, right...?
Heehee! Admit it, Wizard Cookie! You wanted to say we\'d help before GingerBrave this time, right?
What an odd bunch of Cookies...
We\'ve met just moments ago... I am still a stranger to them, yet they offer assistance?
And yet... I am truly, desperately in need of some help.
... Thank you. I will strive to repay this debt as soon as I am able.
If you\'re willing, shall we move elsewhere and discuss things in more detail?
Perhaps my own contribution to spreading rumors of hostile outsiders will serve useful.
This Cookie is mine... And they will pave my path to the top...
Those pesky outsiders have been dealt with for now...
Which gives me the opportunity to begin...
I had a rising suspicion Buckwheat Cookie was plotting something...
SSSHHH! Let\'s keep our eyes and ears open for now...
The concoction from Madam First Egg Cookie...
It truly has served wonders... making the crops thrive and grow at a remarkable pace.
And it only cost the next few years\' worth of the soil\'s nutrients.
I... I really hoped my suspicions were merely nonsense but...
First Egg Cookie and Buckwheat Cookie... What\'re they up to?
These lands will become arid and barren in just a few days.
And as soon as I can take Yummers away with this sigil from First Egg Cookie,
I can finally be rid of that nuisance, Chickpea Cookie.
Buckwheat Cookie... what have you become...?
Aaah, there you are, Buckwheat Cookie.
Madam First Grain Cookie?! Forgive me, I-I-I did not hear you approach.
Time and time again I have heard from our neighbors that you\'ve taken a keen interest in caring for the crops.
Such an endeavor must be a heavy burden for just one Cookie... which is why I\'ve come to aid you.
M-M-Milady, it is hardly a task which you-
Deary, deary! Together, we can bring forth the most bountiful harvest in the history of the temple!
I, but... It\'s such a menial task that I can perform without-
No, Buckwheat Cookie. I simply wish to provide aid as I am very grateful for your hard work.
I have yearned to see my dream become a reality. A world absent of hunger, where everyone lives without concern.
Oh me oh my! Buckwheat Cookie, what is that in your hand...?
OH! An insect!!! Haha, haha, haha...
Crumbs... I will have to retrieve it later...

It\'s somehow, similar to her presence...
Do you think... we should show this
Or she might scold us for
Well... What\'ve we got to lose?

We once shared our harvests, but now we squabble and bicker to fill our plates, going so far as to covet the food of others!
Is this truly... what you wanted, milady?
Droughts are unbearable, and hunger is exponentially worse, almost torturous.
Friends and colleagues, wincing from hunger today, may only tremble in silence tomorrow.
The masses will fall and the land will cry out in tears of anguish and misery.
In desperation, I cried out and begged to see a world absent of hunger...
BACK OFF! Get your filthy hands away from my plate!

I GRABBED IT FIRST! Don\'t even think about looking at it!
Don\'t just stand there! Stop them!
Stop them! No, no, NO! Take away the food!
Have I made the wrong choice, yet again...?
No... And I had no knowledge of such sentiment until now...
Why was I not made aware of such a blight upon our lands? I assumed Buckwheat Cookie was working for the better good...
Despite her reassurances, I should have looked into everything personally...
I have... failed. What have I done? Everything is my fault, once more...
It\'s not your fault, First Grain Cookie!
And, even if you think you made a mistake, you can still make things right starting now!
We\'ve made a lot of friends along our way.
Some of them became sad when their choices ended up putting a lot of folks in danger too, and they regretted every moment!
Ah! Rosemary Cookie and Radish Cookie!
There was also a big misunderstanding that just kept growing because of a mistake in the past.
And a Cookie who waited for a long, long time, enduring the pain of mold, waiting for his friend to return!
I\'ve learned that everyone makes mistakes! And everyone struggles!

Sometimes, the answer to fixing a mistake is simple! All it takes is reaching out and asking for help!
Words of wisdom, but will everything truly be amended, even if I were to ask for aid?
Will assistance from you or anyone else restore the Temple of Abundance?
But I won\'t stop helping until all of your friends are happy again!
He\'s absolutely right, hehe! It\'s up to you First Grain Cookie! Do you need a hand?
We\'re here to help, if you need us!

Being worthy or unworthy doesn\'t matter when it comes to helping others.

You made things too easy, always smiling like some buffoon and bragging about how you did this and that and on and on, even when I was drowning in my own tears!
... Everyone looked up to you, looked for you when they needed to. No one even mentioned me or recognized my efforts.
You don\'t know what that\'s like.
I... I just wanted to be seen and heard...
My feelings for you haven\'t changed... I always liked you.
I always wanted to become a Cookie and friend that you could be proud of.
I always wanted to be there with you, which made me work twice as hard to earn that spot!
... And that, old friend, is why I despise you.
I\'ll always be there for you, no matter what!
I know you\'ll have a change of heart. I don\'t know exactly when, but I know you will, and we can be close friends once more.
You\'ll never be able to see that day... because I hate you. And I will keep hating you!
Remember this bracelet? You made it for me, the very first thing you crafted with your own hands.
You said it\'s a gift, a sign of our friendship.
I\'ve always cherished this bracelet, come rain or shine. It\'s my greatest treasure.
It\'s also a reminder of the memories we\'ve made.
You still cherish those days to some extent, don\'t you?
That\'s why you kept onto this. Deep down, you still remember the good times.
Well, at least, that\'s what I think. And I believe in you, friend.
Because, that\'s what we are, friends!
Take\'em away! Take\'em away! To the cell! To the cell!
I think we\'ve just witnessed something amazing beyond measure here...
That was a really touching conversation, Chickpea Cookie! From the heart!
Ahem...! Well, we still have work left to do. We need to return the Temple of Abundance back to normal!
Oh ho! Then I have the perfect idea. Perhaps we should retrieve the old farming equipment?

Amazing... Then it means that GingerDozer is not the young Cookie we thought him to be!

Since the First Batch, we witches baked Cookies with passion and diligence.
We wanted to create a happy world of Cookies...
Cookies living of their own free will, strong and resolute.

One of fiery courage and an iron-willed heart.

Calm yourself, Onion Cookie. Tell me, what is troubling you?

Deary, deary me! I could not accept such a wondrous and overwhelming gift...!

You have my deepest thanks, Rosemary Cookie.
I absolutely must repay your kindness!
My gift to you! These here are various loaves of bread, baked with flour made from the grains we\'ve harvested recently.
And these are an eclectic collection of sweets made from our very own crops.
Oh, and don\'t forget these amazing Fruit Jellies. And these Vegetable Jellies too! They\'re absolutely-
I can\'t... I can\'t carry all of these wonderful things back to the Syrup Garden on my own...!
Oh deary, deary! But I simply cannot send you back home empty-handed!
You\'ve given me such an amazing gift, and I really must insist!

Just a few sweets? Is that truly enough?
Yes. My younger sister will enjoy these very much.

Ah, you have a sister! You must be very close.
Well, deary, if you or your sister ever need more snacks and sweets, do not hesitate to come visit!
Yes, we shall. And if you need more syrup, just let me know.
Of course! I shall you next time!
Thank you. I shall take my leave now. Goodbye!

Amidst a boundless field of wheat shimmering like a golden sea underneath, a humble and noble Cookie opened her eyes. As warm and generous as the autumn earth, this Cookie soon became adored by all who met her. First Grain Cookie is especially attuned to the needs of the hungry, and she is never able to turn a blind eye to their plight. With a graceful wave of her Grainstalk Staff, young sprouts burst forth from even the most arid of soil, and with a second wave, they become crops filled with the promise of a bountiful harvest. In the presence of First Grain Cookie, no one has to live with the fear and misery of hunger ever again.
Welcome to the Temple of Abundance!
As long as I am present, no one shall go hungry.
Come, let us enjoy this autumn\'s harvest!
My goodness! Such a bountiful harvest!
This reminds me of... when I first met...
Winter shall pass and the crops will grow once more.
Greetings, {0}. Have you had lunch yet?

The staff wielded by First Grain Cookie wherever she goes. It is deceptively heavy, perhaps because of the tightly packed grains contained within. Many Cookies cannot budge this simple staff, let alone wield it.

During the sunrise of a long forgotten morning of the past, a straw hat was woven with utmost care, blade by blade, each coated with the clearest of dew. Its fresh green scent radiates the calming, gentle spirit of the earth.

An arm cuff crafted to honor the vast wheat fields of the Temple of Abundance. It is said to be imbued with a heartfelt wish for none to ever go hungry for all eternity, and that all will live in a world of warm smiles and abundant harvests.
First Grain Cookie\'s Chamber of Plenitude

Soft, warm sunlight gently seeps into every corner of First Grain Cookie\'s chambers. As the room becomes a cozy temperature, the air is filled with the nutty aroma of toasted grains. No matter how weary or hungry one might be, they will find comfort, fulfillment, and happiness in this room.
Welcome to First Grain Cookie\'s Chamber of Plenitude!
This mysterious drop holds a piece of First Grain Cookie\'s soul. When holding it up to your ear, you can hear the autumn winds swimming across a field of wheat.
First Grain Cookie Bear Jelly Toy
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles First Grain Cookie. Its eyes reassure you that a bountiful harvest is just around the corner.
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Vampire Cookie. The toy seems to give off an aroma of grape juice.
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Onion Cookie. Standing close by makes you break into tears, but you can\'t help but give it a big hug!
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Blackberry Cookie. When you gaze into its eyes, your concentration seems to grow exponentially.

This scarecrow emits a unique scent that can only be described as candy apples. Its sweet fragrance also contains a tinge of sourness to it, which is probably the reason why so many butterflies and sparrows flock to it. But why does the scarecrow smell so good in the first place? It\'s all due to the thin coat of caramel poured onto its apple head!

This scarecrow\'s smile reminds you of late spring, when everything is looking forward to the warm summer. Despite having a sour apple for its head, there\'s no sign of any sourness to its demeanor! Somehow, its smile seems to grow with joy when it hears the laughter of children carried by the wind.

This scarecrow and its golden apple head seem to glisten under the midday light. If you listen closely, you can hear it snoozing as it basks in the warmth of the sun\'s rays. It\'s okay to take naps, friendly scarecrow, remember to take care! Your caramel coat might melt if you stay still for too long!

This is the fluffiest Cake Hound you will ever find in your travels throughout the Witch\'s Castle. As it playfully wags its tail, followed by an endearing jump and skip, you can\'t help but want to give it the biggest hug you\'ve ever given. These adorable creatures usually roam the wilds, but can also be trained to live in harmony with Cookies. Perhaps this is why some can be found in certain corners of the Witch\'s Castle.
Proof of completing the First Grain Season Collection. Thanks to your efforts, the Temple of Abundance has completed a record harvest that enriches, not just the belly, but the soul!
Our friends have traveled to the Temple of Abundance. They ask the whereabouts of a Cookie of the First Batch, but find no answers. Just then... a certain Cookie approaches them.
First Grain Cookie seems to be a gentle and kind Cookie. GingerBrave and friends ask her if she knows anything about the Cookies of the First Batch.
First Grain Cookie\'s demeanor turns cold and distant at the mention of the First Batch. Was it something we said?

Just like that, our friends were kicked out for no apparent reason. The Cookies begin to ask another group the same question, but everyone seems too preoccupied with eating... Then, in the distance, the Cookies spot someone who isn\'t eating!
Thanks to Chickpea Cookie, our friends learn that there is indeed a Cookie of the First Batch within the temple. They wish to learn more about the temple\'s history and happenings.

It seems that the culprit behind the temple\'s recent changes is none other than Buckwheat Cookie. After hearing Chickpea Cookie\'s plight, our friends decide to bring peace back to the Temple of Abundance.
The crew and Chickpea Cookie decide to eavesdrop on Buckwheat Cookie... and they figure out something dire and sinister indeed.
Our heroes learn that Buckwheat Cookie has joined forces with First Egg Cookie! They manage to get their hands on a sigil supposedly belonging to First Egg Cookie...
The Cookies scramble to escape before Buckwheat Cookie can discover them. But she soon realizes that someone has been spying on her...
First Grain Cookie grants a brief audience to GingerBrave and friends once more. They tell her the truth about Buckwheat Cookie, but it seems First Grain Cookie is hesitant to accept their testimony.

Despite having been shown the sigil, First Grain Cookie still hesitates to accept our friends\' warnings. Then, Chickpea Cookie steps in and asks her how she truly feels about the Temple of Abundance\'s current state.

Chickpea Cookie\'s words seem to have resonated with First Grain Cookie as she takes a closer look at the temple and its denizens. Seeing them fight for food helps her realize this is not what she wished for.
GingerBrave, GingerBright, Strawberry Cookie, and Wizard Cookie are all willing to help First Grain Cookie restore peace to the Temple of Abundance. It\'s time to stop Buckwheat Cookie\'s schemes!
Our heroes are in hot pursuit of Buckwheat Cookie. On their way there, they listen to First Grain Cookie\'s tale... a recount of what happened in the past. A rather grim past...
The Cookies have finally found Buckwheat Cookie, who has also kidnapped Yummers! Have you no shame, Buckwheat Cookie?!
Buckwheat Cookie\'s sinister plot has been thwarted. Chickpea Cookie is eager to finally learn what drove her down such an evil path...

Chickpea Cookie is confident that Buckwheat Cookie can return to being the kind, gentle-hearted Cookie he remembers one day. Buckwheat Cookie departs and the Cookies must finally return the Temple of Abundance back to normal.
The Cookies find a tablet containing a memory of First Grain Cookie. They learn the true identity of First Grain Cookie...
It\'s time to depart the Temple of Abundance. What else lies in wait in the quest to find more Cookies of the First Batch?!
Welcome to the Temple of Abundance, where the sun shines bright and the harvest is always plentiful! What new adventure await our friends here?!
The corridors of the temple have been blocked with strange vines! It looks like First Grain Cookie\'s powers are formidable!
The land, once cared for and worked by all the temple\'s denizens, has become arid and drained of all nutrients. A certain Cookie prays earnestly for a way to save the soil.
A warehouse used to store all sorts of farming equipment and valuables. Wait... Isn\'t it odd to house valuables in a warehouse? Nope! The equipment ARE the valuables!
Onion Cookie is scared of the voices she hears outside her window. Blackberry Cookie reassures her that everything is fine.
Onion Cookie has heard more voices this time! Blackberry Cookie manages to comfort Onion Cookie once more.
Onion Cookie returns to Blackberry Cookie, frightened by something else this time. And this time, it truly is a frightening thought...
After reading a book and being inspired by its main character, Onion Cookie decides to depart on an adventure of her own! But someone is eavesdropping...!
Onion Cookie is startled by Devil Cookie\'s sudden appearance. Strangely, Devil Cookie is startled by Onion Cookie\'s sudden outburst of tears.
Onion Cookie has mistaken Devil Cookie for a ghost. She asks Blackberry Cookie to check on things, just in case.
On request, Rosemary Cookie has traveled to the Temple of Abundance. As a gift, she has brought a special vial of syrup to restore the soil\'s nutrients.
First Grain Cookie is shocked at how effective Rosemary Cookie\'s syrup is. Insisting that she somehow repay this debt, she asks Rosemary Cookie to follow her.
First Grain Cookie tries to repay a gift with... too many gifts! Rosemary Cookie, surprised at First Grain Cookie\'s generosity, politely declines and just takes a single portion of snacks.
Golden coins that resemble the grains of a bountiful harvest. These can only be obtained during the First Grain Season!
Delivery of Missing BONUS Stage Coins

A bed as comfy as the softest sugar clouds. As you lie down, you can\'t help but feel as if you\'re floating in space, surrounded by a drape of twinkling stars. No matter how awake or tired, restless or exhausted, this bed is guaranteed to sweep you off to dreamland in a matter of seconds.

This panel has been engraved with all sorts of constellations and celestial bodies. It looks like someone has charted a very complex route through the stars and moons scattered throughout space. Where will this route take you?

A cup of tea, half-empty. A pile of old train tickets. A moonlight fountain pen with its lid open. The owner of this desk is either extremely busy or rather untidy... But today, it just looks like the conductor is lazing off and taking things slow...

Open the curtains in your train compartment and you\'ll see a dazzling galaxy swimming in the void of space. With such a wondrous display of dancing stars and twinkling nebulae, a curtain to cover the window is certainly unnecessary!
It\'s a meteor shower! As an endless number of lights streak across the night sky, you can\'t help but wonder... Where are they going?

A floor that seems to magically contain the essence of an entire galaxy. If you stand on it, waves of light and stardust gently ripple out from your feet. This fantastic display of lights is so mesmerizing, you almost feel like you\'re floating in space!
A clock with four faces in the shape of stars and moons. What a nice find!
Someone has ripped out the seating from a cabin! It\'s super comfy and classy!
Someone is taking a deep, comfy nap on this cushion. Just looking at it makes you feel like you are home.
A coat rack that is already in use. It\'s no wonder who this belongs to!
A garland of stars, big and small. Let\'s hang it up somewhere nice!
A shelf with all sorts of luggage on it. Let\'s put this to good use!
A jar full of Star Jellies! Yummy! Everyone loves Star Jellies!
An impressive collection of certificates and awards. What an amazing feat!
Is it an old rug or an old train ticket? Why not both? Let\'s put it here and there.

Having been imbued with the blessing of abundance, this bed seems to emit a warm, golden glow. The fruits of labor and the gift of the harvest have been placed delicately nearby. It\'s said that, while lying down on this bed, a single bite of anything from the most recent harvest will satiate any hungry belly.
As you rest upon the bed and close your eyes, it begins to sway gently in the wind, as if by magic. Despite having a feast laid out before you, you feel as if leaving this bed will ruin your day.

The mythical syrup fairies are said to approach fertile lands and summon enchanted fountains of syrup. Inspired by such tales, this fountain has been crafted with the utmost care. The attention to details can be seen with the fairy\'s softly closed eyes, as if sleeping in eternal tranquility.

The inviting scene of freshly baked bread and the sweet aroma of popcorn is unbearably welcoming! No one can resist such amazing aromas! But the secret to these aromas can be found in First Grain Cookie\'s wheatgrass diffuser. Even so, try following your nose to the source of the fragrance and you might just discover a few hidden snacks here and there!
A lamp that also serves as a tray for fruit. What a lucky find!
An old-fashioned lamp made with golden lotus leaves. Let\'s put it to good use!
A decorative stalk of wheat. Let\'s put it somewhere nice!
A haphazard pile of grains from the recent harvest. This will look great wherever you decide to put it.
The sun\'s rays turn into a radiant golden glow as it passes through this window. Just looking at it makes you feel relaxed.
The sun\'s rays turn into a radiant golden glow as it passes through this window. Just sitting in front of it makes you feel cozy and comfy.
A ceiling light made from corn that was partially popped. It efficiently lights up any room it is installed in.
A ceiling light made from corn that was popped in the old-fashioned way. Looks scrumptious!
A ceiling made from decorative stalks of wheat. It\'s sure to bring your room a touch of rustic elegance.
A pile of lotus leaves. Let\'s put it here and there.
A bath filled to the brim with syrup. Anyone would love to have one of these!
A wall designed to remember the bountiful harvests of the past. You can feel the warmth of the earth emitting from this wall.

Flooring with patterns of clouds that remind you of a sunset on an autumn day. The wave of clouds, scattered with the shape of grains here and there, remind you that your most recent harvest was made possible thanks to the blessing of abundance.
Milky Way Cookie\'s Room of Stardust and Dreams

Milky Way Cookie\'s room resembles the night sky, where stars and galaxies dance and glimmer in the void of space. When you enter, you hear the stars whisper and giggle. The room itself seems to beckon you to come join the fun in the world of dreams.

Take a handful of star powder gathered from all over the Milky Way Galaxy, illuminate it with delicate moonlightand voila! Meet Milky Way Cookie, the Slumbering Moon\'s faithful servant and the conductor of the Sugarcloud Express that will take you to your sweetest dreams and back. Don\'t be afraid and hop on: one sprinkle of Milky Way Cookie\'s star powder is enough for a colorful, vibrant dream-just like reality but better! Everything is possible in the World of Dreams, and accidents happen, too: every now and then, the train\'s floor disappears, and cars reshuffle randomly, leaving crowds of passengers in utter confusion. And right in the middle of the conductor\'s scheduled nap time! But professionalism never betrays, and there is no problem Milky Way Cookie can\'t sort out. Colorful hair neatly tied with a Star Jelly, conductor\'s hat on, and choo choo! The Sugarcloud Express will deliver you to your dreamy destination according to the schedule. Just make a wish upon a twinkling star...!
Yawn... So where did I park my train...?
Welcome aboard! Your dreams are waiting...!
What did you dream about last night?
Mkay... Wanna go see the Milky Way?
Let\'s go...! Somewhere no one has ever gone!
Work\'s calling... To the World of Dreams!
Aw... I\'ve used up all my starshine!
Yawn... Maybe YOU should drive the train today, {0}.
Welcome to Milky Way Cookie\'s Room of Stardust and Dreams!
A punch used to verify passenger tickets. Wait a minute... is someone riding the train without a ticket?!
This special hairband was made by scooping up a handful of stardust and packing it tightly into the shape of a Star Jelly! It still twinkles and glows during the night!
A whistle imbued with a hint of starlight. You may think it sounds like a regular whistle, but it actually sounds like a whispering lullaby.
Fixing Up the Milky Way Express
A Broken Train and Troubled Conductor
The Sugarcloud Express has broken down! Milky Way Cookie doesn\'t know where to start repairs, but the skilled(?) engineer, Radish Cookie, has an idea!
Radish Cookie has, somehow, finally managed to fix the train. Though it took many twists and turns, Milky Way Cookie is ready to go... Huh? Where?
After exchanging a warm farewell, Milky Way Cookie departs! To where? To the World of Dreams, of course!
I managed to escape those space pirates, but at what cost?
The train crashed and I have no idea where we are... I don\'t know if this place has enough scraps to help with repairs and... *Sigh*
My name\'s Milky Way Cookie. I\'m the conductor of the very, very special...
Hm... Milky Way Cookie, huh? Doesn\'t seem like someone with ties to the Reaper...
Lemme ask you this, Milky Way Cookie. Your train is broken down, right?
HAHA! Then can I help fixing it?!
Oh, where are my manners! My name\'s Radish Cookie!
I\'m an expert at inventing and repairing all sorts of things!
I... may have exaggerated my skills and expertise... This is more complicated than I thought!
GAH! They\'re going, erm, great! I\'m working at a good pace! Everything\'ll be done in no time!
Heeey... You shouldn\'t just drop your pliers like that.
No, no, it was an accident... hehe...
Oh! Was that the finishing touch? Everything seems to be working again?
I think the pliers might have just dislodged some debris.
I fixed it! HAHA! I knew I could fix it!
Which means that I need to get moving! Thank you, Radish Cookie!
Don\'t mention it! It was a cinch!
The World of Dreams, of course! This train was designed to travel between various dream worlds!
Yeah! It\'s quite a swell place, as long as you don\'t run into any pirates...
But getting to travel and fly by the stars and galaxies...
Maybe you\'ll get to ride along with me one day, Radish Cookie!
I promise to take you safely to your destination!
Hope to see you soon! And if we can, let\'s meet up in the World of Dreams!
Alright! Sounds like a plan! Take care of yourself, Milky Way Cookie!
Now then... CHOO CHOO! Off we go! Ready to depart all thanks to Radish Cookie!
That\'s a really fast train...! I can hardly see it now!
I wonder if Milky Way Cookie is driving past one of those stars up there?
Oh... I should\'ve asked where I can get my hands on a ticket for the Sugarcloud Express...
Meh...! I\'ll figure it out someday, haha! After all, a promise is a promise!
Oh, it looks like we don\'t have
Hey! This seems like a cozy

Awesome! We can quickly set up

A Grand Plan... In the Making
Buckwheat Cookie\'s ambitions know no limits. She retreats to her room for some well-deserved peace and quiet, which she hopes will help her finalize her grand scheme.
Yummers has suddenly ventured away from the Temple of Abundance on his own in order to visit Buckwheat Cookie... Why?
Yummers is hungry and asking for obscure, rare gourmet dishes and ingredients to snack on. Somehow, Buckwheat Cookie understands his demands, even when he\'s speaking with his mouth full...
Crash Landing in the Witch\'s Castle
Space Doughnut has crash-landed into... not an ocean, but a strange and eery castle! The space traveler is confused when suddenly...
Witchberry Cookie, self-proclaimed expert on the Witch\'s Castle, has made contact with Space Doughnut! No, Witchberry Cookie, Space Doughnut is not a Cookie...

Witchberry Cookie, who has not traveled beyond the Witch\'s Castle, is fascinated by Space Doughnut\'s tales of space travel. And Space Doughnut is excited to explore the castle with Witchberry Cookie\'s help. The two make an odd pair, but it seems they\'ll get along just fine!
Hmph... What a mess. I could barely hear myself think back there.
... I will stop at nothing to fulfill my destiny.
But I am finding it much too difficult to finalize my grand plan in such a dizzying environment.
The Temple of Abundance? Hmph! More like the Temple of Chaos.
At least my room provides some solace and much needed silence.
I shall organize my thoughts and then-
Hm? Is there someone outside my door?
Yummers! Calm down, please! Stay still and I shall open the door.
What does the small lump of dough want this time?
What happened to the Moletatoes? How come you\'re here alone?
Th Mrwltatus srd thr wrh bzy. (The Moletatoes said they were busy.)
Hold on. Yummers is an essential key to my plan.
Yes... In the end, it may serve beneficial to become well acquainted.
I must ensure that Yummers learns to trust me without question.
Besides... It will make the kidnapping go much more efficiently.
I wnt spnch soop! (I want spinach soup!)
Yummers... Do I look like the type of Cookie to have fresh spinach soup just lying around?
Yer th onl wun whr rly undrstns me! (You\'re the only one who really understands me!!!)
Noh evrwun duz, hehe. (Not everyone does, hehe.)
What are you eating right now?
You should finish whatever it is you\'re having first. THEN, you can ask for something.
And please remember... it is rude to speak with food in your mouth!
Have you not considered that\'s why everyone has a hard time understanding you?
Hehe, irf I der, werl yu gert mi srm spnch soop? (Hehe, if I do, will you get me some spinach soup?)
What? No, that\'s not the point...!
C\'mere, I can\'t stand to see your mouth covered in crumbs. Let me wipe them off for you.
Hehehe, thn haw bout... (Hehehe, then how about...)
How did a little menace like you learn about such a gourmet ingredient...?!
Do I really need Yummers as part of my plan?
Please... Just a moment of silence is all I ask for!
Prrrp kyyu du-doa dddo dwoo da?!
I swear I saw something crash down from the sky...
I\'ve been around the Witch\'s Castle FOREVER, but I\'ve never seen anything like you!
You... You... What are you?! Are you a Cookie?
Are they a Cookie? Or... something else?
Bread? No, a cushion? Wait, a cushion with a mouth!
Who am I dealing with here?!
Hm... My name is Witchberry Cookie. And I am the resident expert on everything about the Witch\'s Castle!
And according to my knowledge, you, Roundish-Circle Cookie... may not be a Cookie at all! So... what\'s your name?
I still have no idea what you\'re saying...!!! What language are you speaking?!
Kyou kyu... kyou kyukyu! Ppu biri doa!
I get it now! So... what you\'re saying is... you came from there, somewhere between the moon and the stars?
I\'ve been here a looong time, and I haven\'t been outside the Witch\'s Castle before but...
What? NO! This castle is filled with all sorts of mysteries and fun stuff!
No one ever gets bored here!
There\'s lots of crumbs and debris left in the castle.
And many, many minions of the witch.
Oooh, and all sorts of funny Cookies running around, even ones that were freshly baked!
With all that\'s going on here...
You might just end up staying here to experience it all!!!
Kyou kyu... kyou kyukyu! Ppu! Biri! Doa!
Myahaha! Of course I will! I\'ll show you around the entire castle!
Well I\'ll look forward to hearing more about the sleepy moon and dancing stars! Keep\'em coming!
First Grain Cookie has been feeling down since Yummers\' departure. Chickpea Cookie suggests First Grain Cookie pay a visit to Mount St. Cr?me to cheer up.
Upon arriving at Mount St. Cr?me, First Grain Cookie encounters someone she recognizes and is happy to meet once more.
First Grain Cookie can barely contain her excitement to see First Cream Cookie, who has no recollection of her past. While engaging in conversation, they hear Yummers approach.
First Cream Cookie and First Grain Cookie continue their conversation as they watch Yummers and GingerDozer get along. They both hope that First Cream Cookie can regain her memory.
First Grain Cookie departs for the Temple of Abundance, but before she does, the two new old friends wish each other the best.
It has been ages since First Grain Cookie met First Cream Cookie, whose memories have faded. Perhaps the memories will come back soon. But for now, it\'s fare thee well.

Buckwheat Cookie was created using finely ground buckwheat flour, kneaded with warm water to create a fragrant and rich flavor. The method of carefully cooking at just the right time and temperature is the secret behind the Cookie\'s distinctive glossy shine. However, despite the outward appearance, it is said that the Cookie lost her inner chewiness a long time ago... Even as she assists First Grain Cookie with helping the residents, Buckwheat Cookie\'s eyes occasionally reveal her true intentions.
If there is anything you need, let me know... But only me.
I\'ll make sure that nuisance Chickp... Wh-what?! Stop eavesdropping!
Like this... I\'ll be useful... right?
Oh... Hoo hoo? No, that\'s a weird way to laugh...
And so it begins... A new day...
*Sigh*... It\'s okay. You\'re the best, Buckwheat Cookie.
No... This can\'t... Not like this...
Is there anything I can help with? Tell me, but no one else, {0}...
Welcome to Buckwheat Cookie\'s Subtly Fragrant and Secret-filled Room!
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Buckwheat Cookie\'s soul. It has a subtle scent of ambition. Mmm... Delicious ambition!
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Space Doughnut. While it looks a bit different on the outside, it\'s just as sweet as every other Bear Jelly Toy!
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Buckwheat Cookie. The smile makes it seem like it\'s scheming something... But somehow it feels adorable?
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Devil Cookie. How could anyone hate that adorable, yet mischievous grin?
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Cherry Cookie. Every time you hug the toy it lets out a fresh, yet thrilling, scent.
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Strawberry Cookie. How could you not hug it when it looks at you with those sparkling eyes?
A memory of completing the Buckwheat Season Collection! With friends who believe in me, everything will work out fine!

Space Mini Ball was once the core of Space Doughnut. Truth be told, it is the brain of the duoquite literally so, as the brain had been in the core of the dough. This ambitious extraterrestrial pet dreams of one day conquering the universe with Space Doughnut.
A space rock that originated from a planet where the inhabitants are anything but flat. The burned areas give off a sweet fragrance.
A colorful package hailing from a distant world. Could it be a specialty of Space Doughnut\'s home planet? No one knows for sure, but the contents of the package does resemble Space Doughnut.

The perfect tool for pointing to distant places, picking up things from the ground, or just for reaching things without needing to get out of your bed. Rumors speak of a mysterious fourth way of using chopsticks... but that is a well-kept secret.
A bracelet created as a symbol of friendship between two Cookies. The chickpea added onto it is the highlight of its design.

Every now and then, rumors travel throughout the temple about how many hair accessories Buckwheat Cookie has. Sliced onions, seaweed powder, pickled radish... the list goes on. What will she wear tomorrow? We\'ll have to wait and see.
Buckwheat Cookie\'s Subtly Fragrant and Secret-filled Room

When entering Buckwheat Cookie\'s room, you are instantly greeted by a savory fragrance. Among the neatly organized work logs relating to the Temple of Abundance, it is said a diary lies hidden, containing correspondence with a certain someone, filled with the Cookie\'s true feelings.

A large flower pot filled with buckwheat noodles. This pot, decorated with sparkling gold dust, was apparently partly made by Buckwheat Cookie herself. The flowers adorning the noodles inside are sprinkled with dew drops, giving them an even fresher appearance!
A large flower pot filled with buckwheat noodles. The jade-colored pot makes the food inside look even more appetizing than usual. But even so, it\'s purely for decoration, so don\'t get any ideas!
A skillfully crafted bed that lets air flow through, keeping your body crispy and cool even during hot summer days.
A repurposed side dish container that\'s now being used as a storage cabinet. Thrifty, yet stylish!
Few have seen the beautiful design of this desk, as it seems to always be filled by endless amounts of work. Let\'s place it somewhere and start taking care of it, one scroll at a time!
A dressing table made out of a bowl? Simply... Soup-erb!
A hanger made out of spare chopsticks. With this, you can alleviate some of the burden of your laundry chair!
A teapot with pretty red flowers painted on the side. The perfect addition for a relaxing afternoon!

A large window with a view of the waning moon outside. Buckwheat Cookie says she often sits in front of this window late at night, lost in thought. Maybe one day, she will get to tell someone about how beautiful the moon is.
A shelf made for storing hair accessories. Let\'s put it up somewhere easy to reach!
A light green see-through curtain made out of radish. While it may not block sunlight, it does a great job at keeping the room humid and fragrant, while also being a beautiful piece of decoration!
Traditional lanterns hanging from the ceiling. Let\'s find a suitable room for them!
Decorative balls of buckwheat noodles hanging on a string. It is a trendy piece of decoration that doubles as a conversation starter!
A durable carpet made woven out of finely split bamboo. Let\'s find a good place to put it!
A smooth wall with a square pattern. Add this to a room to give it a more elegant look!
Beautiful flooring that has been polished to give off a smooth shine. The lack of even a single speck of dust speaks volumes about the personality of its resident.

Communication with this mysterious creature has proven to be a rather daunting task. Plus, they don\'t seem to remember where they came from and why. However, nothing stops us from befriending this adorable being even though we don\'t share the same language. And it seems like the Space Doughnut has made a bunch of flat friends here already!
Welcome to Space Doughnut\'s Chaotic and Fantastic Room!
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Space Doughnut\'s soul. Just looking at it makes you want to du-doa! Prrrp-prprp!
Space Doughnut\'s Chaotic and Fantastic Room

In Space Doughnut\'s room, colorful candies sparkle on the walls, and mysterious space music can be heard. If you peek into this chaotic yet fantastic room, you may get a glimpse of Space Doughnut\'s home, somewhere far, far away.
She always seems to be deep in thought recently.
Pardon me, Madam First Grain Cookie, but it appears that this season\'s harvest has not been as plentiful as we\'d hoped.
Perhaps there are a few more bushels that haven\'t arrived yet. My dear Moletatoes! Could you go and check, please?
Check for more bushels! Check, check, and haul!
Haul! Haul! Heave ho, heave ho!
Ah! Everything appears to be in proper order now! Thank you, Madam First Grain Cookie.
No need to thank me, dear.
Hello, my dear Chickpea Cookie! Is something wrong? How may I-
Madam First Grain Cookie. You wish to see Yummers, don\'t you? You should go pay a visit!
Pardon? I don\'t know what you-
You seem awfully lethargic lately. And I have noticed you seem to be sighing much more often of late.
Since order has been restored to the Temple of Abundance...
Why not take this opportunity to pay a visit? I am certain things will remain fine even in your absence.
But... If something were to happen to the temple...
Everything shall be right as rain.
We shall all keep a watchful eye on the temple until you return.
Thank you so very much, deary. Then I shall heed your advice and pay a brief visit.
Perhaps I should finish up my own chores and tasks before departing.
No need to dawdle! Chop chop, let\'s get going!
My, oh my! So this is Mount St. Cr?me.
Where is Yummers...? Should I ask for directions?
Oh my! What lovely timing. I was just wondering if I could ask you for some dir-
I have no recollection of anything before I... woke up here.
Oh deary, deary... I found myself in a similar predicament when I first woke up as well.
But to hear that she has completely forgotten everything is... Well, it\'s a shame.
... No, not a shame. It\'s disheartening.
Now, now! No need to frown. I can\'t bear to say anything with that expression on your face!
No. What you did for me in ages past... now, it\'s my turn.
Shall we start anew then? As it is our first time meeting in this setting, we can introduce ourselves for the first time here too.
I am First Grain Cookie, and I am here to visit Yummers.
This time, allow me to provide guidance.
I am glad to have met you... Back then and here now.
From the bottom of my heart...
I have also encountered First Egg Cookie...
But why would she behave in such a manner?
I do not know, but I\'ve a rising suspicion she wishes to exploit the Cookies of the First Batch with malicious intent.
And it is likely she will not stop with the First Batch...
Given what I know of her... You are no doubt her final target.
But I shall not burden you with such concerns at this moment...
Such talk is dreadfully dreary, is it not? Perhaps a change of subject! Tell me, have you met other Cookies?
Yes. Onyx Cream Cookie is a good friend, and recently, one called GingerBrave.
Ahha! Am I correct to assume you\'ve made more friends beyond those two?
What about the others? The other First Cookies?
I... You are the only one, aside from First Egg Cookie.
Deary, deary me! I am quite honored to hear so!
I still remember the first day we met.
I... I wish I could remember who you are.
Dear, dear, it\'ll come back to you someday. And besides, in the meantime, I can remember our past for the both of us for now.
Iz tht rlly yu? (Is that really you?)
Dearest Yummers! It\'s so good to see you again, my dear!
Ar yu hre ta see me? (Are you here to see me?)
Of course I am, little one! Oh, how I\'ve missed you so!
I mssd yu too! I thert I reconzed yr voe! (I missed you too! I thought I recognized your voice!)
Thers er ma snacks! (These are my snacks!)
Wr cn shr! Shrng iz crng! (We can share! Sharing is caring!)
Okay! You can sleep on half of my pillow, hehe.
How adorable! They seem to have become the best of friends.
Some among us shared such a relationship as well...
Sisters, in fact. First Salty Cookie and First Sugary Cookie were very close.
Oh, and how could I forget First Sprinkle Cookie and First Yeast Cookie! Deary, deary, the trouble they\'d get into together.
Ahhh... This reminds me of the good old days.
Now, now! No need to frown.
Even my memory isn\'t fully intact.
But perhaps all this talk of the past may help to spark some of those forgotten memories, for you and me both?
Ah! And if I were to encounter any other Cookies...
I promise to share as much as I can with you.
The more stories I share, the faster your memory might come back!
Deary, deary! There really is no need to thank me.
Welp! Look at the time! I really must get going now.
Frst Grn Cookie! Ar ye leevng? (First Grain Cookie! Are you leaving?)
Yes, I\'m afraid so. It\'s time for me to go home.
Wll yu b bak? (Will you be back?)
Of course I will, little one! Now, promise me that you\'ll stay best friends with GingerDozer and keep sharing your snacks too, okay?
Until then, I pray that you will fare well.
I, too, pray that you will fare well.
I look forward to the day we shall meet again.
I couldn\'t have asked for a more perfect send-off!

This beyond-state-of-the-art flying saucer is filled with sweet blueberry syrup! It looks like the pilot took the extra time to make it cozy with lemon, blueberry, and raspberry candies. The spacecraft looks ready to blast off at a moment\'s notice with all sorts of flashy, rainbow lights!

This beyond-state-of-the-art flying saucer is filled with strawberry syrup! Where did this spacecraft come from? Who is the pilot? Judging by the bright, blinking green light come from the lime candy, it looks like the spacecraft is preparing for launch?!
A wall that resembles layers of cake from an unknown red planet. It looks incredibly tasty!
A floor that resembles layers of cake from an unknown red planet. It looks somewhat sticky?

Underneath the flashing neon lights, small aliens gather around to commune and spend some time together. It looks as if they are winding down for the day in each other\'s company, but there\'s also a fiery discussion on how to shoot donut beams... Let\'s leave them to their conversation for now, shall we?
These neon lights shine brighter than all the stars in the night sky. Standing beneath it, you can\'t help but feel overjoyed and cheerful!

Some time ago, this jukebox was discovered in a crash alien spacecraft. Aliens from unknown origins seem to enjoy this piece of musical machinery very, very much. But whenever Cookies try to enjoy its music, they are left puzzled because there is no audible sound coming from its speakers. Perhaps the music is emitted at an entirely different frequency...

Dua-do-dua-dododonut! Is this the remnants of an emergency landing? Or perhaps a monstrous space creature took large chomp? Whatever happened, the porthole seems damaged... but it\'s still sturdy enough to show just how large and vast outer space can be!
A small stool. It serves its purpose.
A tiny model of a rocket. What a lucky find!
Germs are bad. This will definitely help keep the place clean.
A small pot. Let\'s put it to good use.
A donut porthole! What will we see outside?
A large carpet in the shape of a star. Let\'s put it somewhere nice!
Flashy dancing pads for everyday entertainment needs! What a lucky find!
A hanging mobile of alien planets. Looks otherworldly!
Stickers depicting all sorts of planets! Everyone loves these, especially since they glow in the dark!
A folding screen for some privacy. Let\'s put this to good use.
