Snow Sugar Cookie Bear Jelly Toy
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Mint Choco Cookie. You can faintly make out the graceful sound of a violin. And what a refreshing smile!
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Cocoa Cookie. The warm smile makes you feel like you\'re able to withstand the cold winter nights with only a cup of cocoa.
A Bear Jelly Toy with a design capturing the characteristics of Snow Sugar Cookie perfectly. When you gaze into its eyes, you feel as if you\'ve just made a new best friend.
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Poinsettia Cookie. When holding it close, you feel as if it will sing a song that will make you feel all warm and fuzzy inside.
A green bauble used to decorate trees. Looking at it puts your mind at ease.
A red bauble used to decorate trees. Looking at it makes you feel relaxed.
A decorative candy cane. Let\'s put it to good use!
An adorable star sleeping in a stocking. Ssshhh, don\'t wake them up!
This beautiful ornament depicts an evergreen tree covered in heavy snow. The decorations and twinkling star on top remind you that even the coldest winters can bring the warmest of memories.
Will I Ever Find Such a Thing?
Stardust Cookie has landed in the Syrup Garden. Rosemary Cookie and Radish Cookie are wary of his sudden arrival. Stardust Cookie reassures them he is not a villain!
With the misunderstanding cleared up, Stardust Cookie asks Rosemary Cookie about her sister, Radish Cookie. He learns that family is important and precious.

Rosemary Cookie cares for her sister immensely. Hearing this, Stardust Cookie wonders if the Wizards think the same of him. He continues his journey to seek answers, and to one day maybe find someone like family, important and precious.
Would You Consider a Duet... Oops!
Now\'s My Chance to Ask... Whoops!
Shall We Perform a Concert Together?

The festive winter holidays are here, and Poinsettia Cookie is getting ready to plan the perfect concert! But something is needed to make it absolutely perfect... She thinks Mint Choco Cookie\'s serenading violin is the answer, but he\'s too busy engaging with his fans to ask!
Poinsettia Cookie continues seeking a chance to ask Mint Choco Cookie to perform a concert together, but to no avail. In the end, she decides to just walk away...
Poinsettia Cookie is surprised to hear that Mint Choco Cookie has been searching for her. He pitches an idea to perform a duet together! Poinsettia Cookie eagerly agrees!

On a wintry evening, when the end of the year was just around the corner, delicate poinsettia leaves were added to a batch of dough. This Cookie was baked just as the snow began to blanket the world and enchanting songs echoed throughout the streets. Poinsettia Cookie is known to be deeply shy, and many around her claim to have never heard her voice. The few who have are unanimous in their praise! Poinsettia Cookie\'s voice is so divine and heavenly, even the free-spirited, restless Cream Roll Birds take the time to listen to her songs.
Only practice... can make a performance perfect.
AH! Nooo, you\'re not supposed to hear my song yet...!
I like the snow, especially when there\'s lots and lots.
Gifts...? I think I like warm, kindhearted words more than gifts...
I hope... that my singing can make the world a better place...
You make my heart feel so calm and warm, {0}...!
Poinsettia Cookie\'s Room of Holiday Melodies
Poinsettia Cookie\'s room is decorated with sparkly, colorful, and vibrant ornaments of all shapes and sizes. The festive melodies that fill the room will have you jumping for joy!
Poinsettia Cookie never leaves home without this red and green bead in her hair. It resembles a holiday ornament used to decorate trees.
Sheet music prepared by Poinsettia Cookie. She carefully studies and practices her music in preparation for special holiday performances. The frayed corners and edges show her commitment and effort!
Poinsettia leaves, strikingly crimson and bright, are always a cute addition to Poinsettia Cookie\'s outfits.

It is hard to say how long the lonesome speck of Cookie dough had been drifting in the vast emptiness of space before the radiance of nameless stars blessed it with the gift of life. Was it a mere coincidence...? For Stardust Cookie, the warmth of many suns was the heat of the oven, and the distant planets were his only companions in his light-speed journey across galaxies. Beckoned by shapeless, fleeting nebulae, guided by the whispering of the stars, Stardust Cookie headed to the City of Wizards to uncover the secret of his birth. Was he trying to find his long-lost purpose, or, on the contrary, escape his predetermined fate...? With a glint of a stray shooting star, this lonesome voyager crosses someone\'s sky tonight, seeking a place to call home.
I wonder where my birthplace is...
So many Cookies... gathered in one place...!
Have you ever seen the Sugar Swan in the night sky?
Traveling through the vast emptiness of space is not for everyone.
I am but a grain of sand in an ocean of stars.
The stars have led me to you, {0}.

Stardust Cookie\'s room looks as if it\'s somewhere deep within the swirling galaxy, where the soft whispers of stars can be heard through the night. When you\'ve been seeking for, longing for that missing something... this place offers you respite and a soothing, cosmic embrace.
As Stardust Cookie speeds through the galaxy like a meteor, stardust dances and sparkles in his wake. The shimmering glow reminds you of Stardust Cookie himself.
The cloak worn by Stardust Cookie. It is said that, when even the moonlight fades to darkness, this cloak will shine brightly and illuminate the way forward.
A small portion of a meteor that orbits Stardust Cookie. Apparently, it is the last portion of a meteor that burned in anger.
Welcome to Stardust Cookie\'s Starlight Sanctuary!
Hm... I seem to have ended up at the wrong destination.
Who are you? What is the meaning of this intrusion? And did you really fall from the sky just now?
This stranger is wary of me. I must explain myself, quickly.
Rosemary Cookie! Don\'t let your guard down!!!
If you hurt my sister, you\'ll regret it! Ya hear me?!
... I believe there has been a misunderstanding.
Perhaps I should work on my first impression...
... And that is how I have ended up here, simply at the wrong destination.
So that\'s what happened, huh? Haha!
My apologies. It seems there has been a misunderstanding on our part.
No. Your mentioning of the Reaper explains your initial reaction. You were right to be wary of strangers such as myself.
Welp, I\'m gonna take off! I\'ve got some gadgets that need fixin!
Oh! And welcome to the Syrup Garden! Hope ya can find some time to relax before you go!
Radish Cookie! Remember not to run too fast and please watch where you\'re going!
These two seem to be very close friends...
And the other, Radish Cookie. May I ask about the nature of your relationship...?
Radish Cookie is my younger sister.
Ah, you are siblings. Then she must hold a special place in your heart.
Yes, though her shenanigans have grown somewhat out of control lately.
How special is she to you?
Though I don\'t quite understand why you\'ve suddenly asked such a question...
I can tell you there is no one else like her in the world, and she is loved very much.
I guess you could say... I would do anything for her.
I would wake up from the deepest slumber, I would face any danger for her...
Radish Cookie is someone who I cannot imagine losing.
I wonder if my creators thought the same of me...
If it were me, I would.
I cherish my sister, my family... I care about them so much.
There is no reason for me not to feel the same for a creation.
Thank you. I shall now take my leave.
I do not know what your journey entails...
But good luck, and I hope you find what you seek.
Someone special and cherished... Do anything for them...
Okie-dokie! The songs for the holiday concert are officially... DONE!
I can\'t shake the feeling that something\'s missing though...
What is it? What could it be? Everyone\'s looking forward to this concert...
An instrument! The concert will be so much better with the sweet melodies of a violin...!
Yes! It\'ll be perfect...! I should ask Mint Choco Cookie immediately!
Hello, Mint Choco Cookie! Yet again, you\'ve delivered another amazing performance!
It was so mesmerizing, I wish to see it once more.
I could listen to your violin all day, for it is so enchanting.
May I please get your autograph?
I would like to discuss many things about music with you.
I wish to engage in a deep conversation about music with you.
I don\'t think I\'ll be able to get his attention right now... I\'ll approach him a bit later.
I felt someone\'s gaze upon me just now.
Oh! Mint Choco Cookie is alone!
What a wonderful show! You truly are a genius, an amazing maestro!
How about a shared stage, a duet between classical and rock! Please consider, we can do it whenever!
EEEK! This is so exciting! That performance will be a blast!
Will it be a concert or a party?! OOOH! We should get some glow sticks!
Oh no...! I have to ask this time. This is my last chance!
Would you please consider holding a recital at our hotel one day?
I am confident that our guests will be very happy to hear your performance.
Ah! If given the opportunity, it would be an honor.
He looks so busy again... Maybe it\'s rude of me to ask right now.
Okay. I guess I\'ll just have to it alone...!
Ah, pardon me. I\'ve just noticed a Cookie with whom I can hold an amazing concert.
Mm-hmm ? ? La la de la da la ?? ?
I have been seeking you, and just happened to hear your singing.
I knew it was you, Poinsettia Cookie.
Why is Mint Choco Cookie here...?
Wait! This is the perfect chance to ask him if he wants to join my concert!
Poinsettia Cookie. I am here because I wish to ask for a favor.
Yes. I believe your voice and my violin can create a lovely harmony.
Apologies for being so abrupt, but would you be interested in performing a duet for the winter concert?
Your lovely voice will certainly be able to create a memorable experience for the audience.
Yes! Of course! This is so amazing...!!!
Lovely! Then let us create the perfect duet, together.

It really is...! Each step feels heavier and heavier!
And... this place is a bit... creepy...
A hot and creepy place! What a change of scenery!
... Dude, I wouldn\'t quite put it that way.
What\'s with the gloominess all of a sudden? Where\'s that signature enthusiasm of y-
LOOK OVER THERE! It\'s a giant pile of chocolate!!!
Ah, there\'s the enthusiasm... as usual.
I get the feeling it might be less hot over there!
Maybe it\'s something like Mount St. Cr?me... where First Cream Cookie is...
That means we might find a Cookie of the First Batch there!
Speaking of... I wonder what sorta place it is?
Hm, I vaguely recognize it... Erm, what was it...?
Ah! Yes, thank you. The Chocosseum! Where only the strongest of warriors-
First Choco Cookie! The next training session will commence soon.
Oh? And who might these Cookies be?
I do not know, but it appears they seek to enter the Chocosseum.
Excuse me, but you seem to be mistaking us for some random rabble of amateur adventurers...
This is happening much more often of late, little Cookies trying to get into the Chocosseum...
It\'s a dangerous world out there, exponentially so in these lands.
More and more whelps like you seek the Chocosseum in droves... and you lot are, well...
When entering the Chocosseum, you must be prepared to abide by its laws.
What\'s that supposed to mean? What sort of laws?
Ahem! To put it simply, whelps do not belong in the Chocosseum!
Only those who have passed the Great Trial and proven their true strength can enter!
There\'s nothing wrong with a little confidence, hehe!
We should take this trial too!
Hold your horses...! Don\'t forget, our primary task is to find Cookies of the First Batch.
Yeah! We\'re looking for Cookies of the First Batch! Do you know anything about them?
I do not know why you seek the First Batch...
But I see no reason for me to tell you anything about them, especially to ones who are uninitiated.
Then could you tell us more about this Great Trial? We\'re allowed inside the Chocosseum if we pass it, right?
Indeed! If you pass the trial, you are initiated as a warrior of the Chocosseum!
So... What sort of trial is it...?
Ha! Let me enlighten you, ragtag whelps. Back in my day, the trial was next level! A fierce battle with the notorious Choco Golem in the arena!
Fighting to become the last warrior standing, victorious over all the other competitors...! What a rush!
Enough about the details, just tell us how to start!
Oh, did I not mention? You can\'t take the trial right now!
All slots have been filled! The trial is no longer accepting able-bodied contenders...
Okay... So when\'s the next one gonna be?
The Choco Golem will need repairs after the trial ends, and that takes time.
To put it simply, you have no choice but to wait until the next full moon!
Erm... Is there another way we could try?
You are left with only two choices.
You can either wait patiently for the next trial to commence.
Or you can leave this place, quietly.
We can\'t just sit idly by
Wow... Why\'s it so dark here?
It sounds like something is flowing beneath our feet... Watch your step, everyone.
And there\'s a cool breeze!!! It feels like the first time we all met!
I\'m still quite certain that \"chilly\" is the correct term.
Er, guys...? Where do you think those Cookies went...?
Did we lose track of them?
You might have lost track of us...
... But we have not lost track of you.
H-H-He\'s pointing a spear at us...!!!
Wait! We\'re not looking for a fight!
Then why are you following us?
No, nooo! Stop, Corn Choco Cookie!
It\'s baaad manners to threaten others with that spear of yours. We should hear them out fiiirst...!!!
Maybe this will help! Here, take it...!
A Life Potion? You\'re just... giving it away? To strangers like us?
Hurry and take it! It\'s okay!
It looks like it helped! Thank goodness! And there\'s no need to thank us.
We apologize for following you from afar. We were just a bit too eager to get this into your hands as quickly as possible.
My name\'s Melted Choco Cookie, and this is Corn Choco Cookieee...!
Are you... warriors of the Chocosseum...?
Nooot yet... Corn Choco Cookie has the right to become a warrior...
Not meee though... At least, not yet. This\'ll be my third tryyy...
Wow! You\'ve been through the trial three times?
It\'s... it\'s also my last chaaance...
Yeeeah. Only the strongest warriors earn the right to enter the Chocosseum...
Aaand if you can\'t pass the trial in three tries...
You\'re forbidden from entering the Chocosseum, for all eternity.
Notice how these lands are harsh and scalding...? Our existence is all about survival.
Yeah... It\'s really, really hot here.
And it\'s not just the heeeat...
There are scary Cookies that come out ooonly at niiight...
They aren\'t good talkers... or listeners, in fact... And did I mention they were very, veeery scary?
And it\'s all thaaanks to First Choco Cookie.
The Chocosseum is the only bastion of safety in this area.
Which is why so many of us seek entry... Perhaps too many.
That\'s why the laws about the Great Trial were maaade.
Ooonly the strongest warriors may enter the Chocosseum!
These underground cacaocombs are also protected by First Choco Cookie\'s power.
It\'s safer than most places, but we can\'t stay here for long.
Then that means... we should really find a safer spot, and quickly...
It seems that entering the Chocosseum will prove more difficult than we initially thought.
Oooh? You waaanna get into the Chocosseum too?
Yeah! We\'re helping a friend of ours in their search for the Cookies of the First Batch!
Maybe you can help us! Is there another way to get in the Chocosseum?
We\'re desperate for any information. If there\'s anything you can tell us, we\'d greatly appreciate it.
If I knew of an alternative, this little rascal would already be inside.
AAAll I have to do is pass the trial! Then I can help!
And I\'m quiiite sure that Corn Choco Cookie is willing to heeelp too...
Oh no! Melted Choco Cookie, you\'re starting to melt again...!
... You\'re in for a rough day tomorrow, so don\'t exhaust yourself.
Yeaaah... I guess you\'re right. I should get some rest.
You two seem like best friends!
We\'ve been friends for a long time now.
I hope he does well tomorrow... And if everything works out, maybe we can get inside too.
... I\'m pretty sure that\'s unlikely to happen.
I still remember the day I passed the trial...
It was Melted Choco Cookie who helped me succeed.
Just when I thought it was all over, he jumped in and saved my hide.
He must be really tough! Maybe he won\'t have a problem tomorrow?
I don\'t know how he survived... But it seemed like a one-time thing.
The truth is... Melted Choco Cookie is far too weak to pass the trial...
I plan to approach First Choco Cookie with a petition.
It\'s Melted Choco Cookie who deserves to be in the Chocosseum, not me...
He\'s the one who protected me, and his sacrifice deserves recognition.
But that means... the two of you will be separated...
Whatever happens, only one of us will get to stay in the Chocosseum.
And whoever is granted entry, you\'ll still receive the help you need.
So... Let\'s pretend this conversation never happened, okay?
That\'s enough for now. Keep an eye on him for me, will you?
Like I said before, we aren\'t completely safe here.
I\'m going to scout the area. So stay with him until I get back.
Indeed. We\'ve found ourselves in quite the sad and- Eh?
I couldn\'t sleep... Maybe it\'s because of the trial tooomorrow...
Honestlyyy... I sortaaa knew this would happen...
I know I\'m weeeak... And it\'s sad...
But Corn Choco Cookie said... you protected him...
Yeah! You might be stronger than you think!
Naaah... I know who I am and what I can do...
I just got lucky that tiiime... I mean, look at me. I can\'t even hold a weapon properlyyy...
Hey, c\'mon now! Don\'t say that...
Self-reproach is not the greatest of habits.
But it\'s truuue... Only Cookies like me know what it\'s really like to be weeeak...
My body is all wimpyyy... and meltyyy... I can\'t do-
Look at me! I\'m not strong either.
I\'m not great at anything, and I don\'t have awesome abilities either!
But there\'s one thing I\'ve learned. Even in the hardest situations...
There\'s always the option to never give up, to keep going.
And when you don\'t give up, you\'re always going to end up finding an answer sooner or later!
Yup! And this sounds like a job for all of us! We\'ll think of something, together!
Yeah...! There has to be a way...!
You reeeally think I have a shot...?
The thing is... I really do
What were you up to last night...?
How\'re you going to fight if you\'re this exhausted?
Hm... I can do this...! Leeet\'s go!
Whoa... There\'s so many Cookies here!
I believe this is the first time we\'ve seen such a bustling crowd...!
So you need to be the last Cookie standing... to enter the Chocosseum...?
They all look tough and strong!
It\'s okay! Melted Choco Cookie can handle it, no problem!
I... I think... Maybe I should quit whiiile I\'m ahead...
Hey! Don\'t be a coward! Just relax and take a deep breath.
Whatever happens, everything\'ll be okay, got it?
So just get out there, don\'t get hurt, and come back in one piece!
You can do it, Melted Choco Cookie.

The Chocosseum will no longer cast out the uninitiated!

On the Way to Meet a First Batcher
An intruder has appeared in First Choco Cookie\'s room?! First Choco Cookie demands the intruder to reveal their identity, but the mysterious Cookie wants to avoid all contact. How intriguing...!
Werewolf Cookie is afraid that he might hurt First Choco Cookie. But his concern and demeanor only makes First Choco Cookie become more intrigued!
Desperate to keep his distance, Werewolf Cookie makes a run for it. First Choco Cookie commands her guards to seek him out... She will not rest until he is made a true warrior of the Chocosseum.
First Choco Cookie Bear Jelly Toy
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles First Choco Cookie. Despite the fact that it\'s a toy, it\'s proving difficult to approach it. Maybe it\'s the icy steel gaze... Or the intimidating armor...
Proof of completing the First Choco Collection. Always remember to acknowledge individuality as sign of strength, not weakness.
First Choco Cookie\'s Room of Absolute Strength

The strongest of warriors never slack off. They give it their all in everything they do, from training to rest! First Choco Cookie\'s room exudes an aura of discipline and authority that overwhelms most ordinary Cookies. Even after the warriors of the Chocosseum have completed their training, you can hear the clashing of steel against wood as First Choco Cookie continues her training throughout night and day.
A crown adorned with chocolate wingsa symbol of absolute victory. None dare to stand before this emblem without bowing their heads in reverence.
A brooch gleaming with the unyielding resolve of First Choco Cookie. It is a symbol of her conviction and vow to never lose anyone again.
A pair of colossal swords, said to have protected countless lives amidst an endless war. Only the mightiest of champions can wield these blades, as ordinary Cookies cannot even lift them.

A lone cacao tree once stood amidst a forgotten battlefield. The flames of war provided it with light, and blades of steel nourished its roots. It was beneath this solitary tree where First Choco Cookie slowly opened her eyes for the first time. Wielding enchanted blades that respond to her commanding voice and to her alone, this merciless warrior can cut through legions of enemies with ruthless precision and speed, leaving none in her wake. Her strength alone is enough to pummel enemy strongholds into gravel and graves. Though her unflinching gaze and cold demeanor can send shivers down the spines of even the bravest Cookies, hidden beneath the cacao nib armor lies a sweet and tender heart.

This Cookie\'s dough was made by mixing various flavors and types of chocolate, from sweet, melt-in-your-mouth to bitter and rich. But... perhaps the oven wasn\'t burning hot enough for a proper baking. Unlike most Cookies, whenever Melted Choco Cookie is exposed to even the slightest bit of warmth, he slowly melts into a soft, gooey mess. As he often finds himself melting away and slouching down, he believes himself to be a feeble nobody... Not to worry though! He just hasn\'t realized his own incredible potential! Just like flowing water can take any form, having a body of melted chocolate means this Cookie\'s soft and oozy dough harbors limitless possibilities just waiting to be uncovered!
Do you have something you wish
My... past? I refuse to remember
... This will not be my end.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of First Choco Cookie\'s soul. It emanates an immeasurable amount of courage and charisma.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of Melted Choco Cookie\'s soul. It\'s warm to the touch... and very cute and squishy too!
Welcome to First Choco Cookie\'s Room of Absolute Strength
The Cookies have arrived to the fabled Chocosseum. What lies in store for them here? As they discuss their next move, a strange Cookie approaches them!
Our friends have a hunch that there is a Cookie of the First Batch in the Chocosseum. But entry is only granted to those who have passed the Great Trial!
The Cookies declare they want to participate in the Great Trial, but they can\'t! The next trial won\'t be held for several days... Is there no other way?
The Cookies, who are unable to participate in the trial, are disheartened. But they discover a pair of Cookies who are talking about the trial! The two look injured too... Time to lend them a hand!
Our heroes share a Life Potion with their newly-met friend, Melted Choco Cookie. He tells them about the Chocosseum, the trial, and its laws as a gesture of thanks.
The Chocosseum is a safe haven within a harsh land and many are eager to enter. Melted Choco Cookie promises to help the Cookies enter the Chocosseum, provided he passes the trial first...
Corn Choco Cookie believes that Melted Choco Cookie will not be able to pass the trial and is willing to relinquish his spot in the Chocosseum...

Melted Choco Cookie is sad that Corn Choco Cookie is willing to sacrifice his hard-earned spot in the Chocosseum. Melted Choco Cookie blames his frail body for everything... But GingerBrave steps in with a few encouraging words!
Melted Choco Cookie, invigorated by GingerBrave\'s words, is willing to try his best in tomorrow\'s trial. But until then... it\'s time for some last-minute training!
The Great Trial of the Chocosseum has begun! Melted Choco Cookie enters the arena, head held high with confidence! But that confidence doesn\'t last long...
Melted Choco Cookie has been disqualified from the trial. Corn Choco Cookie is about to step in and sacrifice his spot... but the Choco Golem malfunctions and begins to spread havoc!

Chaos erupts in the Chocolosseum as the Choco Golem goes berserk! Though he is convinced he is incapable of protecting or helping anyone, Melted Choco Cookie makes a decision. No matter what happens, he will try to protect his friends!
It turns out that Melted Choco Cookie\'s soft and oozy body is the perfect defense against the Choco Golems attacks! But it looks like he won\'t be able to hold out any longer...!
That was a close call! Just as Melted Choco Cookie was about to succumb to the Choco Golem\'s final strike, First Choco Cookie swoops in to save him! The day is saved...!!!
First Choco Cookie expresses her gratitude and respect for Melted Choco Cookie\'s selfless courage. As she looks upon him, she is reminded of her past...
First Choco Cookie discovers the Choco Golem has been tampered with... How nefarious! But before she begins a detailed investigation, she announces several changes to the laws of the Chocosseum.
GingerBrave and friends finally get the chance to meet another Cookie of the First Batch. But what\'s this? The guards in front of First Choco Cookie\'s chambers have been incapacitated?
We\'re too late! The First Batcher has been kidnapped by First Egg Cookie...! Our friends make a promise to First Choco Cookie... A promise to find the missing Cookie!
A bed decorated to symbolize the golden achievement of victory. Somehow, it seems like the bed will only welcome those who have never lost in battle.
A bed decorated to symbolize victory. The sweet aroma of its covers are enough to melt away the fatigue of training all day.
A symbol of eternal conquest and triumph. May the swords of the Paragon carry you to victory!
A window modeled after First Choco Cookie\'s helmet. Standing in front of the window makes you want to deliver a noble and uplifting speech.
A crest forged from molten chocolate of many flavors. It is said that merely gazing upon this symbol is enough to strike terror into the hearts of your opponents.
A chandelier made from the same material as the Chocosseum\'s walls. How is it not melting...?
Wallpaper made from thick panels of sturdy chocolate. These panels are durable and soundproof, providing a perfect environment for some intense training session!
Flooring made from thick panels of sturdy chocolate. The patterns are simple and clean. They seem to reflect the owner\'s discipline and charisma.
A reminder of a hard-earned victory. Just looking at it fills your heart with pride.
A symbol of a warrior\'s discipline. Where should we put this?
A collection of weapons, worn and battered due to many training sessions. What a lucky find!
A garland that fills your heart with the pride of triumph. It goes well wherever you place it.
A clean carpet with crisp corners and edges. Simply putting it in a room makes it look more elegant.
A stool to use for a moment\'s rest. It serves its purpose.
A training dummy that has been used for many training sessions. What a lucky find!
A small table with nutritious snacks. You can\'t train on an empty stomach!
Choco braziers lit with intense flames. How are they not melting?

Nooo...! I used that for taaarget practice...!
I can\'t believe this is what you\'ve been doing! Spending your free time to make all this shabby training gear?

Melted Choco Cookie\'s Ooey Gooey Melty Room

Melted Choco Cookie\'s room is decorated with many varieties of chocolate, both solid and gooey! Having a training dummy and ice cream target in his room makes one thing clearMelted Choco Cookie\'s desire to grow stronger is as rich as the chocolate in his dough!

A towering choco cake topped with colorful fruits and even more chocolate. The cream is piled so high it looks like it might slide off at any moment. But worry notit\'s sturdier than it looks. When you step inside, you\'re immediately wrapped in the comforting and tasty aroma of rich chocolate that seems to melt away all your problems.

A towering choco cake topped with even more chocolate. The cream is piled so high, it looks like it might slide off at any moment. But worry notit\'s sturdier than it looks. When you step inside, you\'re immediately wrapped in the comforting and tasty aroma of rich chocolate that seems to melt away all your problems.
A thick, chocolate fondue fountain. Watching the silky chocolate trickle and flow down is mesmerizing. Resisting the urge to dip everything you can into the fountain is extremely difficult.
A practice target made of layered, gooey chocolate ice cream. It looks like it\'s already starting to melt... Better throw a spear and get some training in before it\'s completely gone!

A statue of a mighty warrior, carved from a single block of solid chocolate. Its glossy, polished surface almost seems to radiate strength and pride. Perhaps it\'s a reflection of one\'s deep desire to grow stronger.
A hanging mobile with various berries dipped in chocolate. It emits a fruity and sweet aroma that can make anyone drool...

A wall of simple squares of chocolate organized into an orderly pattern. It may look rigid and uninteresting at first glance, but a sweet, enticing aroma drifting through the air adds a smidgen of charm.

A floor of flowing chocolate, layered in rich, gooey sweetness. Each color is said to be a different type and flavor of chocolate! And no, it\'s not weird if you have an urge to dip a spoon in it for a taste...
A training dummy that seems a bit too soft and flimsy... I guess it serves its purpose...?
A chair that\'s been... bitten? By whom? Regardless, it\'s actually quite comfy!
Curtains made from melting chocolate. Looking at it puts your mind at ease.
A lamp decorated with dripping chocolate. This will look great wherever you decide to put it!
A rug made from chocolate waffles. Any room would look cozier with it!
A fence made from tough chocolate wafers. Anyone would like this!
Shields with simple patterns. Looking at it makes you feel strong.
A marshmallow stool. It serves its purpose.
A collection of frames with symbols found in the Chocosseum. What a lucky find!

A fluffy and cozy sweater made from the softest marshmallows. No matter how many times Melted Choco Cookie trips and falls or bumps into things, this super-soft and surprisingly durable sweater always cushions the blow!

A chocolate shield that hasn\'t been hardened or reinforced. It\'s still a bit too soft to withstand heavy blows... Despite its flaws, Melted Choco Cookie is proud to have created this shield himself in preparation for entering the Chocosseum!

A sharp chocolate spear tip attached to a wafer pole. It looks formidable and somewhat intimidating at first, but on closer inspection... Well, let\'s just say it probably won\'t be so useful after a few swings.
Melted Choco Cookie Bear Jelly Toy
A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles Melted Choco Cookie. When you give it a big, warm hug, it feels extra squishy and oh-so-soft!
Proof of completing the Melted Choco Collection. Even the gooiest and softest of Cookies can have a will stronger than iron!
Welcome to Melted Choco Cookie\'s Ooey-Gooey Choco Room!

Lately, Melted Choco Cookie has been training hard, growing stronger and brimming with newfound confidence. Curious about his training regimen, Corn Choco Cookie decides to visit Melted Choco Cookie\'s room!

Corn Choco Cookie witnesses Melted Choco Cookie\'s so-called \"training\" unfold... It\'s definitely not what he imagined. How is anyone supposed to become a strong warrior with such soft and squishy equipment?!
Corn Choco Cookie points out ever flaw in Melted Choco Cookie\'s training regimen, one by one. It looks like the road to becoming a strong warrior is still going to be a long and arduous journey...

A circus sounds like so much fun! We should go and watch!
With a crowd this big, there\'s bound to be a Cookie who knows about the First Batch!
Welcome, welcome! The show is about to begin!
The one and only, always hilarious and brilliantly entertaining First Sprinkle Cookie will perform an all-new act!
Oh no! My drumstick! Someone please grab that runaway drumstick for me!!!
HEEHEE!!! I\'ll get it for ya, Cream Donut Cookie!
Oh...! There\'s a small Cookie over there.
Is it just me, or does that Cookie bear a striking resemblance to GingerDozer?
I\'VE SEEN EVERY ONE OF YOUR SHOWS!!!
Thank you, thank you! Just wait a bit and you\'ll get to see a circus show filled with nothing but glee!
Looks like we found First Sprinkle Cookie!
Our super-duper important guest should be inside, not outside! C\'mon, let\'s head on in!
First Sprinkle Cookie! Wait a sec!
Teehee! No time to delay! Our show\'s gonna be fun in the most thrilling of ways!
Greetings, wayfarers. My name is Ring Candy Cookie. Is this your first visit to our glorious circus?
Yeah! We wanted to ask First Sprinkle Cookie something, but she just walked away!
Ah, so she\'s done it again it seems.
Don\'t think too much about it. After all, the greatest show of all history awaits you!
This is a paradise of entertainment, the one-and-only Sprinkling-
The genius performer and creator of laughter, the one-and-only First Sprinkle Cookie\'s \"Sprinkling Circus of Laughs\"!
There\'s nothing she can\'t do! You name it, she\'s done it! The trapeze, ribbon dances, magic tricks, juggling stunts, and-
Yes, many, oh so many tricks and stunts. Everyone who was eager to watch her performances have gathered together to create this circus.
But not everyone\'s able to put on an amazing show, hehehe!
Ain\'t that right, Cream Donut Cookie? All the little birdies are saying you lost your drumstick again, HA!
I... I\'m squeezing in as much practice as I can...! I just need a bit more time.
Cease your hurtful taunting, Jelly Bean Cookie.
Hehehe... Just jokin\' around with my favorite pal is all!
About the Cookie who went inside the tent with First Sprinkle Cookie... Are they a Cookie of the First Batch?
Eh? I\'m not familiar with this so-called \"First Batch\"... But we call the little one \"Giggles\".
Everyone here is quite fond of her. There was an attempted kidnapping a while back, which is why the whole circus is taking extra precautions.
Giggles even laughs at Cream Donut Cookie\'s act!
Fine, fine! It\'s always me who gets nagged at... PFT!
I saw a giant shadow the day of the kidnapping... It looked like a bird with no beak or legs...
I really hope nothing happens to Giggles...
The situation is being handled. After all, we are all on the lookout for anything suspicious.
A failed kidnapping...? Do you think it might\'ve been, you know... First Egg Cookie...?
The failure works in our favor. We\'d better get Giggles out of here, and quickly!
Ring Candy Cookie\'s trampoline act was amazing!!!
Did you see how majestic he looked up in the air? So shiny and dazzling!!!
Look at that! A Banana Dolphin is juggling!!!
WOW! They make it look so easy!
I particularly enjoyed the Giant Corn\'s feats of strength!
Oh yeah! Me too! They lifted heavy candies like it was cotton candy!
Hold onto your popcorn! The real show\'s just begun!!!
I\'ve been practicing my latest trick for AGES!
But, alas... Everyone\'s been having so much fun! It seems there\'s no need for my trick...
Aw... Now I\'m sad... I don\'t have the strength to hang on...
She\'s gonna fall from the trapeze...!!!
I... I knew she wasn\'t going to fall...
I saw you cover your eyes, hehe...
I\'m in the mood for something more fun! I think I\'ll sit with the audience now.
Eh? Is the show over already?
Haha, that\'s First Sprinkle Cookie for ya! So unpredictable!
Well? What\'re y\'all waiting for? The show must go on!
Okie-dokie! It\'s time for ME to take the stage!
Audience! I\'ve placed whoopee cushions under several of your seats, teehee!
It\'s your job to guess which sounds came from whoopee cushions... and which sounds are real! TEEHEEHEE!
Whaaat? That\'s all you\'ve got? BOOORING!
The cheeky trumpeting you let out in the break room yesterday was funny! Do THAT again!
Heeey, cut it out! You\'re just jealous that I\'ll steal your spotlight one day!
Everyone knows Giggles does all the work by starting the laughs and cheers! If I had Giggles for my act, then-

I guess that roasting routine was part of the show too?
That has to be scripted, right?
If it is, they\'re really good actors! Everything felt so real!
C\'mon! Isn\'t there a performer here who\'ll show us something new?!
Even First Yeast Cookie could put on a funnier show than whatever THAT was supposed to be.

Oh, so now you need my help?

Oh, I\'m... No, I don\'t think so.
... First Sprinkle Cookie doesn\'t care how we feel. We\'re nothing more than just props for her to juggle and throw around!
I... I love the circus. But I don\'t want to be a part of something so embarrassing and heartbreaking.
There you are, Cream Donut Cookie. You must have been terrified. I promise to stop such antics before they even begin.
First Sprinkle Cookie is well-versed in tricks and stunts, but not so much about the feelings of others.
I hope you can find it in your heart to move past this accident as well...
After all, you still admire First Sprinkle Cookie\'s performances and tricks, don\'t y-
I... I don\'t wanna talk about it right now.
Wait, Cream Donut Cookie! And... he\'s gone once more.
Wow... What a great, comforting speech. Kudos...
What did you mean when you said First Sprinkle Cookie doesn\'t know much about feelings...?
Good or bad, right or wrongsuch things do not reside in her mind. I try my best to talk things through, but...
... In the end, I too am just a mere performer. My words do not carry much weight.
Yes, but I cannot divulge any more information. This is First Sprinkle Cookie\'s story to share, not mine.
I have a favor to ask. I need to get ready for the next act... Could you find Cream Donut Cookie for me? For the circus?
I shall keep my word and introduce you to Giggles after the next act.
Of course! Don\'t worrywe\'ll find Cream Donut Cookie!

You little pipsqueak, I was here first. I oughta... Wait.
... Cream Donut Cookie, I totally get how you\'re feeling.

You\'ve noticed it too, right? How First Sprinkle Cookie treats us like crumbs and scraps, thrown out onto the stage whenever she feels like it.
Crumbs...? That\'s... going a bit too far.
C\'mon, you know what I\'m talking about here. She made a fool out of you!!! Don\'t ya wanna get even?
Listen closely. I\'m gonna play a prank on First Sprinkle Cookie when she\'s on stage!
All I need is for you to bring Giggles here and hide behind this pile of balloons.
If everything works out, we\'ll have the last laugh!
I... I don\'t think this is a good idea... What if-
She wasn\'t laughing at our performance. She was laughing AT US! Now, it\'s her turn to feel what it\'s like.
I\'m not asking ya to do anything super difficult, am I? All you need to do is get Giggles and keep her safe, right here!
What the...? We need to start the next act! Where\'s Cream Donut Cookie?!
Hm... The travelers still haven\'t found him?
What gives? Why isn\'t the next act starting?
Ring Candy Cookie! Just get the show started already!
Everyone! Ladies and gentlemen! The show begins... NOW!
What\'s that? Is that a feathered ball? Is this some sort of new balloon trick?
Who cares! It\'s new! It\'s fresh! Hurry up and get on with the show! ENTERTAIN US, woohoo!
Focus your eyes on this mysterious sphere, my friends!
Find the Cookie of the First Batchthe one who possesses ancient strength...!
I bet the audience is mocking
I should\'ve stayed with the troupe...!
Who ruined our perfect circus?! Get out here, NOW!!!
I\'ll smash your eggshells into smithereens and use the fragments to tile the circus\' kitchen floors!!!
UNFORGIVABLE! This is MY stage! This is MY circus! THIS IS MY TROUPE!
Why? Why are you doing this to me? After all the teasing and mocking, you\'re now helping me?
Do you want me to hate you or like you? I can\'t tell anymore!
Cream Donut Cookie! The drums, teehee! Your drums!
First Sprinkle Cookie showing off some new tricks, teehee!
She needs music! Your music will make her tricks so much more fun!
I barely have enough power for acrobatics and tricksnow I have to waste it on you PESTS?!
Is that... Cream Donut Cookie\'s drums?
It\'s Cream Donut Cookie and Giggles! We found them!
Hang in there, First Sprinkle Cookie!
Let\'s put on a show they\'ll never forget!
Do you hear... drums? Are they performing right now?
I... I\'m not sure. It kinda sounds like they\'re fighting!
This isn\'t the time to play your drums, Cream Donut Cookie! Get yourself to safety!
No! I... I\'m gonna keep playing... for First Sprinkle Cookie!
I still think she\'s super annoying and doesn\'t care about our feelings. And I hate heights. And I\'m bad at tricks.
But I still love watching First Sprinkle Cookie perform!
TEEHEEHEE! Keep going, Cream Donut Cookie! You got this, First Sprinkle Cookie!
See, Giggles is laughing! It IS a performance!
I guess so! But the fighting seems... so real!
Look! Thanks to Giggles, the audience is starting to have fun!
Keep drumming, Cream Donut Cookie! Your drumbeat is what makes everything a real performance!
Eh? Why\'s the audience coming back?
Perfect! Cookies and critters, ladies and gentlemen! I\'ll give you the honor of becoming part of this brand-new show!!!
Warning. Warning. Difficulty of retrieval has increased exponentially. Retreat advised.
You\'ll regret this... First Sprinkle Cookie...
I dunno what sort of weird scheme you\'re planning. But go tell whoever sent you THIS!
If you show your face near my circus, or send your lackeys anywhere near my troupe...
I\'ll personally dunk you into rancid milk and knead you back into the rotten dough you were made from! Do you hear me, First Egg Cookie?!
And THAT, my friends, was the perfectly fun finale!
It all seemed so real! That was the best performance ever! Bravo, Cream Donut Cookie! Brava, First Sprinkle Cookie!
She was hiding out back. I shall venture a guess and say she did not expect such an... escalated level of turmoil.
Let\'s, erm... Have her remain silent for now.
I don\'t get it! Why\'d you do this?
You joined our circus because you like fun! You like making others laugh! So why go out of your way to ruin everything?!
Erm, you know... Your circus is really fun. But sometimes, the troupe can get... you know, sad or tired...
The circus might be precious, but so are your friends! You need to treasure them, cherish them!
Circus performers are supposed to feel sad and tired sometimes. It\'s all part of the deal, isn\'t it?
Wait, what are you talking about? You always look so happy and energetic when you\'re performing!
Because I have to! I\'m the ringmaster! I... I wasn\'t always like this when I was just a performer.
Nobody helped or said anything when I messed up. When I got scolded, when I got laughed at, and I didn\'t complain.
Because that\'s just how things were. Even if I was hurt after a show... even when I cried when no one was looking.
Whatever happened... The most important thing was that everyone had a good time!
That\'s why, when I became a Cookie... When I finally got the chance to make my own circus, I thought it was the best thing in the world...
Now that I\'m ringmaster, I thought, no matter what happens, I\'d never let anything bring me down. No more boredom, sadness, or anger...
But when I look back... even when I thought I was happy, I was still sad. When every day was filled with laughter, my heart felt empty.
Is it because I don\'t understand the meaning of... cherishing?
First Sprinkle Cookie... Cookies can also feel boredom, sadness, and... even anger.
Those emotions are what help us find something precious to hold onto. And we work hard to protect it.
When you realize something is truly precious, even when you\'re sad, you\'ll see that all the world is still one big, exciting stage with so many things waiting for you!
All the world\'s... a stage...? Like, a circus?
Someone told me something like that once. Who was it...? She was... a witch? Dressed in white? I don\'t remember...
So, like, how do you make something precious? How do you treasure and cherish someone???
... Cream Donut Cookie. I believe First Sprinkle Cookie is ready to listen to what\'s in your heart.
I love the circus. I love how happy it makes the audience. I love how happy it makes me and everyone in the troupe.
But... I don\'t want to perform if it\'s gonna be filled with sadness, anger, or embarrassment all the time...
This circus, Giggles, your performances and dazzling tricks...?  Everything is precious... I love everything and everyone here.
So, I guess what I\'m saying is... We adore and respect you, and we want you to think the same of us.
... I still don\'t really know what that means and I don\'t know how to do that.
And we are proud to join you in every step of the way.
Besides... When it comes to learning new tricks, you\'re a very fast learner.
Oh, we totally forgot about her.

My place is here, at the circus.
Everyone\'s waiting for the perfect show.
I\'ll make everyone laugh no matter what!

So you were sneaking around my room looking for some special secret to my circus acts?
Yeah... I didn\'t mean... Well, I just wanted to... I just wanna be the best circus performer ever...
Haha! Why didn\'t you say so?!

Hey! Are you listening, Jelly Bean Cookie?

Jelly Bean Cookie, eager to learn First Sprinkle Cookie\'s secrets to performing the perfect acts and tricks, sneaks into her room to see if she has any secrets or hidden techniques. But First Sprinkle Cookie find her sneaking around!

Surprisingly, First Sprinkle Cookie is more than happy to share her secret. She explains how her bed resembles a stage, which helps her practice when she\'s sleeping. She also claims to spend every waking moment practicing tricks and stunts. As Jelly Bean Cookie listens to First Sprinkle Cookie\'s so-called \"secrets\", her face grows pale...

Unable to handle a life where every single minute involves practicing new tricks, Jelly Bean Cookie makes a run for it. First Sprinkle Cookie searches high and low for her. In a moment of sheer \"luck\", Jelly Bean Cookie comes across Cream Donut Cookie and shoves him forward to become a decoy as she makes her great escape!

One night, the moon glowed like a grand circus spotlight. As the night deepened, a Cookie woke up to a dazzling spectaclehundreds of sprinkles shimmering inside a glass jar bathed in the moonlight. That night marked First Sprinkle Cookie\'s rise to fame, the one-and-only grand ringmaster of the Sprinkling Circus of Laughs, a performer like no other in all history! With a flick of the wrist and a twirl in midair, she weaves magic and laughter, drawing gasps and cheers from every audience in every performance. Through every moment, through every hardship, she never fails to bring joy and wonder to all who step into her circus. And so, legend has it that no Cookie, dessert, or critter has ever left her show without bursting into laughter!

First Sprinkle Cookie\'s Room of Dazzling, Jumbling Colors

First Sprinkle Cookie\'s room is littered... or adorned... with all sorts of fancy circus props. Everything in this whirlwind of supplies serves a purpose in her pursuit to invent dazzling new tricks, dream up the greatest performances, and choreograph the fanciest of stunts. Any Cookie who steps into her room can\'t help but be captivated by all the fancy, funny toys!

Why would anyone want to sleep in a normal, boring bed? Why not fall asleep with a heart full of fun and joy?! This circus tent-shaped bed, decorated with sprinkles and balloons, is as lively as the circus stage! If you fall asleep here, you just might dream of becoming the star of the circus, basking in the cheers of a delighted audience!

Why would anyone want to sleep in a normal, boring bed? Why not fall asleep with a heart full of fun and joy?! This circus tent-shaped bed, decorated with sprinkles and balloons, reminds you of the circus stage. If you fall asleep here, you just might dream of stepping onto the stage to deliver a dazzling show!
This box is chock-full of props, toys, and supplies. Whenever you need to come up with a new act, look no further! You\'ll always be able to find something useful!

A clown hat that has become worn down by many fun-filled performances. But whenever it hits the dazzling stage lights, it magically appears to look brand new! It\'s said that every time you see this hat on stage, the joyful memories of your first circus act will come rushing back.
A vessel holding a variety of colorful sprinkles. Are you bored? Then give it a shake? Does your wall seem bland? Then hang it up!
A vibrant sign used to guide crowds to the circus entrance. The twinkling lights seem almost hypnotic and magical as you find yourself walking towards it!
Bedazzle your guests with this cute and happy wall! The sprinkles will give your walls some extra flair!
The moment you step on this floor, you feel a rush of excitement. And a strong urge to dance!
A hat that contained a lot of confetti and ribbons. Let\'s put it to good use.
A Bear Jelly Toy with a gift for acrobatics and circus acts. What a lucky find!
A breathtaking display of accuracy. Let\'s try not to break the thrower\'s concentration...
An adorably decorated trapeze. Where should we put this?
A circus ring made from rope. Where should we put this?
An elephant plush with a ball and hat balanced on top. Be careful when moving it elsewhere!
A vibrant sign used to guide crowds. It goes well wherever you palce it.
With a single pop, confetti and sprinkles rain down upon you! What a find!
A garland fit for a circus. Let\'s put it here and there.
Each individual sprinkle on this ribbon has been placed with utmost precision and care. It only takes a single twirl and a twist to grab the attention of everyone in the audience.
This massive clown\'s hat shines brilliantly under the stage lights. If you put this on, there\'s just no way the audience can ignore you!
A true circus performer must be ready to take the stage at any moment! This collection of theatrical makeup and accessories ensures the perfect look before stepping into the spotlight.

A Bear Jelly Toy that greatly resembles First Sprinkle Cookie. All it takes is just one look into its sparkling eyes, and you can\'t help but burst out into laughter.
Proof of completing First Sprinkle Cookie\'s collection. A life with treasured moments and precious friends is greater than any joyous show at a circus.
This mysterious drop holds a piece of First Sprinkle Cookie\'s soul. When holding it, you\'re filled with a sense of overwhelming glee.
Welcome to First Sprinkle Cookie\'s Room of Dazzling, Jumbling Colors!
Firecrackers used to celebrate the 1st Anniversary. Looks like they were put to good use!
A special parfait made for the 1st Anniversary. What a lucky find!
An adorable cupcake featuring a bat. Everyone loves these!

From the moment we opened our eyes in the scorching oven to the countless adventures we\'ve had so far exploring every corner of Witch\'s Castle, this candy basket is a gift for all of our dear friends who have been with us for every step! There joyful days, but also some difficult ones... Yet we faced them together as friends! Here\'s to many more adventures and fun days ahead!

A spoonful of memories. Two pinches of powdered happiness. And a dash of thrill and excitement from our adventures in the Witch\'s Castle. Mix them all together, and voil?! This cake fills your mouth with a rich flavor that reminds you of the countless sweet and happy memories you\'ve made with the Cookies over the past year!

No more tickets left for the circus? Don\'t be sad! A roaming stage awaits, just for you! Watch as the Banana Dolphin juggles with spectacular precision! Before you know it, your feet will start tapping and your hands will clap along to this amazing juggler\'s rhythm!

No more tickets left for the circus? Don\'t be sad! A roaming stage awaits, just for you! Watch as the Balloon Clown twists and transforms into all sorts of shapes and sizes in the blink of an eye! Before you know it, the frown on your face will change into a beaming smile!

No more tickets left for the circus? Don\'t be sad! A roaming stage awaits, just for you! Watch as the Giant Corn performs mighty feats of strength that will make anyone\'s jaw drop to the floor! Before you know it, you\'ll be wanting to see what else this performer can bend, break, and lift!

The Greatest Show is About to Begin!
What Does it Mean to Treasure Something?
For More Fun, For Better Fun

Our friends have discovered the fabled Sprinkling Circus of Laughs, where the legendary First Sprinkle Cookie performs with her troupe! But First Sprinkle Cookie just leaves before they can ask about Cookies of the First Batch! As they watch her vanish into the circus tent, they catch a glimpse of a young, small Cookie!

Ring Candy Cookie tells the group about the Sprinkling Circus. Just hearing about it was enough to spark excitement and curiosity! But, oh dear... All the while, Jelly Bean Cookie and Cream Donut Cookie bicker back and forth.

The circus show sounds very fun and exciting, but the group doesn\'t forget their goal! GingerBrave and friends ask about the identity of Giggles, the tiny one who followed First Sprinkle Cookie into the circus tent. During their conversation, they learn that Giggles had once narrowly avoided being kidnapped! How sinister...!
In order to meet Giggles, there was only one thing to do... Watch the circus! Perhaps they\'d be able to spot Giggles among the audience or after the show? For now... let\'s enjoy the circus!

Just as Ring Candy Cookie claimed, the Sprinkle Circus was SPECTACULAR! Our friends can\'t take their eyes off the amazing stunts and extravagant tricks. All of a sudden, First Sprinkle Cookie looks like she\'s going to faint in mid-air and plummet to her doom...! OH NO!

What a performance! First Sprinkle Cookie put on a fantastic show for the Cookies and the audience. Jelly Bean Cookie\'s act is up next, but First Sprinkle Cookie begins heckling her! Erm... the arguing and bickering is all part of the act, right...? Right?

With Jelly Bean Cookie dragged off the stage, First Sprinkle Cookie thrusts Cream Donut Cookie into spotlight! The drummer is suddenly forced to walk the tightrope while doing a one-Cookie band performance! But it\'s all too much for the timid Cookie to handle...!

By sheer luck, and with a bit of help from Jelly Bean Cookie\'s conjured balloons, Cream Donut Cookie safely makes it through unscathed. Before he can breathe a sigh of relief, Jelly Bean Cookie\'s balloons turn out to be a whoopee cushion! The noise turns Cream Donut Cookie into the laughingstock of the crowd... Heartbroken, he runs away, wounded in spirit.

Ring Candy Cookie attempts to comfort Cream Donut Cookie, but to no avail. Instead, Cream Donut Cookie runs off once more, disappearing into the distance... GingerBrave and friends decide to find and console him.

Jelly Bean Cookie has been plotting to pull a prank on First Sprinkle Cookie, and it turns out she got some instructions from a mysterious stranger as well... Just then, the still-sniffling Cream Donut Cookie appeared. Eager to set her plot into motion, Jelly Bean Cookie convinces him to take Giggles away and hide somewhere...

The show must continue, but both Giggles and Cream Donut Cookie have gone missing! As the audience waits, Jelly Bean Cookie suddenly appears while holding some strange feathered orbs... But wait! Those aren\'t ordinary orbs...!
The feathered orbs transform into a swarm of Egg Golems that have been given a mission: KIDNAP GIGGLES! Cream Donut Cookie tries to flee, but is powerless to intervene!

One by one, the Egg Golems fall before First Sprinkle Cookie\'s incredible power! Watching in awe, Giggles claps with excited glee, calling it a marvelous act! Giggles turns to Cream Donut Cookie and asks him to play his drums! After all... no performance is complete without the rhythm of Cream Donut Cookie\'s drums!

Thanks to Cream Donut Cookie\'s drumming, the chaotic scene turns into a breathtaking performance! As the last golem is destroyed and the dust settles... the audience erupts into a roar of applause, laughs, and cheers!

First Sprinkle Cookie turns to Jelly Bean Cookie, demanding to learn why she caused such a mess. GingerBrave and friends gently suggest to First Sprinkle Cookie that everyone in the circus troupe should be treated with more care and treasured as precious friends, not just a circus crew. First Sprinkle Cookie seems puzzled at the concept...

First Sprinkle Cookie recalls when she was human and how she had to smile and laugh through sadness and hardshipall for the sake of the show. Realizing that she had been repeating history, she makes a promise to her troupe... She vows to create a truly joyful circus by cherishing and treasuring the important friendships made along the way.

First Sprinkle Cookie reveals that the Egg Golems are indeed connected to First Egg Cookie! She warns our heroes that finding other Cookies of the First Batch will be a dangerous task... She bids them to take caution. After taking her advice to heart, GingerBrave and friends set off for the next destination!
